title: Ore wa Rufi! Kaizoku O ni Naru Otoko Da!
desc: Alvida pirates plunder a ship only to find a barrel containing a strange boy names Luffy who is on a quest to find the legendary "One Piece" and become the King of Pirates.

title: Usopp Shisu?! Luffy Jouriku wa Mada?
desc: After Zoro escapes with Nami's help, she tries to prove her loyalty to the Arlong Pirates by appearing to kill Usopp. Meanwhile, Luffy's group finally arrives at the island.

title: Zen'in Shuuketsu! Usopp ga Kataru Nami no Shinjitsu
desc: Luffy, Sanji, and Yosaku made a crash landing in the plains of the island. Zoro(who got ran over by their boat) tells them that he needs to go rescue Usopp from the mermen. Only when Johnny came by all depressed and told them that Usopp has been killed by Nami. Either one of them, including Luffy couldn't believe it. Luffy declined that it's a lie, but Johnny wished that was true. Then Nami comes by and just told them all solemnly that the only reason she was with Luffy was for the money and nothing more. Sanji admired the way Nami acted serious, but Zoro corrects him...

title: Himerareta Kako! Onna Senshi Bell-mere!
desc: Nojiko starts her story about Nami's childhood and their adopted mother, Bellemere. Despite being poor and none of them being related by blood, they had a happy life.

title: Ikinuke! Haha Bellemere to Nami no Kizuna!
desc: Nojiko continues her story, explaining how their life was ruined when the Arlong Pirates first took over the village.

title: Luffy Tatsu! Uragirareta Yakusoku no Ketsumatsu!
desc: When marine officers under Arlong confiscate Nami's money, the villagers start a rebelion. Desperate, Nami asks Luffy for help.

title: Luffy Dai Pinch! Gyojin Tai Luffy Kaizokudan
desc: The Straw Hats face the Fishmen themselves as the villagers watch from the sidelines.

title: Luffy Suibotsu! Zoro vs Tako no Hacchan
desc: Arlong has trapped Luffy in the ocean and Zoro faces the six-sword wielding octopus Hatchan.

title: Hokoritakaki Senshi! Gekitou Sanji to Usopp
desc: Sanji was about to help Luffy out, until Kurobi swam and knocked Sanji out. He continuously beat Sanji up with his karate moves. And didn't gave him a chance to resurface for air. Kurobi goes on how inferior Humans are when it comes to needing air to survive. As Sanji is running out of breathe, he discovers that Kurobi has gills like a fish. Which means that Kurobi will be useless if his own gills were damaged. So he bit Kurobi's gills and resurfaced to breathe again. Kurobi also resurfaced and told Sanji that it's doesn't matter if the battle in underwater or on land...

title: Luffy Zenkai! Nami no Ketsui to Mugiwara Boushi
desc: With Arlong's officers defeated Zoro and Sanji take on Arlong but prove that they aren't a match for him. However, with Luffy finally free, he takes on Arlong himself.

title: Sakuretsu! Gyojin Arlong Umi kara no Moukougeki!
desc: Luffy returns to the fight, and the battle with Arlong versus Luffy begins.

title: Gyojin Teikoku no Owari! Nami wa Ore no Nakama Da!
desc: The battle spreads into Arlong Park itself and Arlong is no longer holding back.

title: Egao no Tabidachi! Saraba Furusato Cocoyashi Mura
desc: Arlong's reign of terror is over, and no one has anything on their mind except to party. As the crew celebrates, Nami reflects on her hometown and decides to officially join the Straw Hat Pirates.

title: Mugiwara o Oe! Chiisana Buggy no Daibouken
desc: It's morning, and the Straw Hat Pirates are enjoying their breakfast. Nami remembered when she and Luffy first meet, back when they encountered Buggy the Clown. Nami asked Luffy, if he'd know what had happen to Buggy. Luffy doesn't have a slight clue, but figures he's somewhere far away. Meanwhile on an island, the clown of terror himself, Buggy has spent his time wisely on the island Luffy punched him to the last time they met. He's shorter because he lost his parts from the last time. So he is now the height of a circus midget. He built a raft, and heads off to find...

title: Omachikane! Aa Fukkatsu no Buggy Senchou!
desc: Buggy tells the mystery woman he's accompanied with. That he's planning to find his old crew. Meanwhile we learn that that the Buggy Crew had escaped from the angry mob of villagers and had to cat off cowardly. Mohji and Cabaji both were worried on what became of their captain. As the only thing they have left of him are his parts(which were all gathered and tied up thanks to Nami). Mohji blamed Nami for Buggy to loose his parts. While Cabaji has a grudge for being defeated by Zoro. The crew heads for a tropical island and made a memorial for Buggy. As they presume ...

title: Hajimari to Owari no Machi: Loguetown Jouriku
desc: The Straw Hat Pirate Crew, has finally made it to LougeTown. The place where the famous Pirate King Gold Roger was born, raised, and died in. Luffy looks forward in seeing Gold Roger's execution platform. Meanwhile familiar enemies are lurking the town.

title: Sandai Kitetsu to Yubashiri! Zoro no Shintou to Onna Souchou
desc: While searching for a pair of new swords to replace the ones shattered by Mihawk, Zoro meets a woman named Tashigi. At first site, she looks exactly like Kuina.

title: Usopp Tai Kozure no Daddy: Mahiru no Kettou
desc: Usopp manages to anger the daughter of bounty hunter Daddy the Father. All because he wanted a pair of new goggles, that were meant to be a gift for Daddy. Usopp finds his own life at stake, when Daddy challenges him over a duel to claim the goggles.

title: Aratanaru Bouken no Yokan! Nazo no Shoujo Apis
desc: During the storm, a girl escaped from a Marine ship. The report was sent to Admiral Nelson Royale, who is very disappointed that the marines had made this mistake. And explained to them that the girl is the key to obtaining Ryuukotsu, the elixir of eternal life. His servant Erik was given a task to search and find the girl at all costs. It's been 2 days since the Straw Hat Pirates left Loguetown. Usopp spotted a flock of bird surrounding an object at sea. Sanji explained that normally birds would do that, when a school of fish are around. Luffy got excited and used ...

title: Kiseki no Seibutsu! Apis no Himitsu to Densetsu no Shima
desc: The Staw Hat Pirates find themselves stranded in the Calm Belt. A place where ships never come out alive. They all don't find it to be dangerous, but Nami had to explain to them on why it is an issue. The Calm Belt is a current of calm water that guards the entrance to the Grand Line. Wind and waves never occur in the Calm Belt, which makes the sails on a ship useless. Not only that but it's also home to many sea beasts. Then a huge sea monster comes out from below lifting the Going Merry. As well as a whole bunch of sea beasts came out of the water. Apis fell out of ...

title: Eric Shutsugeki! Gunkanjima kara no Daidasshutsu!
desc: Nami and Luffy went to tell Usopp, Zoro, and Sanji on what they've witnessed. Only to find them all asleep, while the half asleep Bokuden is still talking about Gunkan Island's ancestry. They woke, and heard from a village local that a group of marine ships are coming ashore. Nami told the him that if Bokuden wakes up, just tell him that they'll protect Apis at all costs. When they got back to the cave, both Usopp, Sanji, and Zoro couldn't believe it for their own eyes. Apis explained to them that Ryuuji is a Ryuukotsu Dragon. Who has lost of his strength, and ...

title: Zekkai no Kotou! Densetsu no Lost Island
desc: The Straw Hat Pirates and Apis are now taking Ryuuji back to Dragon's Nest, Lost Island. The marines back at Gunkan Island are busy repairing the damages they've caused. Erik informs the major, that he has a hunch on where they'll find the millennium dragon. And insists they head straight to where the Straw Head Pirates are going. Erik made sure that a report to Admiral Nelson won't go through. As he reveals to himself that he plans on getting the elixir of eternal life for him, to become an invincible mercenary. Admiral Nelson however got the report from a marine ...

title: Haikyo no Kettou! Kinpaku no Zoro VS Erik!
desc: The Straw Hat Pirates. Apis and Ryuuji find themselves in a temple on what believed to be the Dragon's Nest. But all they found was a high ceiling with pictures of dragons and people. It didn't look like a place where dragons once roam. Apis asked Ryuuji, but he doesn't even know what this place is either. Usopp complained that the dragon isn't too helpful at all. While Apis started to argue with him that he's not at all helpful either. Luffy found a large piece of the ceiling that was once part of the ceiling. As well as other pieces that collapsed and caved in most ...

title: Luffy Kanzen Houi! Teitoku Nelson no Hisaku
desc: The Going Merry is avoiding the line of fire from the Marine Ships of the 8th Divison. Admiral Nelson is entertained by the whole thing, and tells a marine official to send out a flag signal telling Major that they have it under control. Erik however isn't going to let the Admiral get the Sennenryuu for himself. And asks the Major for 3 capable men and a rowboat. Luffy, Sanji, and Zoro took Usopp's idea of cutting the steal chains seriously and will use that for their plan in getting out of here. So Luffy used his Gomu Gomu Bridge, so he, Sanji, and Zoro can get on ...

title: Oozora o Mau Mono! Yomigaeru Sennen no Densetsu!
desc: Luffy tells Ryuuji to not give up hope, but he remained in the water and began to sank. Admiral Nelson orders the marines to reel in the dragon with a gun spear cannon. Luffy however prevented the spear from piercing into Ryuuji. Luffy asked him on why he's doing this. Nelson just says that the only thing he wants from the dragon is eternal youth and nothing more. Luffy got angry after hearing that and threw the spear towards the Admiral's ship which missed the Admiral completely. Luffy talks some sense to Ryuuji to forget about the whole giving up thing, and think ...

title: Saisho no Toride? Kyodai Kujira Laboon Arawaru
desc: The Grand Line, the greatest ocean in the world according to Luffy. As our heroes slide down the water current slope of the Red Line, it was much like a ride. As they approach to the bottom, Zoro hears a strange noise, which Nami thinks was just the wind. Usopp used his goggle to see what was up ahead, Sanji thinks it's a mountain, but Nami knows that there isn't suppose to be one. But as they approach to what looked like a mountain turned out to be a whale. The whole crew panicked as the whale is blocking their path, and the Going Merry is going at top speed. The ...

title: Otoko no Yakusoku! Luffy to Kujira Saikai no Chikai
desc: Crocus told the Straw Hat Pirates the reason why Laboon is ramming against the Red Line. Long ago, when Crocus was looking after the lighthouses, a group of pirates entered the Grand Line, from Reverse Mountain. A little island whale(a young Laboon) had followed them all the way from the West Blue. Normally Island Whales travel with their own species, but not this one. Laboon made friends with the pirates he followed. After a few months, they repaired their ship and got acquainted with Crocus. The next day, the pirates left, and the captain told Crocus to look after ...

title: Ganbare Coby! Coby-Meppo Kaigun Funtou Ki
desc: Coby & Helmeppo return in their own side story episode.

title: Coby-Meppo no Ketsui! Garp Chuujou no Oyagokoro
desc: Coby and Helmeppo are mentored by Vice Admiral Garp in becoming marines.

title: Taiko no Shima! Little Garden ni Hisomu Kage!
desc: Straw Hat Pirate sails toward Little Garden, and unlike its name, the prehistoric animals living on the island are far from little. Everyone spreads out for another adventure and food, while Nami and Usopp stay aboard, frightened. Not long afterward, a giant approaches the ship.

title: Dekkai Kettou! Kyojin Dorry to Brogy
desc: Nami and Usopp are taken into Brogy's camp, meanwhile, Vivi and Luffy meet another giant, Dorry. They reveal that they will fight against each other whenever the volcano on the island erupts.

title: Luffy Ikaru! Seinaru Kettou ni Hiretsu na Wana!
desc: Brogy gives Dorry booze from Nami and Usopp. The booze explodes when Dorry drinks it. The duel starts once again, and even though his chance to win is very low due to his injury, Dorry still heads into the battle.

title: Brogy Shouri no Goukyuu! Elbaf no Kecchaku
desc: The salvage of a hundred year duel ends?

title: Ma no Candle! Munen no Namida to Ikari no Namida
desc: Mr. 3 manages to capture Broggy with his wax. He also captures Vivi, Nami and Zoro, and tries to turn them into wax figures.

title: Luffy o Osou Maryoku! Colors Trap
desc: Luffy tries to save Nami, Vivi and Zoro who are almost turned into wax figures. However, Miss Golden Week, partner of Mr. 3, keeps Luffy busy with her colors trap.

title: Iza Hangeki! Usopp no Kiten to Kaenboshi!
desc: With Vivi, Nami, and Zoro are almost petrified completely by the wax and Luffy is trapped by Miss Golden Week's power, Usopp is the only one left to save them all.

title: Saraba Kyojin no Shima! Arabasuta o Mezase
desc: After defeating Baroque Works on the island, Straw Hat Pirate sets sail to Arabasta. Brogy and Dorry set them off and help them escape from the giant goldfish that tries to eat Going Merry.

title: Nami ga Byouki? Umi ni Furu Yuki no Mukou ni!
desc: Luffy's crew gets a trouble when their navigator, Nami, is sick, and they do not have a doctor on the ship.

title: Kishuu! Bliking Gou to Blik no Wapol
desc: Straw Hat crew tries to find a doctor in a nearby island, but they are attacked by the pirate Wapol.

title: Isha no Inai Shima? Na mo Naki Kuni no Bouken!
desc: Not only that the island has no name, it doesn't have a doctor as well. The only one called doctor lives in the castle on the mountain's top. Sanji and Luffy go taking Nami there, while Vivi and Usopp stay behind, and listen to the history of the island from Dalton.

title: Happy kai? Majo to Yobareta Isha!
desc: It turns out that Dr. Kureha is on the other side of the island, and Usopp, Vivi and Dalton rush to find her. However, Dalton returns to the village after heard that Wapol comes back.

title: Dolton no Kakugo! Wapol Gundan Shima ni Jouriku
desc: Dalton faces Wapol, who wants to take over the island once more, but gets hit by arrows. The avalanche stops, and it injures Sanji. It is up for Luffy now to climb the mountain to save both Nami and Sanji.

title: Yuki no Sumu Shima! Drum-Rocky o Nobore!
desc: Avalanche aftermath & the mountain climbing on the Drum Rockies.

title: Tonakai wa Aoppana! Chopper no Himitsu
desc: Nami asks Chopper to join Straw Hat's crew, but the reindeer refuses. Knowing Chopper's unique ability, Luffy is also interested to have him as the crew.

title: Hamidashi Mono no Yume! Yabuisha Hiluluk!
desc: It is a flashback to the past of Chopper and Dr. Hiruluk, the first human shows him affection, told by Dr. Kureha.

title: Hiluluk no Sakura to Uketsugareyuku Ishi!
desc: Flashbacks revealing the death of Dr. Hiruluk and the cruelty of Wapol as the king at that time and how Chopper is encouraged to carry on Dr. Hiruluk's will.

title: Versus Wapol Gundan! Bakubaku no Mi no Nouryoku!
desc: Wapol has arrived to the castle and wants to take down Hirulug's flag. He and his crew engage in a battle with Luffy, Sanji and Chopper trying protect the flag.

title: Zoan-kei Akuma no Mi! Chopper Nanadan Henkei
desc: Chopper fights against one of Wapol's crew. He shows his ability to transform into seven forms using Rumble Ball which he creates by himself.

title: Oukoku no Shihai Owaru Toki! Shinnen no Hata wa Eien ni
desc: The rest of Luffy's crew and the villagers find the ropeway Dr. Kureha uses to go from the castle to the village and vice versa. Meanwhile. Luffy manages to defeat Wapol.

title: Hiluluk no Sakura! Drum Rocky no Kiseki
desc: Chopper is finally convinced to join Luffy's crew, and though Dr. Kureha is not too happy with the idea of Chopper being a pirate, she gives him a very remarkable farewell gift.

title: Sayonara Drum-tou! Boku wa Umi e Deru!
desc: Straw Hat's crew continues their journey to Vivi's homeland.

title: Arabasta no Eiyuu to Senjou no Ballerina
desc: Luffy and Usopp accidentally fish Mr. 2 Bon Clay who spends a short time with Straw Hat crew showing off the ability of his devil fruit.

title: Iza Sabaku no Kuni e! Ame o Yobu Kona to Hanrangun
desc: Straw Hat crew arrives at Nanohana, the port city of Alabasta. Luffy gets separated from the others, and somehow learns about Dance Powder.

title: Gouketsu-tachi no Saikai! Yatsu no Na wa Hiken no Ace
desc: Straw Hat crew meets Smoker and Tashigi. Smoker almost corners them when suddenly a powerful pirate appears to save Luffy. Luffy reveals him as Portgas D. Ace, his older brother.

title: Ace to Luffy! Atsuki Omoi to Kyoudai no Kizuna
desc: Luffy and his crew manages to run away from Smoker and they meet Ace in their ship. Ace reveals that he is in a mission of searching for a man named Blackbeard.

title: Midori no Machi Erumaru to Kung Fu Jugon!
desc: Ace joins Luffy crew's journey temporarily and they go to the 'Green City' of Erumalu, which is only a desert now.

title: Suna no Kuni no Bouken! Ennetsu no Daichi ni Sumu Mamono
desc: Straw Hat crew's journey through the desert after leaving Erumalu.

title: Sabaku no Kaizokudan Toujou! Jiyuu ni Ikiru Otoko-tachi
desc: Straw Hat crew meets the Desert Pirates, and Vivi realizes she knows the girl from the Desert Pirates when they were still young girls.

title: Gyakuten Dai Dasshutsu e no Kagi! Doru-Doru Ball!
desc: Mr. Prince is actually Sanji, who lures Crocodile out so that he can go in and help the others. He manages to open the cage since using the copy key made from the wax of Mr. 3, who is swallowed by one of the Bananawani.

title: Nasake Muyou no Shitou! Luffy vs Crocodile
desc: Straw Hat crew rush to Alubarne, where the final battle will take place. But Luffy is captured by Crocodile, so he tells the others to go without him. Battle between Luffy and Crocodile begins, with Crocodile overpowers him with his devil fruit's ability, sand.

title: Kiseki e no Shissou! Arabasta Doubutsu Land
desc: The rest of Straw Hat crew reaches Alubarna, while in Rainbase, Luffy gets stabbed by Crocodile, who leaves him to die. However, the mysterious Miss All Sunday saves Luffy.

title: Hanrangun Tai Kokuougun! Kessen wa Alubarna!
desc: The war between Royal Army and Rebel Army is about to start and Straw Hat crew sets up a plan to stop it.

title: Nageki no Alubarna! Gekitou Carue Taichou!
desc: Vivi is standing between Alubarne and incoming Rebel Army to speak with Kohza. But a member of Baroque Work infiltrating the Royal Army interferes by shooting the cannon, sending dust spreading and covering the area. Vivi is nearly trampled, but Karoo sacrifices himself and covers her with his body.

title: Nakama no Yume ni Chikau! Kettou Mogurazuka 4-bangai
desc: Usopp and Chopper struggle against Mr. 4 and Miss Merry Christmas, who attack them from underground and with explosive balls. Scared and badly injured, Usopp tries to flee, but stop immediately when the enemy claims that Luffy is killed by Crocodile.

title: Honjitsu Daikoukai! Mane-Mane Montage!
desc: Though badly injured, Usopp is enraged by Miss Merry Christmas's taunt. Sanji is still engaged in battle against Mr. 2 and they are evenly matched.

title: Nami ni Henshin! Bon Clay Renpatsu Ballet Kenpou
desc: Mr.2 keeps changing into Nami so that Sanji can't attack him, but then Sanji notices that Mr.2 should turn back into himself to use his Kenpo. Vivi decides to save the country by destroying the palace, but then Crocodile appears with the kidnapped King Cobra.

title: Nami no Senpuu Chuuihou! Clima Takt Sakuretsu
desc: It's a fight between Miss Doublefinger and Nami with her new weapon, Clima Tact.

title: Ouke ni Tsutawaru Himitsu! Kodai Heiki Pluton
desc: Nami manages to defeat Miss Doublefinger after several false attempts using her Clima Tact. Meanwhile, Crocodile reveals his true objective, ancient weapon Pluton, that lies somewhere in Alabasta.

title: Gouken no Gokui! Koutetsu o Kiru Chikara to Mono no Kokyuu
desc: Zoro struggles in a fierce battle against Mr. 1, who can turn his body parts into blades. After being injured very badly, Zoro learns that his katana should be able to cut steel in order to win.

title: Tatakai wa Owatta! Kooza ga Kakageta Shiroi Hata
desc: Kohza eavesdrops the conversation between Crocodile and Vivi, and now after knowing the truth, he tries to stop the Rebel Army for attacking by raising a white flag. However, Baroque Work's infiltrator in Royal Army shots him, and Crocodile spreads sand storm everywhere, encouraging the war.

title: Vivi no Koe no Yukue! Hero wa Maiorita!
desc: Crocodile tells Vivi that he sets a bomb that will destroy Alubarna and people within. Then he drops Vivi from the top of the castle, but Luffy and Pell catch her. Luffy once again challenge Crocodile into battle, claiming that now he knows Crocodile's weakness.

title: Suna Wani to Mizu Luffy! Kettou Dai 2 Round
desc: Luffy uses water to fight Crocodile, since water will not let Crocodile turns into sand. Meanwhile, the rest of Straw Hat crew tries to find the location of the bomb. Miss All Sunday, a.k.a Nico Robin, forces King Cobra to show her the location of Pluton.

title: Wanippoi! Ouke no Haka e Hashire Luffy!
desc: After defeating Luffy for the second time, Crocodile joins Nico Robin in the middle of her translating the Poneglyph. Robin admits that the Poneglyph does not mention Pluton at all, and Crocodile stabs her saying that she isn't useful anymore to him.

title: Akumu no Toki Semaru! Koko wa Sunasunadan Himitsu Kichi
desc: After recovering, Luffy fights Crocodile again in the tomb, this time using his blood as water replacement. He gets poisoned but still he fights Crocodile with all his might. Meanwhile, Vivi finally finds out the location of the bomb and tells the others.

title: Idainaru Tsubasa! Waga Na wa Kuni no Shugoshin Pell
desc: Vivi manages to cut the bomb's fuses, but realizes that the bomb has been set to explode at a certain time. Only several seconds left before the bomb explodes, and suddenly, Pell appears, sacrificing himself by taking the bomb up to the sky.

title: Koeteiku! Arabasta ni Ame ga Furu!
desc: The bomb explodes in the sky, the impact blows away the sand storm. At the same time, Luffy defeats Crocodile and punches him through the bedrock. Even so, the war is still raging, and though Vivi screams at the top of her lungs to make them stop, nobody listens to her, until the first drops of rain fall down and calm them.

title: Buki yo Saraba! Kaizoku to Ikutsuka no Seigi
desc: The first rain fall in 3 years/The end of the Alabasta War!

title: Kaizoku-tachi no Utage to Arabasta Dasshutsu Sakusen!
desc: After defeating Crocodile, Luffy's crew is preparing to sail away when they find out that Mr 2 took the Going Merry and is awaiting for them at the Sandora River. He claims to need their friendship.

title: Hajimari wa Ano Hi! Vivi ga Kataru Boukentan!
desc: Vivi gives her speech in front of the people of Alabasta today. At the same time, Straw Hat crew waits for her to come and sail with them. However, the Marine begins to chase them. It turns out that Vivi has Igaram to stand in the podium, while she and Karoo go to the promised location. In front of the crew, and heard by all of Alabasta's people, Vivi states that she loves her country and therefore she can't join Luffy. However, she hopes that they will still think of her as a friend. To prevent the Marine knows her relationship with them, Straw Hat crew answers her ...

title: Kiken na Kaori! Shichininme wa Nico Robin!
desc: With Mr.2's help, Straw Hat crew manages to escape from Marines. Suddenly, Nico Robin appears from the inside of the ship and persuades Luffy and the rest of the crew to let her be the seventh crew.

title: Hajimete no Kranke! Rumble Ball Hiwa
desc: Straw Hat crew lands on an uninhabited island. As usual, some of the crew is sent to gather food or survey the island. Chopper stays behind to guard the ship, but realize that Robin stays as well. Awkwardly he tells the story about his mentor, and also his first patient, Dr. Kureha.

title: Koukaishi no Hanran! Yuzurenai Yume no Tame ni!
desc: Accidentally, Luffy fishes a huge ammonite and apparently it is a kind of vehicle owned by a traveling salesman. Nami gets a pile of paper and then begins to draw the map of the world like she always dreams about, only to find that she should restart twice drawing the map of the Reverse Mountain due to the mischief of the crew.

title: Uketsugareru Recipe! Curry no Tetsujin Sanji
desc: Tajiyo, a young trainee cook in a Marine's ship falls from the ship and wakes up in Straw Hat's ship. Surprised by the quality of Sanji's food, he then goes back to his ship along with Luffy and Sanji, who helps him cook the perfect dish.

title: Sakasete Misemasu! Otoko Usopp Hasshakudama
desc: Straw Hat's crew arrives on the next island, and it seems that it is day the inhabitants of the island hold their annual fireworks show. Usopp goes to the fireworks factory run by an old man named Odama and his granddaughter, Kodama.

title: Yagi no Shima no Zenny to Yama no Naka no Kaizokusen!
desc: Luffy and his friends escape from the Marines once again and find an unknown island where old pirate Zenny dwells.

title: Moukarimakka? Kanekashi Zenny no Yabou!
desc: Zenny reveals his past life while the Marines make their moves to get both Luffy's reward and the moneylender's treasure.

title: Shima no Otakara no Yukue! Zenny Kaizokudan Shutsugeki!
desc: The Marines are defeated and Zenny prepares to begin his pirate new life.

title: Kibamuku Uwabami! Tsui ni Hajimaru Survival Game
desc: Gan Fall tells the story about the raising of Enel's tyranny, and the vengeance of the Shandian people. Luffy, Zoro, Chopper and Robin escape from a poisonous python.

title: Sutemi no Haigeki (Reject)! "Senki" Wiper no Kakugo
desc: The Survival Game begins and Shura is the first to fall. The Shandians split and Wiper meets Luffy. Enel sends the 50 Sacred Warriors. Gan Fall teaches Sanji, Nami, Usopp and Chopper about the power of the Reject Dial.

title: Kuuchuu no Gekisen! Kaizoku Zoro VS Senshi Braham
desc: Robin makes it to the ruins and fight against a Sacred Warrior. Zoro faces the lightguns of Braham, while Luffy is still entertained with Wiper. Enel comes into scene.

title: Unaru Burn Bazooka!! Luffy VS Senki Wiper
desc: Satori's younger brothers appear to fight against Nami and Gan Fall. Luffy is swallowed by the giant python. Chopper meets the Iron Priest.

title: Numa no Shiren! Chopper VS Shinkan Gedatsu!!
desc: Luffy is still trapped into the python, while Robin tries to protect the ruins she found from the powerful attacks of Chief Yama. Chopper must face his fears in order to defeat Priest Gedatsu.

title: Muteki no Nouryoku! Akasareru Enel no Shoutai
desc: The Survival Game continues, Gan Fall and Nami defeat Zatori's younger brothers Hotori and Kotori. The former god goes after Enel and Nami is left with his Impact Dial. Conis and Pagaya make it to the Going Merry.

title: Maburoshi no Miyako! Yuudai Naru Shandra no Iseki!!
desc: Robin defeats Chief Yama and arrives to the city of Shandora. Zoro makes a new friend. Luffy is starving but still inside the python.

title: Seizonritsu 0%!! Chopper VS Shinkan Ohm
desc: Chopper tries to escape from Priest Ohm. Nami and Aisa gets lost in the forest after the giant python spots the Going Merry. Zoro, Gan Fall and Wiper meet Priest Ohm and prepare for the battle.

title: Daikengo Arawaru! Kaizokugari Roronoa Zoro
desc: Luffy and Koby arrive at Shell Island where they meet Roronoa Zoro, a bounty hunter held under arrest by Captain Morgan.

title: Rufi no Kako! Akagami no Shankusu Tojo
desc: Luffy reflects on his past and how he came in possession of his Straw Hat.

title: Kyofu Nazo no Chikara! Kaizoku Doke Bagi-sencho!
desc: Nami tricks Luffy into allowing her to turn him over to Buggy as a battle ensues.

title: Zettai Zetsumei! Mojutsukai Moji VS Rufi!
desc: After Buggy's defeat Mohji and Richie seek revenge while Luffy meets a small dog guarding his master's store.

title: Sozetsu Ketto! Kengo Zoro VS Kyokugei no Kabaji!
desc: The city's mayor rushes to fight Buggy but the Straw Hat Pirates come to his aid. Zoro fights Cajabi while Luffy faces Buggy himself.

title: Shousha wa docchi? Akuma no mi no nouryoku taiketsu!
desc: Luffy becomes enrages when Buggy rips his straw hat as the battle continues.

title: Seigi no usotsuki? Kyaputen Usoppu
desc: Nami forms an alliance with the Straw Hat Pirates as their navigator as the crew arrives at Syrup Village where they meet Usopp.

title: Chijou saikyou no hen na yatsu! Saiminjutsushi Jango
desc: Luffy and Usopp learn that Kaya's caretaker, Klahadore pairs up with a strange man plot as they plot to kill her.

title: Inbou o abake! Kaizoku shitsuji Kyaputen Kuro
desc: After learning of Captain Kuro's evil plan, Usopp runs back to the village to warn Kaya, only to find that after all his years of lying no one believes him.

title: Gekitotsu! Kuroneko kaizokudan sakamichi no daikoubou!
desc: The Black Cat Pirates lead by Jango will do their move at dawn. In order to protect the village from mayhem, the south coast slope will need to be blocked off. So according to Usopp, the south slope is the only way to the village. His plan is to cover it with oil and attack the pirate with surprise. But by the time it was morning, Nami heard voices coming from the other side of the island. She was curious if this was the only entrance to the village. Then Usopp realized that there's another slope like this one at the north coast. Usopp dashed to the north coast while ...

title: Kyoufu no futarigumi! Nyâban kyoudai vs Zoro
desc: The Straw Hat Pirates take out most of the Black Cat Pirates, so Jango orders the Nyaban Brothers to attack. Meanwhile, after getting hypnotized by Jango, Luffy gets himself stuck under the collapsed mast of the Black Cat Pirates' ship.

title: Rufi fukkatsu! Kaya ojousama no kesshi no taikou
desc: Captain Kuro arrives at the scene, and with Zoro too injured to fight, Luffy being incapacitated, and the other two being too weak to handle him, things seem hopeless. However, Kaya herself appears to bargain with Kuro.

title: Kuro o taose! Otoko Usoppu namida no ketsui!
desc: Zoro and Buchi face off once again as Luffy and Kuro begin their fight.

title: Giant Jack o Nobore!! Jouzou Iseki no Shitou
desc: Nami and Aisa arrive to the Upper Ruins when escaping from the python, where the fight between Zoro, Gan Fall, Ohm and Wiper continues. Zoro finds Chopper, and goes mad. Gan Fall saves Nami and Aisa from Wiper's rage.

title: Tetsu no Shiren no Shinkoccyou! Shiruibara Death Match!!
desc: Laki climbs to the Upper Ruins and meets Wiper. Enel appears and attacks her, then leaves. Nami, Gan Fall, Pierre and Aisa meet Luffy. Zoro tries to kill the python bur Ohm interferes.

title: Hotobashiru Zangeki! Zoro VS Shinkan Ohm!!
desc: Fight between Zoro and Ohm continues while Luffy and Nami are still inside the python. Enel meets Robin in the Lower Ruins. One of the Gan Fall Guardians scape and makes it to the beach where Conis and Pagaya are treating Sanji and Usopp.

title: Kuzure Yuku Jousou Iseki! Finale e no Quintet!!
desc: Nami and Gan Fall come out of the python, which is rapidly terminated by Enel. The Survival Game's finale is approaching and there are still six survivors. Luffy and Aisa remain caught.

title: Kodai Iseki no Taiketsu! God Enel no Mokuteki!!
desc: Enel reveals his intentions of returning to his birth land, Fairy Vearth. The 6th survivor is defeated and Enel invites the winners to come with him. Robin and Zoro face the strength of the God, but Wiper has a final strategy.

title: Fairy Vearth e no Yabou Hakobune Maxim!!
desc: Enel's fierce is unleashed when the survivors try to resist him. Nami goes with Enel to Fairy Vearth so he takes her to the Maxim. Luffy, Aisa and Pierre come out of the python and find the beaten crew. Robin warns Luffy about Enel's intentions.

title: Tsuini Gekitotsu! Kaizoku Luffy VS God Enel!!
desc: Conis arrives to Angel Island and prevents the people from Enel's plan. McKinley backs her and together they organize the exodus. Aisa guides Luffy to the cave where Enel and Nami are hidden. The battle begins.

title: Maxim Fujou! Ugoki Hajimeta Deathpiea!!
desc: Enel prepares his final attack towards Angel Island. The people is gathering into the ships but some citizens decide to go to the shandian village and warn them. Luffy must overcome Enel's ability of Mantra.

title: Luffy Rakka! Kami no Sabaki to Nami no Nozomi!!
desc: Luffy is trapped by a giant gold ball and falls from the Maxim ship. The shandians are informed about the danger. Sanji and Usopp leave the Going Merry to save Nami.

title: Mezameta Futari! Moeru Koi no Kyuushutsu Zensen
desc: Sanji and Usopp prepare a plan to save Nami. Aisa and Pierre find Luffy and try to help him get rid of the golden ball. Meanwhile, in the Angel Island, people is rushing towards Cloud End.

title: Zetsubou e no Capriccio Semaei Kuru Sora Shima no Shoumetsu!!
desc: The attack of Deathpeia begins while the Straw Hat Crew is gathering again at the foot of the Giant Jack. Thunders strike Angel Island. Luffy raises once more and runs to stop Enel.

title: Kane no Ne no Michibiki! Daisenshi to Tankenka no Monogatari
desc: A flashback from Wyper about the history of Calgara and Norland. How Norland and his crew came to Calgara's village and saved the village from the epidemic.

title: Jubaku kara no Kaihou! Daisenshi ga Nagashita Namida!!
desc: Norland and Calgara became best buddies, however, when the time almost came for Norland to go back to his kingdom, suddenly the villagers hate them.

title: Eien no Shinyuu! Oo-unabari ni Hibikuchikai no Kane!!
desc: Not long before Norland sails away, the misunderstanding between them is explained and resolved. Calgara promises Norland that he will keep ringing the bell so that Norland will find his way again to their island, while Norland promises Calgara that he will go back with his king.

title: Angel-tou Shoumetsu! Raigou Kourin no Kyoufu!!
desc: Wiper finds out from Niko Robin that Montblanc Noland has a descendant that is searching for the City of Gold, and that that is the reason why Luffy wants to ring the Golden Bell.

title: Giant Jack o Taose! Dasshutsu e no Saigo no Nozomi
desc: Nami comes out with a good plan so that she and Luffy can reach Enel, by knocking down the Giant Jack. Zoro cuts the stalk, but Enel attacks him before he can cuts the stalk once more. Robin tells Wyper that Luffy wants to ring the bell so that the descendant of Norland far below will hear it. Wyper then uses Reject to knock down Giant Jack.

title: Kami no Kune no Kiseki! Tenshi no Todoita Love Song
desc: Luffy manages to ring the golden bell by smashing Enel to it, and the sound of the bell is heard through the Skypea, as well as the land in the Blue Sea.

title: Tatakai no Shuuen! Tooku Hibiku Hokori Takaki Fantasia
desc: Hearing the sound of the Golden Bell, Montblanc Cricket and Masira brothers realize that all this time the Gold City is up in the sky. Meanwhile, Sky People (both Shandian and Skypiean) move to the Upper Yard since their homes are destroyed by Enel and celebrate the end of the 400-years-old war between them.

title: Ware Koko ni Itaru! Poneglyphs ga Tsumugu Mono
desc: Robin notices the way to discover Rio Poneglyph after deciphering the Poneglyph on the Golden Bell. She also notices that Gol D. Roger wrote the Poneglyph and had discovered the Rio Poneglyph.

title: Iza Seikai e!! Omoi ga Orinasu Saishuu Gakushou
desc: It's time for Straw Hat crew to continues their journey and goes back to Blue Sea. The Golden Bell rings once again when they leave, as a parting gift and gratitude from Sky People. However, Straw Hat crew gets into a trouble when they land safely in Blue Sea.

title: Hijoujitai Hatsurei! Akumei Takaki Kaisokusen Sennyuu!
desc: Things get a little messy at G-8 Marine base when a mysterious ship falls from the sky. Recognition ships are sent instantly. Meanwhile, the Straw Hat Crew has split and everyone is trying to understand the situation.

title: Ryourinin Sanji! Kaigun Shokudou de Shinka Hakki!
desc: Sanji and Luffy are thought to be the famous brother chefs arriving from Mariejois. The cooking competition starts and Sanji show his abilities while Luffy eats as much as he can. Zoro gets into trouble.

title: Torawareru Zoro to Chopper Kinkyuu Shittou
desc: Zoro is interrogated by the marines but they do not believe his answers. Chopper helps Dr Kobato with her fear to blood, and together they heal the seriously injured marines.

title: Semaru Kaigun no Sousa mou! Torawareta Futari Me!
desc: Luffy and Sanji are discovered in the kitchen but they manage to escape. Usopp is caught by Drake and taken with Zoro. Robin kidnaps the General Inspector.

title: Kesshi no Luffy to Sanji! Kyuushutsu Dai Sakusen!
desc: Luffy and Sanji make it to the prison where Usopp and Zoro are caught but they are trapped by the marines. Usopp gives Sanji his Dials in order to destroy the cell.

title: Nekketsu Tokubetsu Butai Sansen! Bridge Koubousen!
desc: Luffy, Usopp, Sanji and Zoro have to cross a huge bridge in order to get to dock 88. Marines are waiting and the battle begins. Dr Kobato helps Nami and Chopper to meet their friends.

title: Houi Mou Toppa! Dakkan Going Merry Gou
desc: Nami and Dr Kobato pretend to be hostages and the crew makes it to the Going Merry, which Kobato's father Mekao has just set free. Robin takes a map of the fortress and meets them later.

title: Kieta Kaizokusen! Yousai Koubou Dai 2 Round
desc: Luffy breaks the main gate redirecting the marine's bombs but Nami realizes the treasure is gone so the crew goes back into the docks. They hide the Going Merry and prepare for the assault.

title: Ougon Dakkan Sakusen to Waver Kaishuu Sakusen!
desc: Nami and Sanji go after the Waver and Chopper takes care of the Going Merry. Meanwhile Luffy, Zoro, Usopp and Robin chase the treasure, but Vice Admiral Jonathan is expecting them.

title: Ichimoudajin Keikaku! Jonathan Jishin no Hisaku
desc: The gold team opens the vault just to discover it's empty. The Waver team recovers the vehicle and meets Chopper at the dock. Luffy and Nami go to Jonathan's office to recover the gold, and the crew meets again in the ship.

title: Saraba Kaigun Yousai! Dasshutsu e no Saigo no Koubou
desc: The teeth of Navarone close upon the Going Merry and the Straw Hat Crew thinks a plan to escape. Inspector Shepherd tries to attack the pirates on his own but he only causes more trouble.

title: Long Ring Long Land no Dai Bouken!
desc: The crew is sailing the skies of Grand Line when the fire Dial runs out of gas. They arrive to a strange island where everything is longer than usual. Luffy meets an old man who lived 10 years wearing stilts.

title: Foxy Kaizoku Dan to Davy Back!
desc: Tonjit and Shelly meet again and go riding along the fields when pirate Foxy appears and shoots a net to them. He defies Luffy to accept the Davy Back competition and the game begins.

title: Dai Ikkaisen! Gururi Isshuu Doughnut Race
desc: The Donut Race begins where the pirates must form teams and navigate along the Long Ring Long Land shore. Evil captain Foxy prepares a trap for the Straw Hat Crew when they get to a whirlpool.

title: Gingitsune no Foxy! Mouretsu Bougai Kousei
desc: Foxy's pirates win the Donut Race and take Chopper, who now can not participate in the second round. Sanji and Zoro must fight together against the powerful monkey brothers and a giant Fishman.

title: Dai 2 Kaisen! Buchi Kome Groggy Ring
desc: The Groggy Ring game starts and Sanji and Zoro can't get on so well. Groggy Monster's Team takes advantage of the situation and beat the Straw Hat Pirates.

title: Red Card Renpatsu! Groggy Ring
desc: The invincible Groggy Monsters are defeated by Sanji and Zoro and time has come for Luffy to choose a new nakama. Against his friend's advices, he chooses Tonjit's horse Shelly.

title: Dai Sankaisen! Guru Guru Roller Race!
desc: The third game, Roller Race, begins and Luffy must learn how to roller skate before the Foxy team wins three rounds. Nami does her best but they are hypnotized by Porche.

title: Hakunetsu Bakusou Race! Saishuu Round Totsunyuu!
desc: The Straw Hat team has balanced the competition but the final round is still to be won. Nami and Usopp develop a plan to stop Foxy but they are caught by his beam. Robin must help Luffy to win.

title: Kaya o mamore! Usoppu kaizokudan daikatsuyaku!
desc: As the fight between Luffy and Kuro is close to an end, the Usopp Pirates do their best to avoid Jango.

title: Ikari bakuhatsu! Kuro vs Rufi kecchaku no yukue!
desc: Kuro's ultimate attack destroys everything in the area and Luffy becomes enraged by his lack of regard for his crew.

title: Anta ga chunjuu! Gaimon to kimyou na nakama
desc: With Usopp now in the crew and a new ship, the Going Merry, the Straw Hats head to an island said to hold a fabled treasure, only to encounter a strange man stuck in a treasure box.

title: Santouryuu no kako! Zoro to Kuina no chikai!
desc: While Usopp and Luffy fool around with the ship's cannon one day, Zoro dreams about his childhood and the promise he made to Kuina.

title: Meibutsu kokku! Kaijou resutoran no Sanji
desc: The crew meets Johnny and Yosaku, Zoro's former companions, and they set sail for the Baratie restaurant in search of a cook.

title: Manukarezaru kyaku! Sanji no meshi to Gin on
desc: Zoro, Nami, and Usopp went into the restaurant to see what's taking Luffy so long. Only to find an aftermath of a brutal fight. Sanji, who gave Iron Fist a real good kick. Is holding him with his grasp. And tells him that money won't repay the hard work he's put himself through in making that soup. Patty, a buff cook came out from the men's room saw what Sanji is doing and tries to stop him. Then Zeff and Luffy came falling through the ceiling and landed on the floor. Zeff sorted this out, as Sanji's had a long history in fighting with costumers who criticize his ...

title: Saikyou no kaizoku kantai! Teitoku Don Kurîku
desc: Gin returns to the Baratie with his also-starving captain, Don Krieg, to whom Sanji once more gives food, but Don Krieg betrays the cook once he regains his energy.

title: Mamore Baratie! Daikaizoku akaashi no Zefu
desc: It is revealed that Chef Zeff was a great pirate known as Red Leg Zeff. Gin explains the catastrophe the fleet met in Grand Line when they encountered Hawk-Eyes Mihawk, and Krieg attempts to take control of the Baratie.

title: Tama no me no Mihôku! Kenzoku Zoro umi ni chiru
desc: As Nami steals the Going Merry, Mihawk has returned to finish the job, but Zoro challenges him to a duel in order to achieve his dream.

title: Hissatsu ashiwaza sakuretsu! Sanji vs Teppeki no Pâru
desc: Mihawk leaves after defeating Zoro, so Krieg continues his invasion as Sanji reveals his fighting skills. Meanwhile, Johnny and Yosaku leave with Usopp and the wounded Zoro to go after Nami.

title: Zefu to Sanji no yume Maboroshi no ôru burû
desc: With Zeff held captive by Gin, Sanji has no choice but to take Pearl's hits, and he reflects on why Zeff means so much to him.

title: Reitetsu hijou no kijin Kaizoku kantai soutaichou Gin
desc: Gin finishes off Pearl, claiming that he wants to kill Sanji himself. Still wounded, Sanji faces Gin while Luffy attacks Don Krieg.

title: Shinaneeyo! Gekitou Rufi vs Kurîku!
desc: When Gin refuses to kill Sanji, Krieg uses poison gas on him. Luffy seems to have the advantage in the fight until Krieg pulls out his explosive Battle Spear.

title: Shitou no Ketchaku! Hara ni Kukutta Ippon no Yari!
desc: Even after taking several hits from the Battle Spear, Luffy refuses to give up.

title: Tabidachi! Umi no kokku wa Rufi to tomoni
desc: Gin decides to go back to the Grand Line with Krieg despite still being poisoned, and Sanji makes the difficult decision on whether to stay or to go with Luffy just as Yosaku comes back with the news that he knows where Nami is.

title: Higashi no Umi Saiaku no Otoko! Gyojin Kaizoku Arlong!
desc: The crew chases after Nami, who stole their ship, and Yosaku takes time during the trip to explain about Arlong and his Fishmen to Luffy and Sanji. Meanwhile, Usopp, Johnny, and Zoro arrive at the island Nami docked at.

title: Cocoyashi Mura no Majo! Arlong no Onna Kanbu
desc: Zoro is tied up by wrist to ankle. Arlong keeps asking him on what is his true plan. And Zoro kept telling him he's looking for a woman and called him half fish. Arlong let the insult went by and told Zoro that he hates man kind so much. He believes that mermen should be the superior species on the planet. As mermen are stronger and have the ability to live underwater as well as land. He's taken over the entire island he owns, and is powerful with the money he's inherited from the marines and villagers. Then a woman came out and criticize Arlong's monologuing on his ...

title: Joukinkubi! Mugiwara no Luffy Yo ni Shirewataru
desc: With Buggy, Krieg and Arlong defeated, Luffy now has the highest bounty in East Blue.

title: Honoo no Ryouri Battle? Sanji VS Bijin Chef
desc: Sanji enters a cooking contest against a woman named Carmen for an Elephant Tuna that he has always dreamed of cooking. Meanwhile Buggy and Alvida reveal themselves to Luffy who is about to be executed by them.

title: Buggy no Revenge! Shokeidai de Warau Otoko!
desc: All seems lost when Buggy has Luffy trapped on top of Gold Roger's execution platform. Can Luffy be able to escape his own death? Meanwhile an unusual storm of any king has formed up in LogueTown, and a mysterious figure appears out of no where.

title: Densetsu wa Hajimatta! Mezase Grand Line
desc: After Luffy escaped his execution, he, Zoro, and Sanji are heading back to the harbor. The storm that just occurred is like no other. But it will give the Straw Hat Pirates the advantage to use the ocean's current to head straight to the Grand Line. Meanwhile Cabaji, Buggy, and Alvida fight their way through the line of marines. They decide to retreat, so Buggy uses his special Baka Baka Car move while Alvida uses her Zero Fricition sliding move to make a get away. But Smoker used his devil's fruit power to stop them all, so that way the marines can use their own ...

title: Ikari no Kecchaku! Red Line o Norikoero!
desc: Erik the Whirlwind is still around, and would of drown if the the ocean level didn't drain. He still has the idea that the Ryuukotsu has the elixir of life. Nami corrected him, that the Ryuukotsu is calcified and is merely impossible to create elixir out of. Erik however has his eyes set on the living dragons. Instead of killing them, he offer them all a deal in sharing the Ryuukotsu. Luffy wasn't interested in the offer. Which made Erik think that Luffy isn't seeing this through. Then he finally sees it's useless to convince them that getting eternal life is good. So...

title: Kaizoku Kangei no Machi? Whiskey Peak Jouriku
desc: As the Going Merry travels to Whiskey Peak, our friends experience the Grand Line's unpredictable weather. First it was snowing, which Luffy and Usopp found an activity to do including snow ball fights and snowman building. Mr. 9 and Miss Wednesday were complaining that there's no heater. Nami told them to shut up as she couldn't help but how strange that it became cold from warm in minutes. But then she found out that they're off course according to the log pose, and need to turn 180 degrees. As everyone got busy in getting the ship back on course, they face a series...

title: Sakuretsu Santouryuu! Zoro VS Baroque Works!
desc: Zoro knows about the Baroque Works organization. And for that he must die. But he disappear off the roof. And reappeared in the crowd of bounty hunters. They got out their guns to shoot him, but they all missed and shoot each other. Mr. 8 discovers that Zoro is no ordinary swordsman. As Zoro drew his sword behind Mr. 8 before he could blink. Soon Zoro is chased by the Whiskey Peak civilians, and decides to try out the swords he got from Loguetown. And they all didn't stand a chance against Zoro's sword techniques and stealth moves. Usopp, Sanji, and Luffy were still ...

title: Shinken Shoubu! Luffy VS Zoro Nazo no Daikettou!
desc: Mr. 5 and Miss Valentine were informed by the boss that one of their agents knows some secrets that can't be leaked out. They know Mr. 8 and Miss Wednesday's true identities are were placed orders to eliminate them. Mr. 8 tries to kill them with his canons. But discovers that there's not a scratch on them. Igaram tried all he could to stop them but got hurt badly. And told Miss Wednesday(Princess Vivi) to run for it. She didn't want to leave Igaram like this. But he didn't want her to worry about him. Just remain alive for the sake of their kingdom. Mr. 9 battles Mr. ...

title: Oujo Vivi o Todokero! Luffy Kaizoku Dan Shukkou
desc: Luffy and Zoro defeated Miss Valentine and Mr. 5 while they fight their pointless battle. Nami came by and put an end to it. Luffy soon learned what really happened and forgive Zoro for thinking he killed the locals for nothing. Nami tells Vivi that they'll do it only for a matter of money. Vivi however doesn't have anything in return, she just wants to be returned to her home land safely. Nami didn't get why a princess wouldn't have any money. Vivi explained that her kingdom was wealthy long ago. Right until it got into a civil war. Which was caused by the Baroque ...

title: Unaru Netsukyuu Goukyuu! Kaizoku Dodgeball!
desc: The Davy Back Fight has just finish and Foxy is already asking for a rematch. Hit and Dead Ball game begins and the Straw Hat Crew must avoid all the tricky rules.

title: Dangai no Kessen! Daruma-san ga Koronda!
desc: The rematch begins and the Straw Hat Team is in trouble when the Hit and Dead Ball game is lost. Hopes are hanging upon the second game, DTD, where teams must rush to touch old Oni. The outcome is unexpected.

title: Captain Taiketsu! Saishuusen Combat!
desc: After losing two nakamas, Nami doubles the bet and the last round of the Davy Back fight starts. Luffy and Foxy battle in the Sexy Foxy ship, where the evil Foxy's beams are putting Luffy in a hurry.

title: Zenkai Noro Noro Kougeki VS Fujimi no Luffy
desc: Foxy carries Luffy into his ship where he has the advantage. Several rooms with dangerous weapons are waiting for him, and the Noro Noro beam keeps our hero frozen.

title: Souzetsu Nettou Combat! Unmei no Saishuu Kecchaku
desc: Luffy defeats Foxy using a piece of mirror that got stuck in his afro and wins the Davy Back Fight. 500 nakamas come into his crew among which he gets Robin and Chopper back. Old Oni meets his grandson the digger.

title: Ushinatta? Ubawareta? Omae wa Dare Da?
desc: After leaving Long Ring Long Land the crew drops the anchor in an unknown island to spend the night. They are visited by a mysterious Fishwoman who plays a song, and everybody wakes up without their memories, except Robin.

title: Fue o Idaita Nazo no Shounen to Robin no Suiri!
desc: Robin is the only one who has her memories untouched and she must keep the crew together. Nami and Zoro leave on their own but the archaeologist manages to convince the rest. The mysterious guilty boy appears.

title: Iza Kioku o Dakkan Seyo! Kaizoku Dan Shima ni Jouriku
desc: Luffy and his crew confronts the Mysterious Boy but he escapes after giving Luffy's memories back. The crew goes after his lost friends but the Boy has some plans for Zoro. Robin begins to unravel the mystery.

title: Kiba o Muku Zoro! Tachihadakatta Yajuu!
desc: Robin discovers the secret of the memories-eating monster and goes after him with Sanji, Chopper, Usopp, Luffy and Nami, whose gold Sanji is carrying. Zoro comes looking for Luffy and the battle begins.

title: Honjou o Awarashita Kioku Dorobou no Saigo Gyakushuu
desc: The Seahorse and the boy confront the crew but Sanji kick's the boy's ass just when he is trying to attack Nami and Usopp. Memories come back and the battle begins. Luffy is the only one who can fight without memories.

title: Hokori takaki otoko! Gin Gitsune no Foxy
desc: The Straw Hat Crew find Foxy in the sea and help him get to his ship. Luffy fights against the pirates that are trying to steal the Sexy Foxy and defeats them, just to discover that Foxy has been planning treason.

title: Mottomo Muteki ni Tsuyoi Yatsu? Tomottomo Kiken na Otoko!
desc: After being defeated again, Foxy keeps trying to disturb and the crew surprises him using a crab robot. Luffy and friends land in a new island where they find a powerful marine leader, Aokiji.

title: Kaigun Honbu Taishou Aokiji! Saikou Senryoku no Kyoui
desc: Aokiji says to be in the island just to locate the whereabouts of Robin, and both he and the crew help the shipwreck survivors to leave the island. But then the Admiral decides to fight and he attacks Nico.

title: Gomu to Koori no Ikkiuchi! Luffy vs Aokiji
desc: Luffy tells the crew to protect Robin and leave him alone with Aokiji. Ice and Rubber face each other but the Straw Hat captain is defeated. Sanji and Zoro save him and the Going Merry continues it's voyage.

title: Shissou Umi Ressha to Mizu no Toshi Water Seven
desc: The Straw Hat Crew arrives to a Blue Station where they meet the great Sea Train. Old guard Kokoro tells them about Water 7 and they sail to the island looking for a carpenter to repair the Going Merry.

title: Suijou Toshi no Bouken! Mokushise Kyodai Zousen Koujou
desc: Luffy, Nami and Usopp go with the gold looking for exchange and the shipyards where they can repair their ship. Chopper finally finds a library but Robin disappears. Zoro receives some visits in the Going Merry.

title: Franky ikka to Iceberg san!
desc: Zoro gets rid of the Franky Family, while Sanji gets lost in the city and watches Robin disappear with a masked man. Luffy, Nami and Usopp meet carpenter Kaku and Mayor Iceberg. The Franky Family steals their money.

title: Garera Company! Soukan Ichiban Dock
desc: The Franky Family is still after the money while Zoro talks with Kaku about the Going Merry. When Kaku returns to the shipyard with the terrible news, Luffy and Nami realizes that Usopp is gone.

title: Kaizoku Yuukai Jiken to Shi o Matsu Dake no Kaizokusen
desc: Usopp is kidnapped by the Franky Family. Nami and Luffy realize and Luffy goes after him. The rest of the crew is receiving the new about Merry. Usopp confront the burglars at the Franky House.

title: Nakama Kyuushutsu! Harikomi Franky House
desc: The Straw Hat Crew arrives to the Franky House looking for their friend and they easily beat the Franky Famlily, but their boss has already escaped with the money. Chopper heal Usopp while Luffy makes a decision.

title: Gekka no Oogenka! Kanashimi ni Hirugaeru Kaizokuki!
desc: Usopp is healed by Chopper and he asks for the Going Merry's future. A worrying quarrel begins when Luffy tells him his decision. He and Usopp argue until the Lier leaves the ship and asks Luffy for a duel.

title: Luffy VS Usopp! Butsukaru Otoko no Iji
desc: The most terrible fight begins and Usopp has prepared some tricks to fool Luffy, but the strength of the captain is clear. Memories go back and forth while even Merry is crying.

title: Genkishin Mizu no Toshi! Nerawareta Iceberg
desc: The crew has moved to a hotel when Nami arrives with the news about Iceburg. She and Luffy go to find out more while Sanji and Chopper keep tracing Robin. In dock 1, Franki appears looking for Luffy.

title: Gomu Gomu Ningen VS Ka o Fuku Cyborg
desc: Franky wants to fight Luffy but in the meantime Iceburg awakes and tell the carpenters what he saw. The Galle-La five go after Luffy and they interrupt the fight. Aqua Laguna is coming.

title: Hannin wa Mugiwara Kaizukudan? Mizu no Toshi Youjinbou
desc: Franky interferes in the battle and Nami and Luffy escape. The city is looking for the Straw Hat Pirates when Luffy rushes into Iceburg's residence, trying to find the truth. Iceburg confirms Robin's guilt.

title: Eien no Wakare? Yamo o Hiku Onna Nico Robin
desc: The crew is spread throughout the city, Sanji and Chopper go back to the ship to warn Usopp about the Aqua Laguna. Chopper smells Robin and she declares her farewell.

title: Robin o Tsukamaero! Mugiwara Ichimi no Ketsui
desc: The crew decides to go after Robin and determine once and for all whether she is their nakama or not. People of Water 7 gather in Iceburg's residence to protect him during the arrival of Aqua Laguna.

title: Aizu wa Hougeki to Tomoni! Ugokidashita CP9
desc: Night has fallen and the Galley-La soldiers are waiting. CP9 spies appear while the Straw Hat Crew is patiently waiting hidden in a tree. Iceburg tries to protect his treasure, but it's too late. Battle has began.

title: Kamen o Totta CP9! Sono Odoroki no Sugao
desc: Luffy decides to start moving but he gets stuck between two buildings. The rest of the crew makes it to the back garden where they are forced to beat the shipwrights. CP9's identities are unmasked in front of Iceburg's eyes.

title: Himeta Kizuna! Iceberg to Franky
desc: CP9 members untangle Iceburg's plan to maintain Pluton's whereabouts in secret and decide to go after Franky. Meanwhile, both Luffy and Pauly, and Nami, Zoro and Chopper arrive to Iceburg's room.

title: Kaete Koi Robin! CP9 to no Taiketsu!
desc: The CP9 members show their true strength when the Straw Hat Pirates decide to attack. Either Luffy nor Zoro manage to beat them. There are 2 minutes left for the huge fire and Robin escapes once again.

title: Mugiwara Kaizoku Dan Zenmetsu? Model Leopard no Kyoui
desc: The Galley-La company main building is set on fire and the CP9 members go after Franky, who is trying to make friends with Usopp. Aqua Laguna has arrived and both Luffy and Zoro have been thrown to the water.

title: Fune kara mo Aisareta Otoko! Usopp no Namida!
desc: Franky shows Usopp how inevitable the perish of the Going Merry is and the mysteries about the man who repaired the ship in Skypeia are revealed. The CP9 agents arrive to Franky's hidden warehouse.

title: Franky no Kako! Umi ressha ga Hashitta Hi
desc: CP9 agents discover an antique room in the warehouse. Memories awake while Franky tries to stop them before everything is destroyed: Tom's prosecution and the Umi Ressha's first trip.

title: Spandum no Inbou! Umi Ressha ga Yureta Hi
desc: Goverment CP5 agent Spandam frames Tom so he can freely investigate him and find Pluton's blueprints. The Fishman hands the plans to his apprentices and the beginning of Iceburg and Franky's enmity is revealed.

title: Densetsu no Otoko no Saigo! Umi Ressha ga Naita Hi
desc: Tom decides not to fight against the government and accepts to go to Eines Lobby in exchange of the exoneration of Iceburg and Franky. Franky can't bear the guilt and attacks Spandam, who is now CP9 boss.

title: Uragiri no Shinsou! Robin no Kanashiki Ketsui!
desc: The CP9 agents take Frany and Usopp and prepare the last-minute departure of the Umi Ressha. Meanwhile, Chopper rescues Pauly and Iceburg, who tells Nami the truth about Robin. Sanji's plan comes into action.

title: Nakama o Hikihanasu Kiteki! Hashiridasu Umi Ressha
desc: Chopper goes to search the city looking for Luffy and Zoro while Nami rushes to the train station. The Umi Ressha departs earlier than expected due to the Aqua Laguna and Sanji decides to sneak in.

title: Sanji Totsunyuu! Arashi no Naka no Umiressha Battle!
desc: Sanji is spotted by the agents in the last wagon and forced to fight. The Aqua Laguna is arriving and Pauly prevents Nami from drowning. She goes looking for Luffy and find him stuck between two walls.

title: Nisemono no Iji! Kokoro no Hanrangun Kamyu!
desc: Straw Hat crew helps Vivi testing a group of men pretending to be Rebel Army who guard a small village.

title: Hanrangun Senshi Kouza! Vivi ni Chikatta Yume!
desc: Luffy and crew take a break for lunch in the desert, and Vivi reveals her past with Kohza, the leader of the Rebel Army.

title: Kagerou no Kettou! Ace vs Otoko Scorpion
desc: Ace pursues a bounty hunter who claims he has defeated Blackbeard, only to find that it is a total lie. Ace concludes that Blackbeard isn't in Alabasta and leaves Luffy's crew.

title: Iseki to Mayoigo! Vivi to Nakama to Kuni no Katachi
desc: Luffy, Zoro, and Chopper get lost in the desert.

title: Spiders Cafe ni 8-ji Teki Kanbu Shuugou
desc: Baroke Work's teams 1,2, and 4 meet at the Spider's Cafe to await for the meeting with Mr 0. They are carried to the Rain Dinner casino where Crocodile reveals his identity. Meanwhile, Luffy's crew meets with Toto, Kohza's father.

title: Luffy Tai Vivi! Nakama ni Kakeru Namida no Chikai
desc: Luffy and Vivi fight against each other when Luffy says that Vivi's idea to stop the rebellion is naive and the only way to solve the problem in Arabasta is by defeating the Crocodile.

title: Alabasta Sensen! Yume no Machi Rainbase
desc: Instead of trying to stop the Rebel Army to war against the kingdom's Army, Straw Hat's crew decides to go after Crocodile at Rainbase, only to meet with Smoker and Tashigi once more and fall right into Crocodile's trap.

title: Zettai Zetsumei no Wana! Rain Dinners Totsunyuu
desc: Most of Straw Hat's crew is trapped along with Smoker by Crocodile. Vivi and a royal guardian, Pell, fight against Miss All Sunday.

title: Utopia Sakusen Hatsudou! Ugokidashita Uneri
desc: Operation Utopia is set into motion. With his devil fruit's ability, Mr. 2 impersonates King Cobra and orders the destruction of Nanohana. Enraged, Rebel Army begins to move.

title: Kyoufu no Bananawani to Mr. Prince
desc: Vivi tries desperately to get the key of the cage that traps most of Craw Hat crew from the humongous crocodiles known as Bananawani. Meanwhile, someone contacts Crocodile and introduces himself as Mr. Prince.

title: Nami Tamashii no Sakebi! Mugiwara no Luffy Fukkatsu!
desc: Nami and Chopper find Luffy and Zoro and struggle to rescue them. Zoro recovers his Sandai Kitetsu and breaks the chimney, while Luffy tears two buildings apart. The crew is gathered and Nami reveals the truth about Robin.

title: Mou Hitotsu no Umi Ressha! Rocketman Shutsugeki
desc: The Straw Hat Crew goes to an abandoned warehouse where old Kokoro shows them another train, the Rocket Man. They find Iceburg, who has been setting it up, and depart to chase the Umi Ressha.

title: Nakama o Sukue! Tekidoushi ga Musunda Chikai no Kizuna!
desc: The Franky Family joins the Straw Hat pirates when the Rocket Man is leaving the city, and in the way Pauly and two more shipwrights appear in the train. Tree teams must work together to defeat CP9.

title: Nami o Kudake! Luffy to Zoro no Saikyou Combo
desc: In order to avoid the dangerous wave that's coming ahead, Luffy and Zoro join their forces. Sanji and Franky are decided to go after Robin but Usopp considers that it's not his duty. In exchange, a mysterious hero appears.

title: Nazo no Otoko Toujou!? Sono Na wa Sogeking!
desc: Sanji, Franky and mysterious Sogeking mock T-Bone and his men and release their wagon, leaving them behind. The friends meet master Okama Kempo and Sanji bid them to move forward.

title: Kokku Taiketsu! Sanji vs Ramen Kenpou
desc: Sanji is forced to use his hands in the battle against chef Ramen Kempo, who has build himself a noodle armor. The Straw Hat chef uses knifes in order to defeat him.

title: Yane no Ue no Kettou! Franky VS Nero
desc: Cybor man Franky is in danger when new CP9 agent Nero discovers his weak point. He adopts a centaur shape and beats him against the train's roof.

title: Gekitotsu! Onigiri Zoro VS Funekiri T-Bone
desc: The Rocket Man and his people spots a halved Sea King and Zoro decides to fight against the responsible. T-Bone is running through Umi Ressha rails towards Puffing Tom when he sees the light coming towards him.

title: Robin Soudatsusen! Sogeking no Kisaku!!
desc: The Rocket Man meet a strange toad in the middle of the road, while Sanji, Franky and Sogeking manage to take Robin and split the wagons. Robin insists upon going to Enies Lobby but Sanji begs her to return with the crew.

title: Shihou no shima! Enies Lobby!
desc: The Rocket Man train is diverted from the rails due to Yokozuna's rage but old Kokoro calms him and the Kaeru joins the crew. Franky Family finds Sanji and Sogeking. Puffing Tom arrives to Enies Lobby.

title: Jouriku Sakusen Shidou! Mugiwara Ichimi Totsunyuu Seyo!
desc: The Straw Hat pirates, Franky Family, Galley-La shipwrights and Sogeking prepare their strategy to land in Enies Lobby, but Luffy can't wait and rushes on his own. The battles commences sooner than expected.

title: Luffy Kaishingeki! Shihou no Shima de Daikessen!!
desc: The Franky Family along with the shipwrights manage to open the first gate and make it to the main entrance though two brother giants, Oimo and Kashi, stop them. The Straw Hat crew is waiting and Luffy has an army in front of him.

title: Kyojinzoku to no Koubou! Daini no Tobira o Akero!
desc: Kashi the giant is defeated when the King Bulls arrive to the main entrance and only Oimo is left. Luffy avoids unnecessary fight with the marines and heads to the Headquarters. The Straw Hat crew's time has come.

title: Katsuro o Hirake! Sora o Tobu Rocketman!
desc: The main team has arrived. Bending the outside fence of the island inward, Rocketman uses it as a ramp and flies through the first and second gates.

title: Luffy ni Oitsuke! Mugiwara Ichimi Souryokusen
desc: Straw Hat Pirates and ally engage into battles everywhere on the main island while they are trying to catch up with Luffy.

title: Uragirareta Robin! Sekai Seifu no Omowaku!
desc: Spandam plans on taking the Straw Hat Pirates prisoner despite his agreement with Robin to leave Straw Hat Pirates alone if she surrenders herself to the government.

title: Robin o Kaese! Luffy VS Blueno!
desc: Luffy slingshots himself to the top part of the courthouse, where Blueno stands waiting for him.

title: Tachidomaru na! Hangeki no Noroshi o Agero!
desc: Luffy fights against Blueno in the Palace's roof while the Straw Hat Crew receives help from Sogeking and the giants. CP9 agents Kaku and Califa are congratulated with two Akuma No Mi.

title: Luffy Mokuzen! Saibansho Mae hiroba e Shuuketsu Seyo
desc: The Straw Hat Crew arrives to the foot of the main gate, on the roof of which Luffy is fighting with Blueno. In order to protect his nakama, the captain unravels new amazing abilities.

title: Subete wa Nakama o Mamoru Tame ni! Gear Second Hatsudou
desc: Nami, Zoro, Chopper and Sanji are approaching the main island's limit and the Franky crew must pull down the levers of the bridge. Luffy demonstrates his strength and Robin hears him approach.

title: Kotaero Robin! Mugiwara Ichimi no Sakebi!!
desc: Zoro gets lost in the palace and decides to open a hole in the ceiling. His attack draws Nami and Chopper with it and together they get to the roof. Sanji kicks his way up and Sogeking is thrown by Kashi. The gang reunites again.

title: Robin no Kako! Akuma to Yobareta Shoujo!
desc: CP9 boss Spandam threatens Robin with the Buster Call and her sorrowful memories arise. As a girl, always disrespected by her people, she met Saul the giant, who awakes laugh in her. 4 days later, a mysterious visit arrives.

title: Shukumei no Oyako! Sono Haha no Na wa Orubia!
desc: Saul realizes he knows Robin's mother and warns her about the imminent danger. Olvia talks to the archaeologists and goes after 20-year-ago CP9 captain. The world government sets the ancient library on fire and Saul runs to take Robin with him.

title: Ohara no Higeki! Buster Call no Kyoufu
desc: The Ohara archaeologists tell their theory about what they think that happened during the Lost Century. The Buster Call is summoned and the Tree of Knowledge is set on fire. Robin is rescued by Saul, the ex vice admiral.

title: Ikitai to Ie! Oretachi wa Nakama Da!!
desc: Since she was 8, Robin's life has been a constant struggle to survive. Everybody has told her that her existence was a crime, and now Luffy begs her to stay alive.

title: Taki ni Mukatte Tobe!! Luffy no Omoi!!
desc: A summary of Luffy's backstory.

title: Otoko no Ikizama! Zoro no Waza, Usopp no Yume
desc: A summary of Zoro and Usopp's backstory.

title: Namida ga Tsumuida Nakama no Kizuna! Nami no Sekai Chizu
desc: A summary of Nami's backstory.

title: Wakare ga Otoko o Migaku! Sanji to Chopper
desc: A summary of Sanji and Chopper's backstory.

title: Subete wa Nakama no Tame ni! Yami no Naka no Robin!
desc: A summary of Robin's backstory, as well as the reasons of her recent actions.

title: Sekkeizu wa Watasanai! Franky no Ketsudan
desc: Franky decides to burn the blueprint he holds all this time in front of Spandam. Straw Hat Pirates crosses into the Tower of Law with Rocketman.

title: Itsutsu no Kagi o Ubae! Mugiwara Ichimi Tai CP9
desc: The key to open the seastone handcuff on Robin is owned by 5 members of CP9. Thus, each Straw Hat Pirate and Franky engages themselves into battle against CP9. Meanwhile, Spandam and Lucci takes Robin to Gates of Justice through a secret passage.

title: Akuma no Mi no Chikara! Kaku to Jabra Daihenshin
desc: Zoro encounters Kaku, while Usopp tries to steal a key from sleeping Jabura. Both are the user of Zoan-type devil fruits, enable Kaku turns into a giraffe and Jabura turns into a wolf.

title: Shinde mo Keran! Sanji Otoko no Kishidou!
desc: Sanji encounters Kalifa, and because of his vow to rather die than kick a woman, he is defeated easily. Seeing Sanji being defeated and in a horrible condition, Nami decides to take over and fights against Kalifa.

title: Fukurou no Gosan! Ore no Cola wa Inochi no Mizu!
desc: Franky gets into a fist fight with Fukuro.

title: Zoro Shinwaza Sakuretsu! Katana no Na wa Sogeking?
desc: Accidentally, Zoro and Usopp get handcuffed together and neither Jabura nor Kaku has the right key to open the handcuff. Thus, Zoro is forced to fight them both by using Usopp as his sword.

title: Seigyo Funou! Chopper Kindan no Rumble
desc: Chopper struggles against Kumadori, and he has reached his limit in using Rumble Balls. But it is impossible for him to win without the power given by his Rumble Ball. So Chopper decides to use Rumble Balls once more and goes totally berserk.

title: Luffy Oyabun Futatabi! Yume ka Utsutsu ka Tomikuji Soudou
desc: In Grand Jipangu in Edo period, a little girl named Rika takes care of an ill man whom she calls Tot-san. Assuming Rika as the daughter, Buggy the Clown kidnaps her. Luffy comes to rescue her.

title: Uwasa no Kaizokugari! Sasurai no Kenshi Zoro
desc: In his quest to repair his katana, Zoro defeats two brother pirates.

title: Niji-iro no Kiri Densetsu! Ruluka Tou no Roujin Henzo
desc: The gang lands in Ruluka island, where they meet old professor Henzo and his lifetime studies about the Rainbow Mist. Sanji fights the son of current mayor Wetton.

title: Eien no Kuni no Juunin! Pumpkin Kaizokudan!
desc: Luffy, Zoro, Ussop, Nico and Professor Henzo enter the Rainbow Mist where they find the Pumpkin Pirates. Meanwhile, Nami, Chopper and Sanji find out that the Going Merry is gone and decide to go after it.

title: Furusato e no Omoi! Dasshutsu Funou no Kaizoku Hakaba!
desc: Henzo makes friends with the pumpkin pirates but Rapanui remains distrustful. Luffy and friends try to find the way out from the Rainbow Mist while Nami sails to help them. Sanji and Chopper prepare to fight Wetton's people.

title: Ransen Hisshi! Wetton no Yabou to Niji no Tou
desc: Whetton has the large tower in the city falls into the Rainbow Mist, creating a bridge that connects both world. He and his men then cross the bridge to take the treasures inside.

title: Soshite Densetsu ga Hajimaru! Iza Niji no Kanata e
desc: The end of Whetton's tax run.

title: Ubawareta Log! Salvage-ou Mashira!
desc: In order to find the way to the mythical sky island, Skypiea, the Straw Hat Pirates must explore a sunken ship, working around the King of Salvagers, Masira, as well as the dangerous beasts of the deep.

title: Kaibutsu Toujou! Shirohige Ichimi ni wa Te o Dasuna
desc: As if escaping the jaws of a giant sea turtle and dealing with an infuriated Masira weren't enough, the crew also has to contend with monsters that reach up to the sky and blot out the sun! In the meantime, Buggy and his crew have to put up with Portgas D. Ace, second in command to the dangerous Whitebeard!

title: Yume o Miruna! Azakeri no Machi Mock Town!
desc: The Straw Hat Crew arrives to Jaya and Luffy, Zoro and Nami walk into town to find information about the Sky Island, but on the way they meet $55.000.000-reward pirate Bellamy who mocks about their quest.

title: Kaizoku no Takami! Yume o Kataru Otoko to Kaitei Tansaku Ou
desc: Luffy and Zoro are beaten by Bellamy so they and Nami go back to the ship. Robin finds information about the Sky Island and the crew departs, but they are confronted with pirate Shojo.

title: Densetsu no Ichizoku! "Usotsuki Norland"
desc: Luffy and his friends meet Cricket Montblanc, the great-great-grandchild of Norland the Lier, and he tells them the story about the City of Gold.

title: Kumo Kaji Ippai! Southbird o Oe!
desc: The crew is ordered by Cricket to find a Southbird, because otherwise they will not be able to orient in the open sea. Bellamy arrives at the diver's house.

title: Yume wa Kanawanai!? Bellamy VS Saruyama Rengou
desc: Bellamy steals the Sarumaya Alliance gold while the crew is hunting a Southbird. Luffy goes after Bellamy.

title: Ichioku no Otoko! Sekai Saikou Kenryoku to Kaizoku Kurohige
desc: Luffy defeats Bellamy and recovers Cricket's gold.

title: Fune wa Sora o Yuku! Knock-Up Stream ni Nore
desc: The Gold Merry is repaired and the crew sails to meet the Knock Up Stream and find the Sky Island. Blackbeard goes after Luffy.

title: Koko wa Sora no Umi! Sora no Kishi to Tengoku no Mon
desc: wandering trough the Sea of the Sky, the crew meets Gan Fall, the Knight of the Sky. He saves them from the attack of a treasure hunter. Later, they find the way up to the White White Sea.

title: Kami no Kuni Skypiea! Kumo no Nagisa no Tenshi-tachi
desc: The Straw Hat Crew arrives to Skypiea, where they meet angels Conis and her father Pagaya. Nami gets lost while trying to drive the Waver.

title: Kindan no Seichi! Kami no Sumu Shima to Ten no Sabaki!
desc: Nami meets some mysterious warriors in the Forbidden Island while Pagaya tries to repair the old Waver the crew found in the Lower World. The White Berets go after the pirates for their illegal enter into Skypiea.

title: Hayaku mo Hanzaisha!? Skypiea no Hou no Bannin
desc: The White Berets try to force the crew to pay the fee while Nami is returning from the Forbidden Island. They fight and defeat the Berets and become class 2 criminals.

title: Oshiro de Mochimaki Dai Race! Akai Hana no Inbou
desc: The Great Mochimaki Race, a festival about who can catch a Mochimaki with a great treasure inside, is running, but Buggy has a conspiracy for stealing the treasure before the festival starts.

title: Awa Tsukai Kalifa! Nami ni Semaru Sekken no Wana
desc: Chopper in his Monster Point easily defeats Kumadori. Nami has trouble with Kalifa's Devil fruit. Meanwhile, Luffy finally catches up with Spandam, Rob Lucci, and Nico Robin.

title: Hibikiwataru Kyouhou! Hatsudou Buster Call
desc: While bragging to Nico Robin, Spandam accidentally invokes the Buster Call. Meanwhile, the rematch between Monkey D. Luffy and Rob Lucci finally begins.

title: Gonin no Nami? Hangeki wa Shinkirou to Tomo ni!
desc: As the battle between the Straw Hats and CP9 rages on. Nami finds a weakness of Kalifa's ability: water. After returning herself to normal, she then uses her Perfect Clima-tact to duplicate herself by five.

title: Nami no Ketsudan! Bousou Chopper o Ute!
desc: Nami ends her fight with Kalifa. Franky shoots Chopper down into the sea, while Zoro and Sogeking are set free.

title: Kariudo Sanji Toujou? Usotsuki Ookami ni Okuru Banka
desc: Sogeking gets beaten up by Jabra and is saved at the last second by Sanji, who then fights Jabra. While Zoro and Kaku continue their fight, Franky tries to catch up with Robin.

title: Shakunetsu no Keri! Sanji Ashiwaza no Full Course
desc: Sanji seems to be at a disadvantage due to the active use of Tekkai Kenpo by Jabra, however he uses various kicks from a newly introduced technique called "Diable Jambe", which he uses to finish off Jabra.

title: Hakujin no Moushuu! Zoro Tai Kaku Kyouryoku Zangeki Taiketsu
desc: The battle between Zoro and Kaku rages on. Meanwhile Franky finally reaches Luffy.

title: Kishin Zoro! Kihaku ga Miseta Asura no Keshin
desc: Zoro finally defeats Kaku with his new technique, Asura, meanwhile Luffy activates Gear Second in his fight against Rob Lucci, who in turn transforms into his half-leopard form.

title: Spandam Kyougaku! Shihou no Tou ni Tatsu Eiyuu
desc: Robin finds out that Spandam is the son of Spandine, the man who invoked the Buster Call on Ohara. Sogeking snipes Spandam with his Kabuto and saves Robin, while Franky releases her Seastone handcuffs.

title: Robin Kaihou! Luffy Tai Lucci Choujou Kessen
desc: Nico Robin and Franky take down some Marines, and while the fight between Luffy and Rob Lucci continues, the Gear Second effect finishes.

title: Hannin wa Luffy Oyabun? Kieta Oozakura o Oe
desc: The sakura are blooming and a festival is to be celebrated the next day. But, Ninjin is sick and cannot go to the festival. That makes Chopper and Luffy feel really sad.

title: Katenakya Daremo Mamorenai! Gear Third Shidou
desc: The battle between Lucci and Luffy rages on. As Luffy's anger grows, he activates a new technique, Gear Third, in the battle against Lucci.

title: Senritsu no Kako! Yami no Seigi to Rob Lucci
desc: A closer look at Rob Lucci's merciless past.

title: Maboroshi no Ningyo Arawaru? Usureyuku Ishiki no Naka de
desc: Franky protects Robin from Spandam's elephant sword and a mysterious mermaid appears and saves Sanji, Zono, Nami, Chopper and Usopp.

title: Houka ni Shizumu Shima! Franky Munen no Sakebi
desc: Enies Lobby is raged by fire and Franky farewells his nakama. Luffy prepares his decisive attack against Rucchi.

title: Luffy o Mate! Tamerai no Hashi no Shitou!
desc: The Straw Hat Crew prepares to defend the ship at the Hesitation Bridge from the attack of the Marines. Luffy is fighting with Rucchi and he is running out of strength.

title: Kobushi ni Kometa Omoi! Luffy Konshin no Gatling
desc: "Luffy Vs Lucci: The Final Round". On the Hesitation Bridge, Zoro and rest of The Straw Hat Crew engage marines.

title: Tomo, Umi yori Kitaru! Mugiwara Ichimi Saikyou no Kizuna
desc: Luffy, after finally defeating Rob Lucci, is unable to move after his battle. The Franky Family, along with the Galley-La Company, Yokozuna, Oimo and Kashi are still alive after their Buster Call encounter. When all hope seems lost, the Straw Hats hear a familiar voice that tells them to jump into the sea; the voice belongs to the Going Merry.

title: Zen'in Dai Dasshutsu! Shousha no Michi wa Kaizoku no Tame ni
desc: Monkey D. Luffy is a boy on a path to becoming the Pirate king.

title: Arigatou Merry! Yuki ni Kemuru Wakare no Umi
desc: The crew must finally say goodbye to their ship merry.

title: Yaburareta Ansoku! Ai no Kobushi o Motsu Kaigun Chuujou
