desc: Upon their return from Enies Lobby, the Straw Hats rest in Water 7, where their new ship is being built by Franky and the Galley-La Company. Suddenly, they are attacked by Marine Vice-Admiral Garp, whom Luffy calls Grandpa.

title: Saikyou no Kakei? Akasareta Luffy no Chichi!
desc: Revelations continue as Garp sheds light on Luffy's early childhood, the whereabouts of Shanks, and the identity of Luffy's father, Monkey D. Dragon. Meanwhile, two young marines, under the Vice-Admiral's command, have a joyful reunion with members of the Straw Hats.

title: Sono Na wa Shinsekai! Grand Line no Yukue
desc: While everybody is busy celebrating their huge victory at Enies Lobby, Robin is confronted by Aokiji.

title: Shanks Ugoku! Bousou Suru Jidai e no Kusabi
desc: Shanks meets up with Whitebeard despite all the efforts made by the World Government to avoid it. His main reason for the meeting: a request to stop Ace from chasing after his former-crew mate Blackbeard.

title: Yagara o Sagasu Shoujo! Mizu no Miyako Daisousasen
desc: While walking around Water 7, Luffy and Chopper meet a young girl named Abi, who's searching for her pet Aobire that has been missing during the Aqua Laguna incident.

title: Haha wa Tsuyoshi! Zoro no Dotabata Kaji Tetsudai
desc: After being denied from various Sword Shops to get Yubashiri repaired, Zoro is tricked into becoming the new "Big Brother" to the Family of Aunt.

title: Sanji Shougeki! Nazo no Jii-san to Gekiuma Ryouri
desc: While out shopping with Chimney, Sanji is persuaded by her to go to a good cook, whom she calls grandpa. The old man teaches Sanji the reason why his food tastes so good, salt which is produced by the Aqua Laguna.

title: Tsui ni Zen'in Shoukin Kubi! 6-okugoe no Ichimi!
desc: While Usopp plots to get back in the Straw Hat Pirates, Franky, Iceburg and the Galley-La foremen are hard at work putting the finishing touches on the new ship.

title: Umi o Nozomu Hyakujuu no Ou! Yume no Fune Doudou Kansei!
desc: Soon after Sanji, Nami, and Chopper complain and object their new bounties, the Straw Hat Pirates depart to see Iceburg and their new ship.

title: Saraba Itoshiki Kobun-tachi! Franky Tatsu
desc: Franky has chased his swim briefs to the Straw Hats' new ship , but still refuses to go with them, necessitating some extra..."persuasion" from Robin and Iceburg .

title: Shukkou Mizu no Miyako! Otoko Usopp Kettou no Kejime
desc: The departure of the Straw Hats from Water 7 is hastened when Vice Admiral Garp, under watch from Aokiji, comes to attack them. Usopp has to do some soul-searching to realize what he really needs to do to rejoin the crew.

title: Meguru Tehaisho! Kokyou wa Odoru Fune wa Susumu!
desc: The Thousand Sunny finally gets its name and the Straw Hat Pirates make their getaway from Vice Admiral Garp as their hometowns get word of their new bounties.

title: Saikyou no Nouryoku! Ace o Osou Kurohige no Yami
desc: Three days before Luffy left Water 7, Ace finally catches up to Blackbeard on Banaro Island, but his attempt to fight him reveals Teach's darkest secret: the control of the Yami Yami no Mi, said to be the most evil of the Devil Fruits.

title: Nazo no Kaizoku Goikkou! Sunny-gou to Kiken na Wana
desc: After departing Water 7, the Straw Hats find a lone ship, badly damaged with no sail and flag. They decide to approach to check if everything is all right.

title: Sunny-gou Pinch! Unare Chousoku no Himitsu Mecha
desc: The Straw Hats find themselves surrounded by a fleet of Marine ships, which is actually a trap. They escape using the Soldier Dock System, with the tattered pirate ship in tow.

title: Shinsekai ni Shizumu Yume! Shitsui no Kaizoku Puzzle
desc: Trapped by moving icebergs, the Straw Hats try to figure a way out avoiding numerous dangers as the Bounty Hunters draw closer. The captain of the Phoenix Pirates, Puzzle awakens after Chopper's treatment.

title: Osoikuru Shikaku-tachi! Hyoujou Dai Battle Kaishi
desc: Using the Shark Submerge III, Nami and Franky find out that penguins are moving the icebergs. Afterwards, they are attacked by Hockera. Usopp and Sanji are knocked off the Thousand Sunny by an iceberg,

title: Dai Kusen Mugiwara Ichimi! Hata ni Kakeru Kaizoku Tamashii
desc: The fights continue with Luffy, distracted due to the lost flag, has initial trouble with Brindo, but the Phoenix Pirates help capture him.

title: Atsukurushisa Zenkai! Semaru Futago no Jiryoku Power
desc: The fight against the Accino brothers continues while Zoro accidentally arrives to Lovely Land and meets Papa.

title: Dai Konran no Yakata! Ikaru Don to Toraware no Ichimi
desc: Zoro, Nami, Sanji, Usopp and Franky gather in the ice cell where the Accino brothers left them. Robin manages Lil to get them coke and Franky sets them free. Luffy and Chopper head to Lovely land.

title: Fushichou Futatabi! Tomo ni Chikau Kaizokuki no Yume
desc: The crew decides to fool Luffy so they can recover the flag. Robin and Zoro go for it but Robin gets into trouble, while the Accino family is defeated. Don Accino goes mad when he sees his children beaten.

title: Atsu Atsu Choukessen! Luffy VS Shakunetsu no Don
desc: The crew goes into the mansion to get the flag back while Luffy finds a way to fight Don Accino. Robin gives Lil hope.

title: Shin Sekai de Matsu! Isamashiki Kaizoku to no Wakare
desc: Luffy defeats Don Accino while the crew succeeds in the restoring of the flag before Luffy notices. Campaccino comes for revenge and the Straw Hat pirates farewell the Phoenix.

title: Shutsudou Chopperman! Mamore Nagisa no TV-kyoku
desc: The adventures of Chopperman the hero and his battle against evil Usodabada.

title: Mogan tai Rufi! Nazo no Bishojo wa Dare?
desc: Luffy convinces Zoro to join her crew, but they must defeat Captain Morgan first. Meanwhile, Koby is accepted as a marine.

title: Dasshutsu Naru ka!? Ugokihajimeta Kami no Shiren!
desc: While the crew is preparing to leave Skypeia, Luffy, Ussop and Sanji go back to Pagaya's house seeking food and materials. The ship is trapped by a giant crab, and carried to the Upper Yard.

title: Lovely-doori no Wana! Zennounaru God Enel
desc: Conis reveals her true intentions and Enel unleash his rage. Luffy, Sanji and Usopp sail towards the Upper Yard.

title: Susume Karasumaru! Ikenie no Saidan o Mezase
desc: Luffy, Sanji and Usopp sail along the Milky Road and face different kinds of traps. The rest of the crew is caught at the Sacrificial Altar, where Chopper repairs the Going Merry while Robin, Zoro and Nami go into the sacred jungle.

title: Seizonritsu 10%! Mantra-tsukai no Shinkan Satori!
desc: Luffy, Sanji and Usopp meet Priest Satori and his balls. The crow boat is lost and the crew must defeat Satori and find the boat before is too late.

title: "Tama no Shiren" no Kyoui! Mayoi no Mori no Shitou
desc: Robin finds a trail hidden under the moss, while one of the Sacred Priests visits Chopper at the Altar. The fight against Satori continues.

title: Chopper Ayaushi! Motokami Tai Shinkan Shura
desc: Gan Fall arrives to rescue Chopper from evil Priest Shura. Robin finds a pit within some ruins. Satori prepares a great surprise for Luffy.

title: Makafushigi! Himo no Shiren to Koi no Shiren!?
desc: Luffy and Sanji manages to defeat Satori. Meanwhile, Gan Fall is defeated and falls to the water. Even though he knows he can't swim, Chopper jumps into the water to save him.

title: Shandra no Hi o Tomose! Senshi Wiper
desc: Chopper and Gan Fall are saved by the Southbirds, and they tell Chopper that Gan Fall is actually the God of Skypiea. Meanwhile, Nami, Zoro and Robin find out the truth why Upper Yard is a soil island.

title: Tenkuu no Ougonkyou Jaya! Mezase Kami no Yashiro!
desc: The Shandians, lead by Wyper, begins to attack the Upper Yard. After knowing the truth about the island and being reunited, Straw Hat crew decide to search for the gold on the island.

title: Ougon Zen'yasai! "Vearth" e no Omoi!
desc: Straw Hat Crew sets a camp at the Upper Yard and discusses the plan for retrieving the gold. Gan Fall who is taken care of by Chopper finally wakes up and tells them all the history of Upper Yard.

title: God Enel Toujou!! Ikinokori e no Aubade
desc: God Enel shows himself in front of his priests, foreseeing the incoming war between Shandia, priests, and pirates from Blue Sea (a.k.a Straw Hat crew) at the Upper Yard.

title: Ma no Umi Totsunyuu! Kiri ni Ukabu Nazo no Gaikotsu
desc: The crew is surrounded by a dense fog and they meet skeleton Brook, who tells them his sad story.

title: Hito ni Aeta Yorokobi! Gaikotsu Shinshi no Shoutai
desc: Onboard the Thousand Sunny, Brook tells his story of being a musician before being killed. However, his spirit was able to reanimate his skeleton due to the power of the Yomi Yomi no Mi.

title: Kai Genshou Zokuzoku! Thriller Bark Jouriku
desc: After getting stranded at Thriller Bark, Chopper, Nami, and Usopp are chased by a three headed beast. Back on the boat, Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hats are terrorized by an unseen enemy!

title: Tensai to Yobareta Otoko! Hogback Arawaru!
desc: Chopper, Nami, and Usopp get scared out of their minds when they encounter a graveyard full of zombies! Meanwhile, the rest of the crew gets trapped in super creepy sea web!

title: Nami Dai Pinch! Zombie Yashiki to Toumei Ningen
desc: Nami, Usopp and Chopper meet Dr Hogback and they spend a crazy night in his castle. The rest of the crew is crossing the forest in order to rescue them.

title: Zombie no Nazo! Akumu no Hogback Kenkyuujo
desc: Escaping from the Surprise Zombies of the mansion, Nami, Chopper and Usopp discover the truth about Cindry's identity and Dr. Hogback's experiments before being approached by a mysterious samurai zombie with Brook's voice.

title: Sono Na wa Moriah! Kage o Nigiru Dai Kaizoku no Wana
desc: After beating the zombies, the Straw Hat Pirates learn that one of the Shichibukai, Gekko Moriah, has been stealing people's shadows and using them to revive zombies.

title: Zombie Song no Kyouen! Youchi no Kane wa Yami no Oto
desc: Usopp, Chopper, and Nami get trapped in a coffin after being slashed by a zombie samurai. Meanwhile, Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hats make short work of some haunted paintings!

title: Doubutsu Ippai? Perona no Wonder Garden
desc: After awakening the General Zombies, Absalom is accosted by Lola, a zombie warthog obsessed with making him her husband. After learning that he's chosen Nami to be his bride, Lola sets her sights on the navigator.

title: Kieru Mugiwara Ichimi! Arawareta Nazo no Kenshi!
desc: The three remaining Straw Hats are lured by Buhichuck into a room where they are forced to face an army of armored General Zombies, but are able to handle them until the zombies are joined by a strange swordsman named Jigoro.

title: Nokoru Kishidou! Nami o Mamoru Uragiri Zombie
desc: A penguin zombie starts acting an awful lot like Sanji, Nami continues running for her life, and Robin and Franky buy some time by blowing up a bridge!

title: Sora kara Sanjou! Kenkyou Hanauta wa Ano Otoko!
desc: Nami gives love advice to a zombie, Luffy finds himself face-to-face with Gecko Moria, and Robin gets caught in spooky spider web. Things look bleak for the Straw Hats until their skeleton friend lends a hand!

title: Luffy Kinkyuujitai! Saikyou no Kage no Ikisaki
desc: Brook strikes the final blow in his battle with the spider monkey, Gecko Moria's devious plan is revealed, and Luffy's escape attempt leads to the loss of something he can't live without!

title: Majin to Yobareta Senshi!! Oz Fukkatsu no Toki
desc: With Luffy's shadow, Moria and his followers head into the freezer holding his ultimate special zombie that he believes will help him gain power in the New World. At the same time Brook parts ways from Franky and Robin after giving further crucial advice regarding the zombies so he can go forth to defeat the zombie Ryuma and reclaiming his shadow from the samurai fencer.

title: 500-nenburi no Mezame!! Oars Kaigan!!
desc: Luffy's shadow is forced into the body of a monster, Usopp and Chopper get incinerated, and Nami is kidnapped by a zombie who wants to make her his wife!

title: Shinnen no Inochigoi!! Afro o Mamoru Brook
desc: Brook confronts Ryuma, recalling his time on Thriller Bark five years prior - and his first battle with Ryuma and how he lost to a zombie with his own shadow.

title: Otoko no Chikai wa Shinazu!! Tooi Sora de Matsu Tomo e
desc: Usopp, Chopper, Robin, and Franky return to the Thousand Sunny, discovering their ship had been ransacked but Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji returned to them without their shadows.

title: Kanarazu Ai ni Iku!! Brook to Yakusoku no Misaki
desc: Luffy, Usopp, Sanji, and Zoro tell the rest of the crew how they got to meet Laboon as they started their new journey, while Brook reflects on his promise to return to Laboon amidst his duel with Ryuma.

title: Meshi to Nami to Kage!! Luffy Ikari no Daihangeki
desc: Luffy sets out to regain his shadow and convince Brook to join the crew. Meanwhile, Sanji races to stop Nami's zombie wedding before it's too late!

title: Usopp Saikyou? Negative wa Makasetoke
desc: Luffy continues to take on Moriah while Chopper and Robin remain behind to take on Hogback and his loyal zombie servants.

title: General Zombie Shunsatsu!! Oars wa Bouken Kibun!!
desc: Usopp continues to stand up to Perona's Negative Hollows while wiping out Wild Zombies, while Brook is held at the mercy of Ryuma, who finally proves his superiority over the original by defeating the skeleton in battle before Zoro arrival.

title: Honoo no Knight Sanji!! Keritsubuse Itsuwari no Kyoshiki
desc: Luffy attempts to attack Gekko Moriah, but instead is forced to face his shadow clone: Doppelman, while Usopp continues to maneuver around the Wild Zombies to get to Perona only to now face Kumashi's wrath.

title: Suke Suke no Innen? Ubawareta Sanji no Yume
desc: Sanji finally gets to the chapel where Absalom is about to marry Nami, where he reveals his dreams. Usopp is still trying to catch the Ghost Princess, while Luffy can't get rid of Moria's shadow.

title: Tasukete Hero!? Teki wa Fujimi no Princess
desc: Usopp evades Kumashi and keeps chasing Perona, but she seems to be untouchable. Sogeking comes to help him and together they discover the Ghost Princess' weak point.

title: Perona Kyoufu!? Uso no U wa Usopp no U
desc: Usopp defeats Perona using his negativeness and his lies. Sanji and Luffy's zombies finally surrender to Moria. Battle between Zoro and Brook's zombie seems to be through.

title: Yane ni Mau Zangeki!! Kecchaku Zoro Tai Ryuuma
desc: Zoro defeats Ryuma and the former samurai gives him his sword. Oz is approaching while Luffy can not find a way to attack Moria.

title: Chopper Gekido!! Hogback Ma no Ijutsu
desc: Dr Hogback tells Chopper how he met Cindri. Chopper goes mad and bids Cindry to rebel against her zombie nature. Robin fools Hogback so he makes Sanji and Zoro's zombies fall from the tower. Luffy finally faces Oz.

title: Oz Hoeru!! Detekoi Mugiwara no Ichimi
desc: Moria's mansion is reduced to ruins as the zombie with Luffy's shadow stalks the Straw Hats! As the walls come tumbling down, Chopper puts the hurt on Hogback, and Nami vanishes right before Sanji's eyes!

title: Teki wa Luffy!! Saikyou Zombie Tai Mugiwara no Ichimi
desc: One by one, the Straw Hats attack Oars, but the monstrous zombie appears too powerful to be defeated. Luffy's got his sights set on Moria, but he'd better hurry if he wants to save his crew!

title: Taorero Absalom!! Nami Yuujou no Raigeki!!
desc: Absalom is about to kiss Nami when she wakes up and suddenly Lola appears and pretends to fight Nami so she can escape. Absalom falls under Nami's lightning bolt while the rest of the straw hat crew is gathering to stop Oz.

title: Ubae Down!! Hissatsu Mugiwara Docking?
desc: In order to fight Oz, Franky summons the docking strategy, but Robin won't cooperate. The crew must find a way to take down Oz all together. Perona's zombies find an unknown Kuma man in the Sunny.

title: Ashioto Naki Shuurai!! Nazo no Boumonsha: Boukun Kuma
desc: Battle to knock down Oz continues and Luffy finally realizes he was pursuing Moria's shadow. Nami meets Kuma the tyrant.

title: Oars Plus Moriah: Chikara to Zunou no Saikyou Gattai
desc: Figth against Oz continues while Luffy is returning to the mansion yard. Kuma tells Moria about the new Shichibukai Blackbeard. Moria joins Oz and he demonstrate his intelligence. Brooks appears carrying salt.

title: Gyakuten e no Hisaku: Nightmare Luffy Kenzan
desc: Luffy is returning to the mansion when he is stopped by a group of shadowless survivors. The straw hat pirates are in trouble while Moria seems to be winning the battle. Nightmaere Luffy must come into action.

title: Kaimetsu, Mugiwara Ichimi: Kagekage no Chikara Zenkai
desc: The crew makes its best to defeat the Special Zombie but they are overpowered by his force. Chopper finds a weak point when he deduces how Oz died. Only Zoro, Chopper and Nami are still standing.

title: Chouzetsu Battle Start! Luffy vs Luffy
desc: 100-shabow man Nightmare Luffy appears to save Nami and Usopp from certain death. He has only 10 minutes to defeat both Oz and Moria or otherwise the shadows will leave him. Kuma watches the battle in silence.

title: Kecchaku Semaru! Tatakikome, Todome no Ichigeki
desc: Oz stands up once again just to feel the power of the whole straw hat pirates. He is defeated and now the crew must face the power of 1000-shadow man Gecko Moria, while the sunrise is approaching.

title: Karada ga Kieru! Akumu no Shima ni Sasu Asahi!
desc: Luffy prepares his last attack against Moria and the shadows begin to abandon him. The first sun beams catch some pirates and the crew is running out of time. Final Gia Sado defeats Moria but it seems to be late.

title: Owaranai Kiki! Mugiwara Ichimi Massatsu Shirei
desc: All of Moriah's victims recover their shadows and celebrate regaining their ability to enter daylight.

title: Subete o Hajiku: Kuma no Nikyunikyu no Chikara
desc: Zoro attempts to fight Kuma, yet all of his attacks are effortlessly repelled. Kuma reveals that he has eaten the Nikyu Nikyu no Mi, which enables him to repel attacks and air at very high speed.

title: Nakama no Itami wa Waga Itami: Zoro Kesshi no Tatakai
desc: Zoro tries to stop Kuma from killing Luffy and Kuma offers Zoro a deal, he can take away Luffy's pain but he has to implant it in Zoro instead. Kuma tells him that he could die from all the pain but Zoro accept the offer without hesitation.

title: Tooi Hi no Yakusoku: Kaizoku no Uta to Chiisana Kujira
desc: Hogback and Absalom escape Thriller Bark with the unconscious Moriah, and reveal that Blackbeard gained his status as a Shichibukai by defeating Ace.

title: Brook no Kako: Youki na Nakama Kanashiki Wakare
desc: Brook recalls his past, when the whale Laboon started following his pirate ship and befriended the crew.

title: Binks no Sake: Kako to Genzai o Tsunagu Uta
desc: Brook continues to tell the tale of the Rumbar Pirates' fateful journey into the Grand Line, and the decision he made at the end of his original life.

title: Arata na Nakama! Ongakuka Hanauta no Brook
desc: Brook pledges himself to the Straw Hat Pirates, becoming their ninth member, as the crew settles their affairs at Thriller Bark and continue their journey.

title: Noronoro no Kyoui: Gingitsune no Foxy Futatabi
desc: The Straw Hat Pirates are taking a vacation at Spa Island, but there, they encounter Foxy and his crew, who are pursuing two small girls: Lina and her older sister, Sayo.

title: Otakara Daisoudatsusen! Houkai! Spa Island Gou
desc: In order to rescue Lina's sister, the crew destroys the Spa Island and look for the hot cross which is the clue to make the gems of Lina's father.

title: Burukku daifuntou shin no nakama e no michisagashi?
desc: Brook tries to help his new nakamas because he fears that otherwise he will be dispensed, but Robin tell him her story of Water 7 and he recovers his confidence.

title: Idainaru kouro hanshuu toutatsu! Akai tuchi no tairiku
desc: The Straw Hat Pirates are about to reach the Red Line but a terrible storm delays them. Log Pose is pointing downwards and the crew needs more information to get to Gyojin Island.

title: Mugiwara ichimi nikushi Tetsukamen no Dubaru toujou
desc: Camie and Pappag introduce themselves to the Straw Hats, who then later find out that their fishman friend has been kidnapped by Iron Mask Duval and the Macro Gang.

title: Innen no saikai! Toraware no gyonin o sukudase
desc: The mysterious Duval gets excited when the crew that rescued Camie turns out to be the Straw Hat Pirates.

title: Higeki! Kamen ni kakusareta Dubaru no shinjitsu
desc: The Straw Hat Pirates do battle with the Flying Fish Riders and Macro Fishman Pirates. The stakes rise when Duval reveals himself, and exactly who his grudge is against: Sanji.

title: Sakuretsu! Sanîgou no chouhimitsu heiki gaonhou
desc: Duval reveals that he was once a small-time bandit until Sanji's wanted poster came to light. Since then he hid his face with the iron mask until he could get revenge on Sanji.

title: Gyojin-tou o Mezashite Jouriku: Sabaody Shotou
desc: With the Flying Fish Riders taken care of, the Straw Hats rest as Hatchan treats them to the promised takoyaki.

title: Bougyaku! Sabaody no Shihaisha Tenryuubito
desc: After landing on the Sabaody Archipelago, the Straw Hats begin searching for a man Hatchan knows who can coat their ship, so they can continue onto Fishman Island.

title: Arata na Rival Shuuketsu! 11-nin no Choushinsei
desc: The Straw Hat Pirates fight and defeat some bounty hunters who want their bounty.

title: Hyouteki wa Camie!! Semaru Hitosaraiya no Mashu
desc: Departing from Shakky's Rip-off Bar, Luffy's group attempt to search for Rayleigh but is distracted by the Sabaody Park. Zoro is disrespectful to Saint Charlos, causing him to be shot at.

title: Camie o Sukue: Shotou ni Nokoru Ankoku no Rekishi
desc: Duval and his crew arrive on the Archipelago and start gathering the Straw Hats up to bring them to the Human Auctioning House, where the kidnappers have brought Camie.

title: Time Limit: Human Auction Kaimaku
desc: The human auction finally begins, and it is only then that the Straw Hats discovered that their mermaid friend is being sold off at Grove 1.

title: Tekken Sakuretsu! Auction o Buttsubuse
desc: The auction continues, but Saint Charlos arrives and ruins the Straw Hats' plan to buy Camie back by placing an exorbitant bid on her.

title: Dai Panic! Auction Kaijou no Shitou
desc: After Luffy punches Charlos, the guards begin to attack the Straw Hats, and most of the observers, except for Charlos' family, Kid and Law's crews, evacuate.

title: Taishou Kizaru Ugoku! Souzen Sabaody Shotou
desc: Sengoku dispatches Admiral Kizaru to defend the honor of the Celestial Dragons at Sabaody Archipelago.

title: Houimou o Toppa Seyo! Kaigun Tai Sannin no Senchou
desc: Luffy, Law and Kid's crews join the fight and defeat the rest of the Marines outside the Auction House. The three captains promise to meet and fight in the New World.

title: Roger to Rayleigh: Kaizoku Ou to Sono Migiude
desc: Upon arriving back at Shakky's Bar, Silvers Rayleigh reveals to the Straw Hats that he was the first mate of the legendary Gol D. Roger and also reveals the truth about his crew's dismissal.

title: Kaihi Fukanou!? Taishou Kizaru no Kousoku no Keri
desc: Admiral Kizaru appears at the Archipelago and demonstrates his mysterious light abilities, before taking on the Supernova, Basil Hawkins, whilst Urouge and X Drake fight a Pacifista.

title: Attouteki! Kaigun no Sentou Heiki Pacifista
desc: The Straw Hat Pirates fight one of the Pacifistas, and while it does not have Kuma's Devil Fruit powers, it is still able to withstand their strongest attacks.

title: Saranaru Kyouteki Arawaru! Masakari Katsuida Sentoumaru
desc: The Straw Hat Pirates combine their strongest attacks to defeat the Pacifista, but are exhausted after the battle.

title: Taishou Kizuru no Moukou Mugiwara Ichimi Zettaizetsumei!
desc: Usopp and Brook's attempt to attack Kizaru and save Zoro's life failed.

title: Kesareta Nakama-tachi: Mugiwara Ichimi Saigo no Hi
desc: Sentomaru reveals that Kuma has the ability to make people fly through the sky to far away places.

title: Jidaigeki Tokubetsu Hen: Luffy Oyabun Futatabi Kenzan
desc: In an alternate universe set in Edo period Japan, the Mikoshi (portable shrine) race is about to take place, the winner of which receives Beli1,000,000, and Boss Luffy and his friends recruit Franky to build them a mikoshi.

title: Jidaigeki Tokubetsu Hen: Yabure! Thriller Shoukai no Wana
desc: Robin reveals Brook's past to Luffy and his friends, and decide to help him. Brook is captured by Thriller LTD, but Luffy and Zoro arrive to help him escape.

title: Jouriku! Danshi Kinsei no Shima Amazon Lily
desc: Having been hit by Kuma, Luffy is teleported to an unknown island.

title: Isoge! Nakama-tachi no Moto e: Nyougashima no Bouken
desc: It is revealed that Luffy is on Amazon Lily, an island populated entirely by the Kuja tribe of women warriors.

title: Minna Meromero! Kaizoku Jotei Hancock
desc: Luffy decides to leave the island, reunite with his crew and defeat the enemies who had overpowered them earlier, and is determined to borrow a ship.

title: Senaka ni Kakusareta Himitsu: Souguu Luffy to Hebihime
desc: Boa Hancock's ship reaches Amazon Lily and she returns to her palace.

title: Hijou no Sabaki! Ishi ni Sareta Margaret!!
desc: Luffy looks at Boa Hancock's back and notes that he has seen what was on it before. Hancock tries, but fails to turn him to stone with her powers when he mistakes her Mero Mero no Mi abilities for Foxy's Noro Noro Beam.

title: Luffy Daikusen! Hebi Shimai no Haki no Chikara!!
desc: Luffy is challenged to battle Boa Marigold and Boa Sandersonia in the Amazon Lily arena with the spectators calling for Luffy to be executed.

title: Nouryoku Zenkai Battle!! Gomugomu Tai Hebihebi
desc: Luffy activates Gear Second and is currently taking the lead.

title: Hancock no Kokuhaku: Shimai no Imawashiki Kako
desc: Hancock decides to test Luffy by giving him an ultimatum: either he gets a ship so he can leave the island while the girls remain statues or she changes them back and Luffy finds another way to the archipelago.

title: Ace o Sukue! Arata na Mokutekichi wa Daikangoku
desc: Following a party, Luffy learns from Nyon that Hancock is a Shichibukai, and that they have been called together as the Marines is launching an all-out offensive on Whitebeard.

title: Koi wa Hurricane! Meromero Hancock
desc: When Nyon visits Hancock, she deduces her illness and when she mentions Luffy wishes to see her, this causes Hancock to get up and speak with him.

title: Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Tenkou no Kagaku to Karakurijima
desc: Nami and Franky story, where they landed and what did they do.

title: Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Kyochou no Shima to Momoiro no Rakuen!
desc: Sanji and Chopper story, where they landed and what did they do.

title: Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Shima o Tsunagu Hashi to Shokujin Shokubutsu
desc: Robin and Usopp story, where they landed and what did they do.

title: Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Negative Princess to Akuma Ou
desc: Zoro and Brook story, where they landed and what did they do.

title: Kesshi no Sennyuu! Kaitei Kangoku Impel Down Sennyuu!
desc: Vice Admiral Garp talked proudly to Ace at Impel Down about some of Luffy's actions, and mentions that they both have the blood of a world class criminal.

title: Jigoku de Saikai!? Bara Bara no Mi no Jitsuryokusha!
desc: Hancock turns Domino to stone before she can undergo the body-check, allowing Luffy to escape into the prison.

title: Yabure! Guren Jigoku: Buggy no Dohade Daisakusen
desc: Buggy and Luffy fight their way through to the entrance of Level 2 by going through Level 1, Crimson Hell, where the lowest ranking criminals are held.

title: Kangoku Saikyou no Otoko! Doku Ningen Magellan Toujou
desc: Hancock and the others finally reach the office of Magellan, a large man who has eaten the Doku Doku no Mi.

title: Eiga Rendou Special: Ugokidasu Kinjishi no Yabou
desc: Luffy, Zoro, Usopp, and Sanji arrive on an island called Little East Blue, a smaller version of the East Blue, which is where they met each other.

title: Eiga Rendou Special: Nerawareta Little East Blue
desc: Luffy, Sanji, Zoro, and Usopp arrive on the island and go to their favorite places in the East Blue.

title: Eiga Rendou Special: Amigo Kaizokudan no Moukou
desc: Largo uses his devil fruit power to create nets from his body and trap Zoro and Sanji.

title: Eiga Rendou Special: Kessen! Luffy Tai Largo
desc: After escaping from the net, Luffy knocks Largo far away and goes off to fight him.

title: Toraware no Ouka Shichibukai! Kaikyou no Jinbee
desc: Luffy and Buggy find Galdino and together they continue to fight through Level 2 of Impel Down, hounded by both Manticores and Puzzle Scorpions.

title: Roubanchou Saldeath no Wana: Level 3 Kiga Jigoku
desc: Luffy, Buggy, and Galdino find themselves on Level 3, a barren floor of extreme heat.

title: Tokihanatareta Swan! Saikai! Bon Clay
desc: The prison staff and Hancock finally arrive on the floor where Ace is being held.

title: Shochou Magellan Ugoku: Kansei! Mugiwara Houimou
desc: Magellan finally receives word of Luffy's break-in, and decides to gather his forces to Level 4, to cut off Luffy and his allies.

title: Zensenryoku Shuuketsu! Level 4 Shounetsu Jigoku no Kessen
desc: Luffy and his team fall to the hot fire while Magellan works out the plan to capture them.

title: Magellan Tsuyoshi! Bon Clay Tekizen Toubou
desc: Luffy begins fighting Magellan despite Bentham's warnings to flee, and finds that he is unable to go on the offensive because of Magellan's poisonous body and long-range poison attacks.

title: Shiyuu Kessu! Sutemi no Luffy Saigo no Ichigeki
desc: Magellan has Luffy backed into a corner and is using his devil fruit powers to poison Luffy.

title: Dachi Dakara: Bon Clay Kesshi no Kyuushutsukou
desc: Luffy is thrown into a cell where he is left to die of poisoning.

title: Jigoku ni Rakuen! Impel Down Level 5.5
desc: Mr. 2 apologizes for abandoning Luffy and searches for Ivankov.

title: Luffy Chiryou Kaishi: Ivan-san Kiseki no Chikara!!
desc: Emporio Ivankov displays some of his powers, including stopping a vengeful pirate's cannon shot merely by winking.

title: Kiseki o Shinjite! Bon Clay Tamashii no Seien
desc: Bentham learns that Ivankov has the ability to control hormones.

title: Luffy Fukkatsu! Iwa-san Datsugoku Keikaku Shidou!!
desc: As Luffy is finally revived, he is informed by Emporio Ivankov about Iva's background.

title: Ace Gosou Kaishi: Saikasou Level 6 no Koubou!
desc: When Luffy made it to Level 6 with Ivankov and Inazuma, they met up with the former cellmate of Ace, Jinbe.

title: Saikyou Team Kessei: Shinkan! Inpel Down
desc: Luffy is reluctant to free Crocodile, but Ivankov offers to keep him in line by blackmailing him with a weakness he knows about.

title: Saranaru Konran! Kurohige Teach Shuurai!
desc: While Luffy and his allies continue fighting on Level 4 of Impel Down, Buggy and Mr. 3 reach Level 2 and release the prisoners there to cause a riot to cover their escape.

title: Kiken na Deai! Kurohige to Ame no Shiryuu
desc: The Jailer Beasts arrive and overpower many of the prisoners, but Luffy, Jinbe and Crocodile defeat them in a single attack each.

title: Iji demo Taorenu! Honki no Hannyabaru
desc: Luffy fights Hannyabal who tries to stop the escapees, but then Blackbeard shows up and breaks up the fight between Luffy and Hannyabal.

title: Ikari no Jet Pistol: Luffy vs Kurohige
desc: Although Luffy wants a proper battle with Blackbeard, Jinbe reminds him there's no time for that as Ace's execution will occur in only a few short hours.

title: Magellan o Tomero! Iva-san Ougi Sakuretsu
desc: Luffy and the other prisoners are getting closer to the surface, having made it through levels 3 and 2.

title: Magellan no Kisaku! Habamareta Datsugoku Keikaku
desc: Luffy becomes enraged after learning about Magellan defeating Emporio Ivankov and Inazuma, but Mr. 2 and Jinbe persuade him that escaping takes priority.

title: Datsugoku Team Zettaizetsumei: Kinjite "Venom Demon"
desc: Jinbe, Crocodile and Daz Bones finally secure a Marine vessel to escape with. Meanwhile, Luffy continues his fight against Magellan, with the assistance of Galdino's Doru Doru no Mi powers.

title: Okose Saigo no Kiseki: Seigi no Mon o Toppa Seyo
desc: Bentham puts himself on the line to save Luffy and the others, by disguising himself as Warden Magellan.

title: Mezase Kaigun Honbu: Ace Kyuushutsu e no Funade!
desc: Shiliew saves Blackbeard and his crew by giving them antidotes to Magellan's poison before taking the opportunity to join with them.

title: Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Weatheria Report to Cyborg Animal
desc: As Luffy's ship heads to the Marine Headquarters, the scene shifts to a point some time in the past.

title: Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Kyochou no Hina to Momoiro no Taiketsu
desc: Sanji is chased by okamas to Caroline - the queen's stand in.

title: Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Kakumeigun to Boushoku no Mori no Wana!
desc: Robin was captured by the guards of Tequila Wolf and was sent to the Prison Tower.

title: Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Kyodai na Bohyou to Pantsu no On
desc: While heading to the sea to return to the Sabaody Archipelago, Zoro and Perona stumble upon an enormous tombstone. Brook decides he has to wait to find Luffy and the others until he can fulfill his debt to the people of Harahettania.

title: Marineford Chokuzen Kaisou Special: Kyoudai no Chikai!
desc: Luffy recalls his childhood with Ace and meeting Marshall D. Teach in Jaya without knowing who he was.

title: Marineford Chokuzen Kaisou Special: Shuuketsu! San Taishou
desc: While Luffy's on his way to rescue Ace, everyone at Marine Headquarters gets ready for the execution.

title: Kessen no Toki Semaru! Kaigun Saikyou no Fujin Kansei!
desc: Only three hours remain until Ace's execution. Luffy reaches Marineford but finds the Gates of Justice closed.

title: Kyodai Kantai Arawaru: Shuurai! Shirohige Kaizokudan
desc: The world is shocked by the revelation of Ace's father's identity.

title: Kessen no Makuake! Ace to Shirohige no Kako
desc: Whitebeard reveals his Devil Fruit powers in front of the Marines.

title: Sekai o Horobosu Chikara! Guragura no Mi no Nouryoku
desc: The sea-quakes made by Whitebeard cause a tsunami to come upon Marineford.

title: Subete o Yakitsukusu!! Taishou Akainu no Chikara!
desc: All the various Whitebeard Commanders show off their skills and abilities, as do some Marines.

title: Majin no Shison! Little Oars Jr. Bakushin!
desc: Oars Jr. goes straight for Ace, but the Giant Squad attempts to stop him without much success.

title: Shousha dake ga Seigi Hatsudou! Sengoku no Sakusen!
desc: Koby and Helmeppo attempted to flee from the war after feeling too overwhelmed by the deaths and chaos, but stumbled upon Akainu and an apparent plan by Sengoku.

title: Mugiwara Team Touchaku Fuunkyuu o Tsugeru Senjou
desc: Luffy finally shows up together with his formed alliance from the escaped prisoners of Impel Down.

title: Shinde mo Tasukeru: Luffy vs Kaigun Battle Start
desc: With Luffy as their inspiration, the other pirates fight back with renewed vigor.

title: Gekisen no Renzoku! Nouryokusha Gundan VS Nouryokusha Gundan
desc: One battle after another, it is complete chaos out on the battlefield.

title: Kuma ni Okita Ihen Iva-san Ikari no Ichigeki
desc: Luffy receives the key to Ace's handcuffs from Hancock, who then fantasizes about a wedding ceremony held on Amazon Lily.

title: Kengou Mihawk Luffy ni Semaru Kokutou no Zangeki
desc: Luffy stumbles upon Mihawk, whom he tries to avoid.

title: Senmetsu Sakusen Shidou: Pacifista Gundan no Iryoku
desc: The Pacifista enter Marineford as part of Sengoku's plan to win the war against Whitebeard.

title: Akainu no Bouryaku! Otoshiirerareta Shirohige
desc: As Squard stabs Whitebeard, the pirates and even marines in the war are shocked due to his betrayal.

title: Houiheki Sadou! Shirohige Kaizokudan Zettaizetsumei!!
desc: In a desperate attempt to stop Whitebeard from advancing to the execution platform, the Marines activate walls to block Whitebeard's path, but gets stopped by the ice.

title: Shokei Shikkou Shirei Kudaru: Houiheki o Toppa Seyo!
desc: Akainu's Meteor Volcano melts the nearly all the ice and destroys the Whitebeard Pirates' ships, dropping them into boiling water, enabling the cannons on the wall to bombard them while the Pacifistas block the way out.

title: Saishuu Kyokumen Totsunyuu! Shirohige Kishikaisei no Itte
desc: Luffy attempts to slip past the admirals, but Kizaru easily catches up to him and knocks him to the ground.

title: Luffy Chikaratsuku! Oris Hiroba no Souryokusen!!
desc: Ace thinks back to his childhood, when he fought with anyone who spoke ill of Roger, and wondering if he should ever have been born.

title: Inochi o Kezuru Chikara: Tension Hormone Futatabi
desc: Whitebeard falters for a moment as a result of his age and physical condition.

title: Yakusoku no Tame ni!! Gekitou! Luffy to Coby
desc: Luffy with his newly restored strength continues on to the execution platform to save Ace and is warned by Ivankov that the hormones only trick his body.

title: Shokeidai Mokuzen! Hirakareta Ace e no Michi!!
desc: Luffy uses Haki unintentionally just as Ace is about to be executed.

title: Sorezore no Eranda Michi: Luffy vs Garp!
desc: Luffy unwillingly hits Garp, who is blocking his way to Ace. As Garp falls, the bridge crumbles.

title: Ace Kyuushutsu! Shirohige Saigo no Senchou Meirei!
desc: Ace is freed at last as he and Luffy fight their way back to escape from Marineford.

title: Hi o mo Yaki Tsukusu Chikara: Akainu Hijou no Tsuigeki
desc: Whitebeard aims to take down the whole of Marineford and orders his crew and the other pirates to flee.

title: Kotae o Sagashite: Hiken Ace Senjou ni Shisu
desc: An eerie silence falls over the battlefield as Luffy and Ace share a heartbreaking final moment together.

title: Kaigun Honbu Houkai! Shirohige Kotobanaki Ikari!
desc: Luffy's has a breakdown due to the emotional trauma of Ace's death, causing Jinbe to take him away.

title: Kejime o Tsukeru: Shirohige vs Kurohige Kaizokudan
desc: Blackbeard and his pirates arrive in Marineford, as they are taken down from the execution platform by Whitebeard.

title: Show no Kaimaku: Akasareta Kurohige no Takurami
desc: The news of Whitebeard's death is already spreading all over the world. Silvers Rayleigh also hears the news.

title: Akainu no Shuunen! Luffy o Osou Magma no Kobushi
desc: Blackbeard expresses his desire to sink Marineford into the ocean after destroying the fortress, but Sengoku attacks him, saying that the island is a symbol of justice in the world.

title: Hisshi no Sakebi: Unmei o Kaeru Yuuki Aru Suubyou
desc: The fight in Marineford still rages on, as Trafalgar Law arrives to rescue Luffy.

title: Shanks Kenzan! Choujou Sensou Tsui ni Shuuketsu
desc: Law and his crew take Jinbe and Luffy inside their submarine.

title: Gun'yuu Kakkyo Su! "Atarashii Jidai" no Hajimari!
desc: As Luffy's fate hangs in the balance, word spreads that the war is over and people all over the world rejoice on the news of the Marines' victory.

title: Nyougashima Jouriku: Luffy o Semeru Kakoku na Genjitsu
desc: Brownbeard was seen taking over Foodvalten saying it was not a Whitebeard territory anymore, Iva said goodbye to Jinbe and the others.

title: Saikyou Tag! Funtou, Luffy to Toriko!
desc: After eating the Hungrila Bird that they captured, Luffy and Toriko team up again to save Nami and Komatsu who have been kidnapped by the Cocoalas.

title: Luffy to Ace: Kyoudai no Deai no Monogatari!
desc: Garp drops Luffy to live with the Dadan Family where he meets Ace - who immediately dislikes Luffy.

title: Sabo Toujou! Gray Terminal no Shounen
desc: Luffy discovers the end of the forest is a slum dumpster named Gray Terminal, a lawless area full of homeless people searching for valuables thrown out by the town's people.

title: Ore wa Nigenai: Ace Kesshi no Kyuushutsu Sakusen
desc: Ace and Sabo rescue Luffy from Porchemy by defeating him.

title: Itsuka Umi e! Sannin no Akudou Chikai no Sakazuki!
desc: Sabo is seen by his father but Sabo pretends to not know him.

title: Dadan Ikka to no Wakare!? Kansei! Himitsu Kichi
desc: Luffy, Ace and Sabo were going about their usual mischief until Garp turned up, and attacked them for still wanting to be pirates.

title: Luffy Deshiiri!? Kaizoku Ou to Tatakatta Otoko!
desc: Ace, Sabo, and Luffy chase down a Danpa and succeeds to catch it, but a tiger steals it.

title: Ootora to no Kessen! Senchou ni Naru no wa Dare Da!
desc: Ace, Sabo and Luffy help Naguri make a pirate ship.

title: Ubawareta Jiyuu! Sankyoudai ni Semaru Kizoku no Wana
desc: Sabo, Luffy and Ace are caught by the Bluejam Pirates.

title: Hanatareta Honoo: Gray Terminal no Kiki
desc: Sabo is being chased by his father's men.

title: Jiyuu wa Doko ni Aru? Shounen no Kanashiki Funade
desc: While Dadan and Ace stay behind to fight Bluejam, the rest of the Dadan Family and Luffy make a quick escape.

title: Yoroshiku Tanomu! Kyoudai kara Todoita Tegami!
desc: Sabo's ship is destroyed by a World Noble.

title: Yakusoku o Hatasu Tame: Sorezore no Tabidachi!
desc: After the death of Sabo, Ace and Luffy continue their training while the others discover the Revolutionaries' ship.

title: Aitsura ni Aitee! Luffy Namida no Sakebi
desc: Luffy still distraught at the death of Ace, blames it on his weakness.

title: Mugiwara no Ichimi Gekishin! Motarasareta Kyouhou
desc: On Kuraigana Island, Zoro confronts several Humandrills and is nearly defeated, but then Mihawk appears and scares them away.

title: Meiou Rayleigh to no Saikai: Luffy Ketsudan no Toki
desc: On Maiden Island, Rayleigh kills a Sea King and arrives on the island in front of Law's crew.

title: Senchou no Moto e: Sorajima no Datsugoku to Fuyujima no Jiken
desc: At Amazon Lily, Luffy tries to make up his mind regarding Rayleigh's offer, as he made a promise to his crew to meet in three days.

title: Sesshoku! Daikengou Mihawk: Zoro Iji no Shitou
desc: Zoro tried to go back to the sea using the small boat given to him by Mihawk but he could not get past the humandrills.

title: Sanji no Junan: Oukoku e to Kikan Shita Joou!
desc: Chopper leaves the Torino Kingdom, while riding one of the birds, hoping to be able to aid Luffy.

title: Masaka no Saijouriku! Luffy Marineford e!
desc: The Marine Headquarters have started rebuilding, and the Marines had a meeting about Monkey D. Luffy.

title: Nakama ni Todoke: Kakemeguru Dai News!
desc: Some of Luffy's old friends from Impel Down and around the world read the news about Luffy's second appearance at Marineford.

title: Ugokidasu Kaizoku-tachi! Kyoutendouchi no Shinsekai
desc: Trafalgar Law and his crew talk about going to the New World.

title: Jigoku o Ikinuke: Sanji Otoko o Kaketa Shoubu
desc: Nami tricks the old men into letting her stay on Weatheria. Franky stumbles upon Vegapunk's hidden laboratory and finds more blueprints and decides to study them.

title: Madamada Tsuyoku Naru! Zoro Senchou e no Chikai
desc: While being put on display in a cage, Brook feels appreciative towards all that Luffy had done for him and decides that he will move on and continue to aid Luffy.

title: Luffy Shugyou Kaishi: 2-nengo ni Yakusoku no Basho de
desc: Jinbe leaves Luffy with Rayleigh. Rayleigh takes Luffy to an abandoned island to begin his training. Rayleigh introduces Luffy to the concept of Haki and then demonstrates the three different types of Haki.

title: Shinshou Kaimaku: Saishuuketsu! Mugiwara no Ichimi
desc: After two years of being separated, the Straw Hats return to Sabaody Archipelago.

title: Isshokusokuhatsu! Luffy Tai Nise Luffy
desc: Fake Luffy and the real Luffy come face-to-face, though the imposter is quickly beaten thanks to Luffy's use of Haki.

title: Kaigun Shutsudou: Nerawareta Mugiwara no Ichimi
desc: Robin visits the Thousand Sunny and meets Franky there. Chopper goes to the Fake Straw Hat Pirates, mistaking them for his own crew.

title: Oomono Shuuketsu: Nise Mugiwara Ichimi no Kyoui
desc: Brook finishes his concert when the Marines arrive to capture him, but he escapes.

title: Sentou Kaishi! Misero Shugyou no Seika!
desc: While the rest of the Straw Hats prepare to set sail, Luffy gets a chance to show off his new powers in a brutal throw down between notorious pirates, navy soldiers, and deadly Pacifistas.

title: Zen'in Shuugou: Luffy Shinsekai e no Funade
desc: Luffy along with Zoro and Sanji are heading to Grove #42.

title: Kyougaku no Shinjitsu: Sunny-gou o Mamotta Otoko
desc: Caribou is seen punishing the Fake Straw Hats for making him join them instead of the real Straw Hat Pirates.

title: Kaichuu no Shitou: Arawareta Oounabara no Akuma
desc: The Caribou Pirates attack the Straw Hats. While Caribou manages to get on the Thousand Sunny, the rest of his crew gets pulled away by Mohmoo, who gets frightened when he recognizes the Straw Hats from his time in Arlong Park.

title: Shinkai de Sounan: Hagureta Mugiwara no Ichimi
desc: Luffy, Zoro and Sanji are facing the Kraken.

title: Kaitei Kazan Funka! Nagasarete Gyojintou
desc: The Flying Dutchman shows up and Vander Decken tells Wadatsumi to crush the Thousand Sunny, but then the Kraken beats Wadatsumi.

title: Gyojintou Jouriku: Uruwashiki Ningyo-tachi
desc: The Straw Hat Pirates encounter Hammond, some sea-beasts and other fishmen from the New Fishman Pirates.

title: Koufun Bakuhatsu! Sanji Seimei no Kiki!
desc: Sanji playing in a pool with the mermaids in Mermaid Cove, Luffy, soaking his feet on the side of the pool, comments on how nice it must be to swim, Camie suggests that Luffy could wear a bubble in order to do so.

title: Gyojintou Metsubou!? Sharley no Yogen
desc: As blood donors are finally found, the recovering Sanji stays at the Mermaid Cafe while Luffy, Usopp and Camie meet Pappag and Brook.

title: Gyojintou no Ou: Kaishin Neptune!
desc: Straw Hat Pirates are in a town on Fishman Island and King Neptune and Megalo appear to invite the Straw Hats to Ryugu Palace.

title: Ryuuguujou! Tasuketa Same ni Tsurerarete
desc: Luffy, Nami, Usopp, Brook, Camie, and Pappag travel with King Neptune to Ryugu Palace.

title: Yowamushi de Nakimushi! Koukakutou no Ningyo Hime
desc: Vander Decken IX reveals that he plans to marry the princess, using his Mark-Mark Fruit curse to throw a giant axe at her.

title: Kinkyuu Jitai Hassei: Senkyo Sareta Ryuuguujou
desc: The guards around Zoro and the others are preparing to pop their air bubble, however, Nami found some bubbly coral and made the whole room fill with air and Zoro prepares to fight Neptune.

title: Ryuuguujou Gekishin! Shirahoshi Yuukai Jiken
desc: Luffy leads Shirahoshi out of her tower inside Megalo while Brook and the Minister of the Right tells them to stop.

title: Hody Shuurai: Fukushuu Keikaku no Hajimari
desc: Luffy is still on his way to the Sea Forest with Shirahoshi, when he notices something going to the Ryugu Palace, which is revealed to be Hody and Vander Decken IX.

title: Ryuuguujou no Kessen! Zoro Tai Hody
desc: Neptune begs someone to protect her daughter. Hody just comments on how weak he is and states he only joined his army for military strength and knowledge. He states he will revive the dream and ambition of Arlong.

title: Shirahoshi o Mamore: Decken no Tsuigeki
desc: Chopper tries to persuade Sanji to not turn around, or else he will see Shirahoshi and die. But Sanji turns around and after seeing the princess, turns into stone.

title: Ichimi Haiboku!? Hody Ryuuguujou Seiatsu
desc: Zoro cuts Hody and asks for Neptune's help to escape from Ryugu Palace. Unfortunately, Hody who was unconscious comes to his senses after taking an Energy Steroid and successfully stops Neptune and the Straw Hats from escaping.

title: Yomigaeru Innen! Nami to Gyojin Kaizokudan!
desc: Robin continues her search while the New Fishman Pirates begin to take over. People are also seen being forced to step on a photo, and if they do not, they are considered as enemies.

title: Dorei Kaihou no Eiyuu: Boukenka Tiger
desc: Otohime confronts a robber who was stealing money so he could buy food for his ten children. Otohime and Jinbe try to change Fishman island, and Jinbe leaves the Army to join the Sun Pirates.

title: Kizaru Toujou! Tiger o Nerau Wana!
desc: Entering a flashback, Neptune holds a baby Shirahoshi commenting on Tiger's attack on Mary Geoise, stating he would not be able to attend a summit for a long time because of it.

title: Team Kessei! Chopper o Sukue
desc: Toriko and Komatsu are seen fishing when Komatsu catches a Harusame. After defeating it, Luffy suddenly comes out of the Harusame's mouth and surprises Toriko and Komatsu.

title: Eiyuu no Saigo: Tiger Shougeki no Shinjitsu
desc: The Sun Pirates start making their way to Koala's hometown, while giving her a slight makeover, new clothes and cutting her hair. on their ship, Koala still acts like a slave would, doing chores without being asked and asking for orders.

title: Kaizokudan Bunretsu: Jinbe Tai Arlong
desc: After Fisher Tiger's death, Arlong, enraged, betrays his last wishes and decides to attack and kill villagers of Koala's village for selling him out, upon trying he is easily beaten by Vice-Admiral Borsalino and taken into Marine custody.

title: Yureru Gyojintou! Hyouchaku Shita Tenryuubito
desc: With Jinbe having been accepted as a Shichibukai, the Sun Pirates return to Fishman Island.

title: Totsuzen no Higeki! Mirai o Tozasu Kyoudan
desc: Vander Decken IX discovers about the Tamatebako and wishes to use it to age Shirahoshi after she grows up a little.

title: Futatabi Genzai e! Ugokidasu Hody
desc: After Otohime passed away, Hody Jones had found and killed the suspected human assassin and showed him to the people.

title: Oukoku Gekishin: Neptune Shokei Shirei
desc: Hody makes his announcement to take over the Ryugu Kingdom with the execution of King Neptune as the start of his new rule. Hody also announces that he will kill Straw Hats so that they will serve as example to all humans in the surface.

title: Shoujita Kiretsu! Luffy Tai Jinbe
desc: Luffy and Jinbe start their duel to see who gets to fight Hody, but their fight was cut short by Sanji's and Robin's interference.

title: Hody no Ihen: Kyouyaku no Shin no Chikara!
desc: The New Fishman Pirates head to the Gyoncorde Plaza to execute King Neptune but before getting at the plaza, they demonstrate a little taste of their power by terrorizing and destroying everything in their path.

title: Kessen Hajimaru: Gyoncorde Hiroba!
desc: Neptune's army put up an attempt to stop Hody Jones and his pirates from reaching Gyoncorde Plaza but seeing the king held hostage prevents them from attacking.

title: Shougeki no Kokuhaku: Otohime Ansatsu no Shinjitsu
desc: Jinbe and Shirahoshi are captured by the New Fishman Pirates when they fall into a trap due to a balloon version of King Neptune which easily tricks Shirahoshi and Megalo.

title: Shirahoshi no Namida! Luffy Tsui ni Toujou
desc: Shirahoshi reveals that Megalo witnessed Hody shooting Queen Otohime and told her in secret.

title: Dai Gekitotsu! Mugiwara Ichimi VS 10 Man no Teki
desc: The citizens celebrate at the arrival of Luffy and his crew. Jinbe comments on how his plan with the Straw Hat Pirates crew worked. Luffy takes down half of Hody's forces with Haki.

title: Oowaza Sakuretsu! Zoro Sanji Shutsugeki!
desc: The Straw Hat Pirates begin their attack with Luffy, Zoro and Sanji taking the lead in the fight but mostly it is the latter two of the three who begin showing their new powers and abilities from their two year separation and training.

title: Hatsu Hirou! Sunny Gou no Himitsu Heiki!
desc: The battle rages on between the Straw Hats and the New Fishman Pirates. Sanji and Zoro are competing over who can take down the most fishmen.

title: Iron Pirate! Franky Shougun Toujou
desc: The battle between the New Fishman Pirates and the Straw Hats continues, with the Straw Hats gaining the upper hand. Seeing this, Daruma decides to join the fight, targeting the Brachio Tank V and collapsing the ground underneath it.

title: Noah Sekkin! Gyojintou Kaimetsu no Kiki!
desc: Luffy and Hody continue their fight with Luffy getting the upper hand with Haki and Hody's attacks being ineffective against Luffy.

title: Isoge Luffy! Shirahoshi Zettaizetsumei
desc: Shirahoshi begins swimming out to sea in an attempt to lure the ark Noah away and save Fishman Island, while Luffy gets Sanji's help to allow him to reach the ship's chains and stop Hody.

title: Gekitou Kaishi! Luffy Tai Hody!
desc: Hody takes his trident out of Vander Decken's body and, after a short fight, Decken is defeated. Then Hody goes after Shirahoshi, slicing through Ryuboshi and Manboshi, reaches her with his incomparable underwater speed, and grabs her hair.

title: Dairansen! Ichimi Tai Shin Gyojin Kaizokudan!
desc: Luffy along with the three princes try to protect Shirahoshi against Hody Jones.

title: Luffy Haiboku!? Hody Fukushuu no Toki
desc: As the Noah falls onto the Fishman Island, Shirahoshi desperately tries to tell Decken to wake up only for Hody to attack her but Manboshi takes the blunt of the attack.

title: Shougeki no Jijitsu! Hody no Shoutai!
desc: The story goes back before the Noah started falling back to the island. Jinbe and Sanji continue to fight Wadatsumi and Wadatsumi becomes angry and inflates himself, crushing some of his allies unknowingly.

title: Zero ni! Luffy e no Atsuki Negai!
desc: Hody's past is revealed and Luffy continues his fight with him.

title: Luffy Konshin no Ichigeki! Red Hawk Sakuretsu
desc: Brook continues to fight Zeo and reveals his new control over his Yomi Yomi no Mi abilities. Usopp continues to fight Daruma and has set traps for him.

title: Tsui ni Kecchaku! Hody Saishuu Kessen
desc: Hody recovers thanks to the Energy Steroids and manages to overwhelm Luffy and bite him again in the same spot.

title: Tomare Noah! Kesshi no Elephant Gatling!
desc: All of the New Fishman Pirates lie down defeated while the Straw Hat Pirates are relaxing and waiting for Luffy.

title: Mirai e! Taiyou e to Tsuzuku Michi!
desc: With the Sea Kings having stopped and saved the great ship Noah, Shirahoshi learns a startling secret from the Sea Kings.

title: Akasareta Himitsu: Kodai Heiki no Shinjitsu
desc: As the whole Fishman Island celebrates the capture and defeat of Hody and the New Fishman Pirates by the Straw Hats, who make their own plans to leave Fishman Island soon.

title: Ichimi Kyougaku! Aratanaru Kaigun Gensui!
desc: King Neptune talks about the Ancient Weapons with Shirahoshi and Nico Robin while Caribou listens and makes his way to Shirahoshi's room.

title: Okashizuki! Yonkou Big Mom
desc: The rest of the Straw Hats are waiting for Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji to return the treasure from Caribou. They find Caribou easily with all the treasure.

title: Zento Tanan: Shin Sekai ni Machiukeru Wana
desc: The Minister of the Right was thanking the Straw Hats for saving Fishman Island, when suddenly he got a report that the Tamate Box is gone and is in the hands of Baron Tamago and Pekoms.

title: Tsui ni Shukkou! Sayonara Gyojin-tou
desc: The mermaids and Keimi from the Mermaid Cafe ask Madam Shyarly if they can say good bye to the Straw Hats. Madam Shyarly says that her prediction that Luffy will destroy Fishman Island was wrong since they defeated Hody and his Pirates.

title: Shin Sekai e! Saikyou no Umi o Mezashite
desc: The Straw Hats are Heading into the New World.

title: Z no Yabou Hen: Chiisana Kyojin Lily!
desc: The Straw Hats find themselves in a middle of an infamous sea in the New World known for its mirages and outrageous weather patterns.

title: Z no Yabou Hen: Nazo no Saikyou Gundan Toujou!
desc: Nami creates a plan for the Straw Hats to rescue Lily's father, Panz Fry. Chopper, Robin, Brook, and Luffy are the diversion group while Usopp, Sanji, Zoro, and Lily are in the submarine.

title: Z no Yabou Hen: Kesshi no Dai Dasshutsu Sakusen!
desc: Luffy and Zoro face off against Shuzo and Momonga. The Straw Hats, Lily, and her father manage to escape with a Coup de Burst and the anchor connected to the Thousand Sunny.

title: Z no Yabou Hen: Luffy VS Shuzo!
desc: Shuzo orders his men to be launched at the island like torpedoes and sacrifice themselves for him.

title: Jouriku! Moeru Shima Punk Hazard
desc: The Straw Hats have arrived at a volcanic island that does not show on the New World Log Pose. Luffy in his enthusiasm votes to go to the island, though most of the crew were reluctant to go because of the sea of fire blocking their way.

title: Shakunetsu no Tatakai! Luffy Tai Kyodai Ryuu!
desc: Luffy and Zoro start fighting the dragon, which is shown to be able to speak and breathe fire.

title: Ichimi Souzen! Shougeki no Kubi dake Samurai Toujou!
desc: Luffy, Zoro, Usopp, and Robin are standing near the dead dragon that Zoro killed and Luffy is trying to pull out the man who is stuck in the dragon's body.

title: Kyougaku! Tsui ni Akasareru Shima no Himitsu
desc: Franky, Sanji, Nami and Chopper are surprised that the samurai is still alive after being cut.

title: Kodomo-tachi o Sukue! Ichimi Sentou Kaishi
desc: Nami's group escaped the prison cell and end up in the Biscuits Room, where they find giant children.

title: Kenjutsu Shoubu: Brook Tai Nazo no Doutai Samurai
desc: At the lake, Luffy's group have been attacked by Brownbeard and his centaur unit who's job was to intercept and eliminate any obvious intruders.

title: Shichibukai! Trafalgar Law
desc: Chopper and Nami, leading the children stumble upon a room with people frozen in it. Franky, Sanji and the samurai start to make their way towards Nami and Chopper. Luffy, Zoro, Usopp and Robin get attacked by the centaurs.

title: Dai Pinch: Luffy Gokkan no Mizuumi ni Shizumu
desc: Luffy, Zoro, Usopp and Robin try to get to the ice side of Punk Hazard but their ship gets capsized by Brownbeard. As Brownbeard's troop prepares attack them again, Zoro gets ready to destroy their bullets but gets dragged down by sharks.

title: Gekitotsu! Law VS Smoker Chuujou
desc: Law was going to to cut up Tashigi into little pieces but Smoker saved her and started fighting against Law. Luffy, Zoro, Robin and Usopp are riding on top of Brownbeard after defeating him and his centaurs.

title: 2 Nenburi no Saikai! Luffy to Law
desc: Tashigi tries to see what happened in the fight. Luffy's group sees the flying warship. Luffy sees Law and thanks him for saving him two years ago. Law says that they aren't friends and Luffy agrees since they were both after One Piece.

title: Sekai Saiaku Kyoufu no Kagakusha Caesar
desc: The G-5 Marines discussed if Caesar Clown was probably behind the unusual events at the island and that the child abduction cases in that area may have been real.

title: Jijou Saikyou Colabo VS Umi no Taishokukan
desc: Featured characters of One Piece, Toriko, and Dragon Ball Z enter the IGO tournament in order to gain the Carat meat, which is said to be the most tasteful in the world. However, it leads in a tie between Goku, Toriko, and Luffy.

title: Chopper Gekido Master Hidounaru Jikken
desc: The children and the Straw Hat Pirates are in a cave with Brownbeard tied up talking about the Master. Zoro, Sanji and Brook go to look for Kin'emon, who had gone to look for his torso.

title: Ichimi Massatsu! Densetsu no Koroshiya Raishuu!
desc: Yeti Cool Brothers make their way to the destroyed lab where the Straw Hats and the children are. Monet tells Caesar Clown about Law having some relation to Luffy, which makes Caesar mistrust Law until Law reassures him.

title: Nami o Sukue! Luffy Yukiyama no Tatakai
desc: Chopper tells the others that Nami in Franky's body was kidnapped by the Yeti Cool Brothers. Franky in Chopper's body takes a Rumble Ball. Luffy and Franky go after the Yeti Cool Brothers to save Nami and defeat them.

title: Kessei! Luffy-Law Kaizoku Doumei!
desc: Luffy and Law agree on an alliance; the rest of the Straw Hat Pirates disapprove while Nico Robin approves, even if she warns Luffy about a possible betrayal in a pirate alliance.

title: Master o Toraero: Kaizoku Doumei Sakusen Kaishi!
desc: Zoro, Sanji and Brook are trying to find the samurai and remember what happened to them. They had been knocked out by the Yeti Cool Brothers, who used a gas that makes people drunk.

title: Zenmetsu no Kiki: Shi no Monster Hirai
desc: Luffy declares that he will capture Caesar. Law will distract Monet while Chopper finds an antidote for drug.

title: Dai-Gekisen: Caesar Shin no Nouryoku Hatsudou!
desc: Sanji, Kin'emon, Brook and Zoro see Smiley. Brook talks about a story of a creature called Slime which melts the clothes of women, making everyone act perverted except for Zoro, who points out that the slime is killing the fish in the lake.

title: Honoo Kirisaku Samurai! Kitsunebi no Kin'emon!
desc: Law's heart is crushed by the mysterious man named Vergo who was sent along with Monet to watch over Caesar.

title: Shougeki! Nazo no Otoko Vergo no Shoutai!
desc: Law gets beaten up by Vergo. Yarisugi tells the parents of the missing children that they are dead. Caesar takes the children from Usopp and Nami.

title: Kodomo-tachi o Mamore! Semaru Master no Ma no Te
desc: As Luffy and Law remain captives in Caesar's lab along with the others who were captured, Caesar Clown goes to retrieve the children from the remaining Straw Hat Pirates.

title: Shin Sekai Gekishin: Caesar Akumu no Jikken
desc: G-5 Marine soldiers try to break into the lab. Meanwhile, Mocha starts to doubt Caesar and his subordinates.

title: Shijou Saiaku no Satsuriku Heiki! Shinokuni
desc: Smiley eats the candy and begins its transformation, wreaking havoc on Punk Hazzard.

title: Hangeki Kaishi! Luffy-Law Daidasshutsu
desc: As the Underworld Brokers watch the video feed of the captive Straw Hats and Marines, Eustass Kid and Killer decided to ignore it for more important matters, such as forming alliances.

title: Mezase R-tou! Kaizoku Doumei Kaishingeki!
desc: Although they made it into the lab, the Straw Hat Pirates left a large hole in the side of it, allowing Shinokuni to spread.

title: Tashigi no Namida: G-5 Kesshi no Toppa Sakusen
desc: Caesar Clown orders the passage between building A and B to be closed, allowing Shinokuni to kill the intruders.

title: Uragiri no Chuujou! Kichiku no Vergo
desc: After getting through the gates and thinking they're safe, G-5 Marines get a surprise visit from Vice Admiral Vergo.

title: Hakunetsu no Gekisen: Luffy VS Caesar
desc: Luffy finally reaches Caesar and attacks him, while Smoker leaves in order to find Vergo.

title: Yami no Kuromaku! Doflamingo Ugoku!
desc: Law walks into the SAD room, Vergo speaks with Doflamingo about Law while Baby 5 attacks him.

title: Luffy Toushi!? Kyoufu no Yukionna Monet!
desc: Chopper uses Monster Point, trying to prevent the children from taking more candy. Luffy faces Monet and gets trapped but manages to make a hole in the floor and escape.

title: Butsukaru Kobushi! Futari no Chuujou no Tatakai
desc: Smoker and Vergo begin their fight in the SAD Room. At the same time, Sanji, Tashigi, and the G-5 Marines are running through the battle-torn B-block when a gas tank explodes, causing Shinokuni to get in.

title: Chiisana Dragon! Momonosuke Arawaru
desc: Luffy meets Momonosuke in the garbage dump of Block C. In a flashback, Momonosuke didn't want the candy Caesar gave out to the children and he got hungry so he ate a devil fruit which turned him into a dragon.

title: Fubuki no Shitou: Mugiwara no Ichimi Tai Yukionna
desc: Luffy and Momonosuke are still trying to get out of the garbage chute. Caesar is watching Monet fighting Zoro. Usopp, Brook and Kin'emon are trying to find the sea stone cuffs and Momonosuke.

title: Ougi Sakuretsu! Zoro Saikyou no Ittou-ryuu!
desc: Mocha is still running away with the candy, and the children are chasing her. Chopper, Nami, and Robin come to her and the children's aid. At the Biscuit Room, Zoro and Tashigi battle Monet.

title: Tomodachi o Mamoru! Mocha Inochi-gake no Tousou
desc: Luffy and Momonosuke manage to escape from the garbage chute and attack Caesar's subordinates, asking them where Caesar is. Mocha sacrifices herself and eats the candy.

title: Chahige Hitsuu! Luffy Ikari no Ichigeki
desc: Zoro carries Tashigi away from the poisonous gas. Sanji and the G-5 marines continue to assist Chopper to vaccinate the children.

title: Shougeki no Kecchaku! Smoker Tai Vergo!
desc: Smoker continues his fight with Vergo. The Straw Hat Pirates, G-5 Marines and the children run from the gas and continue to head towards building R-66. Usopp stumbles over the surveillance room where some of Caesar's men open fire at him.

title: Caesar Gekiha! Saikyou no Grizzly Magnum
desc: Vergo attempts to kill Law even though he is cut down. The Straw Hats continue their struggle to escape the poisonous gas.

title: Shuurai! Dressrosa kara no Shikaku
desc: Luffy defeats Caesar and sends him flying out of the facility. The Straw Hats, G-5, the children and Law made it to Building R-66 where they prepare to leave the building. Baby 5 and Buffalo attempt to rescue Caesar.

title: Ooabare! Muteki no Franky Shougun
desc: Franky begins to attack the two Donquixote pirates who retaliated with Baby 5 turning into weapons and Buffalo launching her at their robot foe.

title: Zettai Zetsumei! Punk Hazard Dai-Bakuhatsu
desc: The Straw Hats are still racing towards the exit of the collapsing lab when they felt the explosion of the SAD room and then saw Shinokuni on their trail.

title: Caesar o Hokaku-seyo - General Canon Sakuretsu
desc: General Franky puts up a good fight against Buffalo and Baby 5. He sends them flying away with a General Cannon, but the two refused to stay defeated despite their injuries.

title: Kandou no Saikai! Momonosuke to Kin'emon
desc: While the group celebrates their victory, Smoker talks with Law about him manipulating Luffy, but Law says that its the other way around.

title: Sekibetsu no Toki - Punk Hazard Shukkou!
desc: The Straw Hats and G-5 Marines part ways. Flying over the ocean, Doflamingo approaches a life raft with Baby 5 and Buffalo's heads hanging on it, which were apparently cut off by Law.

title: G-5 Kaimetsu! Doflamingo Kyuushuu!
desc: Caesar Clown's former minions go in a search for those who were petrified by Shinokuni. All a sudden, Doflamingo appears and kills majority of the G-5 Soldiers.

title: Kinpaku! Aokiji tai Doflamingo
desc: Doflamingo prepares to finish Smoker off, but is stopped by Kuzan's ice. At the Thousand Sunny, Law tells some details about the recently formed pirate alliance.

title: Kieta Caesar! Kaizoku Doumei Shutsugeki
desc: Smooth seas stretch out before the Straw Hats as they leave Punk Hazard far behind - but while they fear Doflamingo's return and prepare to face him, another foe lies in wait, whose powers could be their downfall.

title: Luffy Umi ni Shisu!? Kaizoku Doumei Houkai
desc: Breed reveals his intentions. Breed commands Luffy and Law to fight each other in a stadium-like place, while Dugong begs him to make them stop.

title: Daigyakuten! Sakuretsu Luffy Ikari no Tekken
desc: Chopper and the dugong make an attempt to go against Breed, but Breed orders the other animals to attack them. At that point Law, Caesar and Luffy enter the room and Luffy knocks the animals out.

title: Gekishin! Shinsekai Ugokasu Dai News
desc: The world learns about Doflamingo's sudden resignation from the Shichibukai. Law explains his plan for the destruction of the factory. Meanwhile, Buggy is revealed to have become a Shichibukai during the time-skip.

title: Bouken! Ai to Jounetsu no Kuni Dressrosa
desc: The Straw Hat Pirates, Law, Kin'emon and Momonosuke arrive at Dressrosa. There they divide into 3 groups. A mysterious blind man appears.

title: Nekkyou Uzumaku: Corrida Colosseum
desc: After the blind man departs, the people in the bar start exclaiming over missing possessions, among which is Zoro's Shusui, the treasure of Wano Country.

title: Kiken na Koi: Odoriko Violet
desc: As Zoro searches for his missing katana, Sanji finds himself meeting a beautiful and stunning dancer named Violet who requires the services of Sanji in a dire matter.

title: Saikyou no Mumei Senshi! Lucy Toujou
desc: Luffy signs up for the tournament, and Franky requests him to not let anyone discover who he is. Meanwhile, Sanji is seen with Violet, wandering around Dressrosa.

title: Kaizoku Kikoushi Cavendish
desc: The famous beautiful pirate Cavendish makes an entrance and proceeds to explain to Luffy (not realizing his identity) the rules of entertainment in the Colosseum.

title: Unmei no Saikai: Hyena no Bellamy
desc: Luffy meets an unexpected acquaintance from the past, Bellamy. Meanwhile, the Caesar handover team learn about Green Bit, and on the Sunny, the four who remained to watch the ship hear noises from inside.

title: Choushinsei! Hitokui no Bartolomeo
desc: The Block B battle begins. Bartolomeo is heckled by the crowd as he enters the colosseum. Cavendish tells Luffy about the competitors and reveals why he hates the new super rookies.

title: Gun'yuu Kakkyo! Hakunetsu no B Block!
desc: Seeing that his true identity is exposed, Luffy tries to defend himself from Chinjao's devastating headbutts and Cavendish's irrational hatred while trying in vain to convince them he's "Lucy"

title: Ichigeki Hissatsu! Kyoui no King Punch
desc: With Hack defeated and the remaining fighters reduced to 24, the battle royale is nearly over. Bellamy faces off Bartolomeo while at the same time Blue Gilly defeats Ricky.

title: Tougyo Shuurai! Shi no Tekkyou o Toppa Seyo
desc: Bartolomeo wins block B. Law, Usopp and Robin prepare to cross the bridge but are attacked by a school of Fighting Fish.

title: Bouken! Yousei no Shima Green Bit
desc: Upon their arrival to Green Bit, the group discovers a Marine ship that crashed and believed that the Marines had landed on the island. Robin and Usopp begin to scout the island as Law takes Caesar to the meeting point.

title: Shirarezaru Sekai Tontatta Oukoku
desc: Robin found herself captured by dwarves after they knocked her and Usopp unconscious. At the Colosseum, the C block battle royale has started, and Luffy is excited to win this for the prize.

title: Seiki no Bouryaku: Doflamingo Ugoku
desc: Sanji learns the truth about what happens before their arrival in Dressrosa and warns Law to get out of Green Bit. Unfortunately, it was too late as the Marines, Issho, and Doflamingo get to the exchange point as well.

title: Tenchi Yurugasu! Taishou Fujitora no Jitsuryoku
desc: Admiral Issho and Donquixote Doflamingo prepare to fight Trafalgar Law, who is trying to stall them long enough for the Straw Hat Pirates to accomplish their missions. In the Colosseum, Luffy tames the Fighting Bull.

title: Ikari no Ichigeki! Kyojin vs Lucy
desc: The Straw Hat Pirates on-board the Thousand Sunny find themselves in a predicament as they are under attack by the Donquixote Pirates lead by Giolla who transformed the crew as well as the ship into abstract art.

title: Hakai-hou Sakuretsu! Lucy Kikiippatsu
desc: The battle Colosseum heats up as more fighters continue to drop one after another and the strongest and most infamous fighters begin to face each other.

title: Densetsu no Kaizoku - Don Chinjao!
desc: The final two competitors of Block C, Lucy (Luffy) and Don Chinjao clash with conquerors Haki.

title: Hikari to Kage - Dressrosa ni Hisomu Yami!
desc: Sanji and Kin'emon are watching Luffy's fight while observing in disguise the numerous marines surrounding the Colosseum waiting to arrest any criminal that exits the stadium.

title: Shutsugeki - Densetsu no Hero Usoland
desc: Usopp, Robin and their dwarf allies are preparing for battle with the Donquixote Pirates to rescue their 500 captured dwarf comrades.

title: Gekisen Kecchaku! Lucy VS Chinjao!
desc: Luffy's battle with Chinjao rages forward as they both use Busoshoku Haki in the ongoing fight.

title: Luffy to Shukumei no Ken Toushi Rebecca
desc: As Luffy leaves the ring after winning Block C of the tournament, he is attacked by Cavendish. Bartolomeo reveals his connection to Luffy, and Chinjao attempts to thank Luffy for restoring his head.

title: Mamorinuku! Rebecca to Omocha no Heitai
desc: Rebbecca's mother leaves her in the Flower Field to go back to town and bring back foot but is killed in the process. The Thunder Soldier carries her mother back and promising that he will protect her forever.

title: Saigo no Chou Gekisen Ku - D Block Kaisen
desc: Block D begins their battle in the Corrida Colosseum. As Rebecca enters the arena, she is taunted by the crowd.

title: Kessen! Joura vs Mugiwara no Ichimi
desc: At Green Bit, Doflamingo reveals the founding of the World Government and informs Law that the royal family that ruled Dressrosa before the Riku Family was the Donquixote Family.

title: Yoshiken! Hakuba no Cavendish
desc: In the Corrida Colosseum, the battle of Block D continues as Cavendish and Rebecca defeat several opponents.

title: Dai Kessen! Sanji VS Doflamingo
desc: Sanji attacks Doflamingo but is defeated and saved by Law who brings him back to the Thousand Sunny. With Caesar Clown back in their control, Law orders the Straw Hats to head to Zou immediately.

title: Rebecca no Shi no Ken! Haisui no Kenbu
desc: Trafalgar Law and Donquixote Doflamingo begin their duel with a bang on the iron bridge while the escaped Straw Hats are already on their way to Zou.

title: Saikyou no Senshi! Logan vs Rebecca
desc: Bartolomeo searches for Luffy while he stumbles upon the infirmary with the losers of Block C. In the Colosseum, the crowd continues taunting the talented Rebecca.

title: Shougeki! Omocha no Heitai no Shoutai!
desc: After some conversation, Ricky reveals himself to be Riku Doldo III, the former king of Dressrosa and Rebecca's grandfather. In the flower fields, Gancho reveals the cruelty of the Donquixote Family from 800 years ago.

title: Senritsu no Kako! Dressrosa no Himitsu
desc: While the fight for block D continues, Thunder Soldier explains to the Straw Hat Pirates how King Riku lost the throne and respect of Dressrosa.

title: Akumu! Dressrosa Higeki no Ichiya
desc: While Doflamingo continues to control Riku Doldo III, his subordinates manage to take control of the castle with the help of an inside spy, who also took princess Viola hostage.

title: Shichibukai Taiketsu Law VS Doflamingo
desc: While Admiral Fujitora arrives at the shores of Dressrosa, there is a big ruckus in the city, with explosions and buildings being cut in half. Doflamingo finishes his fight with Law, shooting him three times.

title: Ryouyuu Aimamieru! Mugiwara to Ten Yasha
desc: Admiral Fujitora and the Marines prevent Zoro from saving Law. A mysterious figure appears in the Colosseum.

title: Luffy Kyougaku: Ace no Ishi o Tsugu Otoko
desc: Bartolomeo saves Bellamy from Dellinger who is called to guard the Toy House. Thunder Soldiers explains "Operation SOP". As Luffy looks for the Colosseum's exit, he is approached by Sabo.

title: SOP Sakusen Kaishi: Usoland Totsugeki
desc: At the Flower Field, the Dwarf army and the Straw Hats begin to move out, with Franky taking the front entrance via the toy house while the rest of the army take the secret underground tunnel that leads to the harbor.

title: Atsuki Omoi - Rebecca vs. Suleiman
desc: The Colosseum D block battle is almost over with nearly 30 fighters remaining with Rebecca among them.

title: Shousha Kettei!? D Block Shougeki no Ketsumatsu
desc: The last standing fighter is revealed to be Rebecca, making her the winner, much to the dissatisfaction of the disbelieving audience.

title: Taishou no Ketsudan - Fujitora vs. Doflamingo
desc: Viola shows Luffy's group a secret emergency lift, and the group boards it. In the Toy House, the battle between Franky and Senor Pink rages on, but they are then interrupted by the Marines.

title: Kesshou Kaishi: Eiyuu Diamante Toujou
desc: The contenders of the final round, Burgess, Bartolomeo, Lucy, Rebecca, and Diamante make their way in the Colosseum. Doflamingo questions why Luffy is in the tower when he should be in the Colosseum.

title: Ugoku Shiro! Saikou Kanbu Pica Shutsugen
desc: Luffy, Zoro and Viola make their way up the castle where they encounter Pica. At the Toy House, the Marines continue attacking Franky.

title: Ryuu no Tsume Sakuretsu! Lucy Kyoui no Ichigeki!
desc: Leo prepares to plant the Tatababasco grape in Sugar's bowl. Meanwhile, Kin'emon disguises himself to elude the Donquixote Pirates while Zoro has Luffy and Viola move on while he fights Pica.

title: Tatou Sugar: Kodomo no Heitai Totsugeki!
desc: Zoro's battle with Pica continues as Luffy and Viola move forward. Meanwhile, the tower elevator makes it to the palace first floor as Lao G continues to attack Thunder Soldier.

title: Saigo no Hikari: Warera ga Taichou no Himitsu!
desc: While the situation of the rebellion is getting more and more critical, Leo reveals to Usopp an important secret about their captain and the reason why their plan must not fail.

title: Panku Ningen: Gladius Dai Bakuhatsu!
desc: Thunder Soldier, Kabu and Rampo progress through the castle. In the trading port, Leo tries once again to poison Sugar but her toys attack him and the dwarf army.

title: Usotsuki Usoland Tousouchuu!
desc: Usopp gives up on running and decides to fight for the dwarf army, attacking Trebol with a Shuriken Star.

title: Unmei no Deai: Kyros to Riku Ou
desc: Usopp faces Trebol, the Thunder Soldier recalls his time as Kyros. After much time as a gladiator, Kyros manages to become King Riku's captain of his guard and later marries his eldest daughter Scarlett and they together conceive Rebecca.

title: Sakusen Shippai! Eiyuu Usoland Shisu!?
desc: Ten years ago, when Dressrosa is attacked by the Donquixote Pirates, Kyros rushes to the palace to see what's happening. He is ambushed by the pirates and chained to the ground as Doflamingo presents himself.

title: Densetsu Fukkatsu! Kyros Konshin no Ichigeki
desc: As an unconscious Sugar falls to the ground, the toys in Dressrosa begin reverting to their human forms, to the shock of the humans around them. Meanwhile, Kyros, finishes what he started 10 years ago by cutting off Doflamingo's head.

title: Kaken Sakuretsu! Fukkatsu Meramera no Mi no Chikara
desc: The final Colosseum round continues as Rebecca finally remembers her father. Sabo destroys the Colosseum with his Dragon Claw Fists before leaping at the Fighting Fish bearing the Mera Mera no Mi.

title: Sassou Toujou: Kakumeigun Sanbou Souchou Sabo!
desc: The mysterious 'Lucy' finally reveals his identity, while chaos continues at the trade port and in all of Dressrosa.

title: Akuma no Wana: Dressrosa Senmetsu Sakusen
desc: Doflamingo unleashes his Birdcage, sealing the entire island in strings. The strings then latch onto people and take control of them, forcing them to attack each other.

title: Go-oku no Otoko: Nerawareta Usoland!
desc: As citizens and Marines are forced to attack each other in the streets of Dressrosa, Doflamingo reveals to the island a hit list on the Straw Hat Pirates and their allies.

title: Tekijin Toppa: Luffy Zoro Hangeki Kaishi
