desc: Sabo and Koala separate from Nico Robin's group and head in separate directions as Robin decides to move toward the palace.

title: Daichi Meidou: Hakai Kami Kyoudai Pica Kourin
desc: Luffy and Zoro face off against Fujitora to get to Doflamingo. At the palace, Pica wishes to take the enemies out alone, but his high-pitched voice causes some of the subordinates to giggle, resulting in their deaths.

title: Daishuuketsu! Luffy to Kyouaku Senshi Gundan
desc: Luffy and Law survive Pica's punch and are found by the fighters from the Colosseum. They all fight over who will kill Doflamingo and then join up together to begin the fight against Pica.

title: Kaishingeki! Luffy Gundan vs Pica!
desc: After destroying Pica's arm, Chinjao and Elizabello II along with other Colosseum fighters proceed to decimate Doflamingo's soldiers.

title: Shougeki Kokuhaku! Law Atsuki Tamashii no Chikai!
desc: Law reveals what happened 13 years ago. Robin's group reaches Viola and Doldo's location and plan their next plan.

title: Daigekitotsu! Sanbou Souchou Sabo vs Taishou Fujitora
desc: Luffy's group reaches the first level of the castle while the Marines and Fujitora are held off by Sabo who easily overwhelms Vice Admiral Bastille.

title: Zettaizetsumei: Wana ni Kakatta Luffy!
desc: At the plateau, Bartolomeo, Robin and Rebecca continue travelling to the flower field with the aid of Leo's beetles. Back in the tunnel, Luffy and Law get caught in a trap.

title: Daidasshutsu! Luffy Kishikaisei no Elephant Gun
desc: Doflamingo's ambush for Luffy and Law is cut short when he is skewered by Abdullah and Jeet only to be exposed as another string clone. The two captains then learn how Kelly Funk betrayed them only to be betrayed by Doflamingo in return.

title: Kyoudousensen: Luffy Shouri e no Toppakou
desc: The Colosseum fighters are struggling against the elite officers while Cavendish offers Luffy and Law a ride to the palace. Kyros joins Luffy's party, and they arrive at the battle taking place in the palace's plateau.

title: Futarime no Samurai: Yuudachi Kanjuurou Toujou
desc: At the new palace tower, the Colosseum fighters are still clashing with the Donquixote Pirates allowing Luffy, Law, Kyros and Cavendish to escape towards the third level in order to reach level four.

title: Funtou to no Pica: Zoro Ichi Todome no Ichigeki
desc: Zoro continues his duel with Pica allowing Robin's group to advance. At the SMILE factory, the dwarf army continues their revolt.

title: Kobito no Hime: Toraware no Mansherry
desc: Having fooled Senor Pink, Franky arrives at the SMILE factory. Kin'emon and Kanjuro arrive at Viola's location.

title: Fujimi! Kyoufu no Atamawari Ningyou Gundan
desc: Viola discovers Mansherry's whereabouts and sends the info to Leo. Meanwhile, Luffy's group fight against the giant nutcrackers.

title: Inochi Kakete! Luffy wa Shouri no Kirifuda
desc: Rebecca reaches the flower field. Leo and Kabu leave to rescue Mansherry. Sabo continues his fight with Fujitora.

title: Namida no Saikai: Rebecca to Kyros
desc: Luffy and Law reach the flower field and continue towards the palace. However, Sugar is heading for them, eager to turn the two into toys and gain revenge.

title: Ichigeki Hissatsu: Dressrosa o Sukuu Otoko
desc: Usopp, with the help of Violet, aims at Sugar intending to take her down before she turns Luffy and Law into toys.

title: Ikari Bakuhatsu: Luffy Law Saikyou no Hisaku
desc: The battle between Robin's group and the nutcracker army comes to a stop as the toys revert into their human selves due to Sugar being knocked unconscious again. Luffy and Law begin their fight with Doflamingo.

title: Kedakaki Ichizoku! Doflamingo no Shoutai!
desc: Doflamingo recovers from Luffy's Red Hawk and continues his fight with him and Law. Sabo and Fujitora end their fight, calling it a draw.

title: Kyuukyoku no Chikara: Op-Op no Jitsu no Himitsu!
desc: The Marines are having difficulty maintaining order in the streets of Dressrosa as they deal with rampaging animals and pillaging pirates as well as the absence of Admiral Fujitora.

title: Kanashiki Kioku: Shiroi Machi no Shounen Law!
desc: The history of Flevance is revealed as Law's history prior to joining the Donquixote Pirates is explored.

title: Tenryuubito! Doffy no Souzetsu Naru Kako
desc: Doflamingo has a nightmare of his traumatic past. A flashback details the moment his parents left Mary Geoise, to when they became hunted and the death of Doflamingo and Rosinante's mother.

title: Kunan no Michi: Law to Corazon Inochi no Tabi
desc: Corazon talks to Law about the name "D." and states that they are considered troublesome by most. He also tells Law about his ulterior motives without exposing his relation to the marines.

title: Toki Sameru! Op-Op no Mi o Ubae!
desc: Donquixote Rosinante learns of his brother's intentions of stealing the Ope Ope no Mi and having him eat it. He resolves to steal it himself in order to have Trafalgar Law cured.

title: Kakugo no Toki: Corazon Wakare no Egao!
desc: Corazon force-feeds Law the Ope Ope no Mi and has him deliver an important message to the Marines, but Law mistakenly gives the message to Vergo who informs Doflamingo of his treachery.

title: Yuke Law: Yasashiki Otoko Saigo no Tatakai!
desc: After recalling how he killed his father and met his executives as a child, Donquixote Doflamingo confronts his brother, Rosinante.

title: Jiyuu e! Law Injection Shot Sakuretsu
desc: Law clashes with Doflamingo, taunting him about the "D". Meanwhile, Luffy struggles against Doflamingo's Black Knight clone and a controlled Bellamy.

title: Atsuki Tatakai: Law vs Doflamingo
desc: Zoro and Pica continue their fight with Pica getting larger. Meanwhile, Doflamingo cuts of Law's arm as Luffy finally defeats the clone.

title: Kanbu Kessen: Hokori Takaki Hajrudin
desc: The Colosseum combatants then manage to gain the upper hand, starting with Machvise being defeated by Hajrudin.

title: Ai no Kessen: Shintouryou Sai tai Baby 5
desc: Monkey D. Luffy and Bellamy continue their confrontation. Meanwhile, Lao G defeats Chinjao, but Sai, now officially the head of the Happo Navy, defeats Lao G with the technique he inherited from his grandfather.

title: Otoko no Iji: Bellamy Saigo no Totsugeki!
desc: Donquixote Doflamingo and Trebol defeat Law while Gladius attacks Cavendish. Luffy tries to convince Bellamy to stop attacking him.

title: Shippuudotou: Hakuba tai Dellinger
desc: Cavendish survives Gladius's Punk Rock Fest. Gladius is knocked out by Bartolomeo's Barrier Bulls. Dellinger defeats Ideo but is in turn defeated by Hakuba, who proceeds to attack Nico Robin.

title: Baribari: Homage Shinken Hatsudou!
desc: Gladius attempts to blow up both Nico Robin and Cavendish by rupturing the cliff-side they are on, but Cavendish manages to carry Robin to safety using Hakuba's speed.

title: Iyashi no Hime: Mansherry o Sukue!
desc: Giolla attempts to heal the fallen Donquixote Pirates executives with Mansherry's healing powers, but Leo defeats her while saving the princess. Meanwhile, Luffy continues to fight Bellamy.

title: Otoko no Kettou: Senor Ai no Banka
desc: Leo, Mansherry, and Kabu escape the palace as Giolla fails to inform Doflamingo of Mansherry's rescue.

title: Shi no Hoshikuzu: Diamante Moukou no Arashi
desc: Senor Pink is defeated by Franky, who leads the dwarf army to attack the SMILE Factory before collapsing. Meanwhile, Kyros battles Diamante and endures his Death Enjambre.

title: Trueno Bastardo: Kyros Ikari no Ichigeki
desc: Kyros continues his grueling battle with Diamante before finally defeating him. As the citizens celebrate, Pica abandons his fight with Roronoa Zoro to confront Kyros.

title: Daichi Oudan: Kyozou Pica Kishuu Sakusen!
desc: As Luffy continues to fight Bellamy, Pica advances toward the King's Plateau in his giant stone body in an attempt to kill King Riku, forcing Roronoa Zoro to come up with a plan to stop him.

title: Kuuchuu Kessen: Zoro Shin Hissastsu Ougi Sakuretsu!
desc: Pica reaches and attacks the King's Plateau, but Roronoa Zoro slashes apart his stone body and cuts him down with Sanzen Sekai.

title: Abayo! Bellamy Wakare no Ichigeki!
desc: Mansherry meets Kyros, who tells her to use her healing powers on those who need it more than he does. The SMILE Factory is destroyed by the dwarf army, and Sabo prepares to meet Luffy at the palace.

title: Law Shisu: Luffy Fundo no Moukougeki!
desc: Riku gathers more people to help the citizens, Luffy makes it back to the rooftop, where he attacks Doflamingo.

title: Shuunen no Yaiba: Gyakushuu no Gamma Knife!
desc: Doflamingo shrinks the Birdcage, causing the citizens of Dressrosa to run away in panic. Luffy fights Doflamingo, but Law switches places with him in order to land his Gamma Knife attack.

title: Haki Gekitotsu: Luffy tai Doflamingo
desc: Doflamingo uses his powers to heal himself and attack Law. Luffy stops Doflamingo, and the two clash using Haoshoku Haki. During the battle, Trebol remembers how he found a young Doflamingo and gave him the power to kill anyone he wanted.

title: Kougeki Funou: Trebol Shougeki no Himitsu
desc: Trebol immobilizes Luffy and Law and explains how he and the other three Donquixote executives found Doflamingo and raised him into the man he is today. Law mocks Trebol, causing the executive to attack him in anger.

desc: Luffy's and Katakuri's battle becomes more and more one-sided in favor of Katkuri. Sanji, Pudding and Chiffon arrive at the cake factory and begin making the wedding cake for Big Mom.

title: The Green Room! An Invincible Helmsman, Jimbei!
desc: Luffy tells Nami to break all the mirrors on the ship. Sanji, Pudding, Chiffon and the 31 chefs work together to make the wedding cake for Big Mom. A giant wave is made by Big Mom but Jinbei comes up with a quick plan to get through it.

title: The Threat of the Mole! Luffy's Silent Fight!
desc: The straw hats come up with a rendezvous point after the Big Mom pirates believe some of them to be dead. Germa continues to fight with the Big Mom pirates. Brulee overhears the straw hats plan and lets Peros know where they plan to meet.

title: The End of the Deadly Battle?! Katakuri's Awakening in Anger!
desc: Katakuri uses his awakened devil fruit ability. Germa 66 defeat the group of Big Mom pirates invading their kingdom. Katakuri looks to end the battle between himself and Luffy.

title: The Forbidden Secret! Katakuri's Merienda!
desc: Katakuri begins to eat but he does it alone so no one sees him. Luffy sees something that Katakuri doesn't want anyone to see and sends him into a rage.

title: Luffy Fights Back! The Invincible Katakuri's Weak Point!
desc: Luffy uses fourth gear and begins to understand Katakuri's ability. Brulee tells Pudding about what she knows about the straw hats plans and Sanji hears her.

title: Another Crisis! Gear Four vs. Unstoppable Donuts!
desc: The Big Mom pirates can't locate the straw hat pirates or the fire tank pirates. Luffy runs out of time for fourth gear and must wait ten minutes before he can use haki again. Luffy finds Brulee and escapes from Katakuri using her power.

title: The Rebellious Daughter, Chiffon! Sanji's Big Plan for Transporting the Cake!
desc: Luffy looks for a mirror to escape from Peros and Big Mom. Chiffon is attacked by Oven causing her father and Sanji to try and help her. Bege comes to rescue Chiffon.

title: A Man's Way of Life! Bege and Luffy's Determination as Captains
desc: Bege and his crew go to rescue Chiffon from Oven and pick up the cake. Carrot worries about a possible full moon. Luffy thinks about what he needs to do to beat Katakuri.

title: The Cake Sank?! Sanji and Bege's Getaway Battle!
desc: Luffy returns to fight Katakuri. The fire tank pirates escape with the cake but are pursued by Oven. Pound attacks Oven to stop him from going after Chiffon and the rest of the fire tank pirates.

title: Sulong! Carrot's Big Mystic Transformation!
desc: Carrot turns into a sulong, an ability minks have on full moons. As a sulong Carrot's strength is greatly increased. Carrot attacks Daifuku's ship and the Big Mom pirates surrounding him. Carrot draws some of Daifuku's attacks making attack his own ships.

title: Break Through! The Straw Hat's Mighty Sea Battle!
desc: Luffy's and Katakuri's long battle continues. Bege tries to poison the wedding cake but Sanji won't let him. Brook and Carrot deal with some of the Big Mom Pirates and retreat back to the sunny. Big Mom lands on the sunny seeking cake.

title: Finally Clash - Yonko VS Straw Hat Crew
desc: Luffy tries to use observation haki the same way Katakuri uses it in order to beat him. Big Mom and the straw hats fight.

title: Dark King's Direct Precepts! The Battle Against Katakuri Turns Around!
desc: The straw hats manage to capture Zeus. Luffy remembers his haki training with Dark King Rayleigh.

title: Finally He Returns! Sanji, the Man Who'll Stop the Emperor of the Sea!
desc: Luffy begins to use observation haki a little more effectively allowing him to dodge some of Katakuri's attacks. As Big Mom attacks the straw hats Bege lures Big Mom away with the wedding cake and Sanji makes his way on the sunny.

title: Lurking in the Darkness! An Assassin Targeting Luffy!
desc: As Luffy is fighting Katakuri, he is shot with a numbing agent by Katakuri's little sister. Oven orders everyone on cacao island to destroy or sink all there mirrors.

title: One Man's Determination! Katakuri's Deadly Big Fight!
desc: Katakuri notices Flampe has been shooting at Luffy, Katakuri then stabs himself as he wants an honorable victory. Chiffon convinces Bege to change course to a different island. Smoothie attacks the straw hats ship.

title: Wake Up! The Color of Observation Able to Top the Strongest!
desc: Luffy thinks back to the days he was training with Rayleigh. Many of the Big Mom pirates gather at cacao island. Luffy uses a new form of fourth gear.

title: A Fist of Divine Speed! Another Gear Four Application Activated!
desc: Luffy uses a new form for fourth gear, 'Snake Man'. Sanji makes his way to cacao island to back Luffy up.

title: Finally Concluded - An Outcome of the Fierce Battle with Katakuri
desc: Luffy and Katakuri both land simultaneous blows ending their battle with both of them on the ground. Pekoms helps Luffy by bringing Brulee to allow him to escape from the mirror world.

title: A Desperate Situation! The Iron-Tight Entrapment of Luffy!
desc: Pekoms has a plan to allow Luffy to escape. Sanji takes Luffy and tries to skywalk to the sunny. The Big Mom pirates get attacked by an enemy they thought they had dealt with.

title: Pulling Back from the Brink! The Formidable Reinforcements - Germa!
desc: Brulee informs the Big Mom pirates that Luffy beat Katakuri. Sanji gets assistance from his siblings as he is carrying Luffy back to the sunny.

title: The Last Hope! The Sun Pirates Emerge!
desc: Sanji and Luffy make it back to the sunny. The fire tank pirates make it to their destination but their ship gets destroyed by Big Mom. As the straw hats are surrounded Jinbie's old crew the Sun pirates help them.

title: A Fascinating Taste - Sanji's Cake of Happiness
desc: Big Mom finally eats the cake. The Sun pirates help the straw hats but have to retreat after Oven heats the water. The straw hats are once again surrounded.

title: The Man of Humanity and Justice - Jinbe, a Desperate Massive Ocean Current
desc: The fish-men temporarily fool the Big Mom pirates into believing that the straw hats are dead. Jimbe helps the Sun pirates and Luffy asks him to meet with the crew in the land of Wano when he's done.

title: Time for Farewell! Pudding's One Last Request!
desc: Carrot tells Sanji the news about Pedro. Germa and the Sun pirates continue on fighting with the Big Mom Pirates to allow for the straw hats to escape. Pudding remembers her time with Sanji. Brulee tends to Katakuri.

title: The World in Shock! The Fifth Emperor of the Sea Arrives!
desc: The news of the assassination attempt on Big Mom's life by Luffy, Bege, Jimbe and Sanji makes news around the world.

title: To the Levely! Gathering of the Straw Hat Allies!
desc: Luffy gets upset because he thinks he bounty has been lowered. Coby helps the royalty of Dressrosa and remembers his early days with Luffy.

title: Sabo Goes into Action! All the Captains of the Revolutionary Army Appear!
desc: The four captains of the revolutionary army stop pirates who are attacking a village. Sabo reads the news about Luffy. The revolutionary army prepares to declare war on the celestial dragons.

title: Going into Action! The Implacable New Admiral of the Fleet - Sakazuki
desc: Sakazuki is not happy with Fujitora going to any navy bases. Sengoku about how Luffy broke into impel down and the battle of marineford.

title: The Paramount War! The Inherited Will of the King of the Pirates!
desc: Sengoku thinks about how the marines should have killed Luffy and thinks back to the marineford war and Ace's death. Royalty starts to attend reverie.

title: One Step Ahead of the Dream - Shirahoshi's Path to the Sun!
desc: Both Luffy and Sabo think back to when they met. Sabo's adoptive brother, Stelly, meets Garp.

title: I Miss Him! Vivi and Rebecca's Sentiments!
desc: Vivi tells Rebbeca about how Luffy and his crew saved her country.

title: In the Dark Recesses of the Holyland! A Mysterious Giant Straw Hat!
desc: Vivi meets with Wapol and Dalton. Vivi and Dalton talk about Luffy and Chopper. Bartolomeo is giving out straw hat pins for people to wear. Doflamingo talks about the secret of Mariejois.

title: The Uproarious Holy Land - Princess Shirahoshi is being targeted!
desc: Stelly sees the empty throne and wishes to sit on it. The same celestial dragon that Luffy punched wishes to capture Shirahoshi and keep her as a pet. Rob Lucci is now part of CP0. Another celestial dragon saves Shirahoshi.

title: On the Verge - The Two Yonko Targeting Luffy
desc: Big Mom and Kaido talk about straw hat Luffy and who gets to kill him. Brief recaps of Fish-man island, Punk Hazard, Dressrosa, Zou and Whole cake island is given. Shanks meets with the five elders.

title: Sabo Gets Angry - Tragedy of the Revolutionary Army Officer Kuma
desc: Sabo takes pictures of Mariejois. Sabo sees a celestial dragon, riding Kuma which sends him into a rage but he is stopped before he can attack by the revolutionary army's captains. Jewelry Bonney sneaks in Mariejois.

title: Finally, It Starts! The Conspiracy-filled Reverie!
desc: A recap of the events briefly before and after the time-skip. The reverie begins but with a mysterious figure who even the five elders answer to.

title: Marco! The Keeper of Whitebeard's Last Memento!
desc: A recap of some of Whitebeard's life. Marco is looking after Whitebeards home and thinks of it as a memento of Whitebeard. Marco talks about challenging Blackbeard.

title: Climbing Up a Waterfall! A Great Journey Through the Land of Wano's Sea Zone!
desc: Marco the leader of the first division of white-beard s crew carries on the legacy of his father.

title: Wano Country! To the Land of Dancing Sakura and Samurai
desc: It is revealed that the straw hats have been living in Wano under different names and keeping their identity secret. Zoro gets captured by the authority of Wano for a crime he didn't do and is told to commit seppuku.

title: Otama Appears! Luffy vs. Kaido's Army!
desc: Luffy is in the land of Wano but is separated from the rest of his crew. Luffy sees two animals fighting and is attacked but swiftly deals with them. Zoro is wanted in Wano after attacking samurai. Luffy befriends a girl named Otama.

title: He'll Come! The Legend of Ace in the Land of Wano!
desc: Otana invites Luffy to her home and gives Luffy rice. Luffy finds out more about Wano from Otana's master. Otana tells Luffy that she's waiting for Ace. Luffy informs her of Ace's death. Basil Hawkins makes his way to his men.

title: Side Story! The World's Greatest Bounty Hunter, Cidre!
desc: The straw hats are attacked by bounty hunters and use coup-de burst to get away. Luffy wants to buy cola but ends up in a bath with Boa Hancock. The two of them are then attacked by the same bounty hunters.

title: Side Story! Clash! Luffy vs. the King of Carbonation!
desc: Cidre fights Luffy and his followers fight Boa Hancock. Some of the men explain to Zoro and Sanji that they are being forced to follow Cidre Guild. After Luffy defeats Cidre he finds an invitation to the Pirate Fest.

title: Save Otama! Straw Hat, Bounding through the Wasteland!
desc: Luffy decides to take Otama to a Dr. Luffy dresses like a samurai and takes Kotetsu the 2nd, a cursed sword, with him. Zoro saves a woman being chased. Luffy and Zoro reunite. Basil Hawkins appears and is ready to attack Zoro and Luffy.

title: The Headliner! Hawkings the Magician Appears!
desc: Zoro notices Luffy's sword and asks if he can hold it but Luffy refuses. Zoro and Luffy battle Hawkins's underlings. Luffy and Zoro are carried away by Komachiyo after he notices Otama's condition worsening. Hawkins pursues them.

title: Defeat is Inevitable! The Strawman's Fierce Attack!
desc: Zoro fights Hawkins's Strawman. Zoro defeats the Strawman allowing himself and Luffy to flee. The woman Zoro saved earlier gives Zoro and Luffy directions and offers to help Otama.

title: The Greatest Day of My Life! Otama and Her Sweet Red-bean Soup!
desc: Otama drinks herbal medicine and quickly recovers. Tsuru offers Otama red-bean soup. Tsuru explains the situation of Wano. One of Kaido's subordinates to tries to kill Tsuru, something Zoro stops. Otama is kidnapped one of Kaido's goons.

title: Entering Enemy Territory! The Protagonists Spread into the Town of Bakura!
desc: Gazel-man takes Otama to Holdem, one of the 3 headliners in Bakura. Okiku tells Luffy and Zoro that she's a samurai. Otama is asked by Holdem how she tamed a giant baboon. Bepo tells Law that Luffy and Zoro are going to attack Bakura town.

title: The Yokozuna Appears! The Invincible Urashima Goes After Okiku!
desc: Luffytaro, Zorojuro, and Okiku finally make it to town but immediately are questioned. Luffy gets past them using his Haki to stay hidden, but once Urashima sees Okiku he makes his move again to try and make her his wife. She has other ideas after being captured.

title: A Climactic Sumo Battle! Straw Hat vs. the Strongest Ever Yokozuna!
desc: Luffy faces against Urashima in a sumo match. Luffy sends Urashima crashing into Holdem's residence where Holdem tries to pull off Tama's cheek for the devil fruit power she possesses.

title: Luffy Rages! Rescue Otama from Danger!
desc: Holdem approaches holding Tama hostage before Luffy's group who were fighting the beast pirates.

title: Fighting for Otama! Fight against Holdem!
desc: Holdem continues to taunt Luffy's group while holding Tama hostage, threatening to chew her up with Kamijiro. Kiku warns Luffy against attacking Holdem as Kuri is ruled by Jack, and he will destroy Bakura Town if they fight back.

title: Duel! The Magician and the Surgeon of Death!
desc: After defeating Holdem, Luffy grabs Tama and flees the scene. During the escape, they encounter Speed and Tama tames her. They then catch up to Zoro, Kiku, and Komachiyo as the latter three were fleeing with the stolen food cart.

title: Romance Dawn
desc: It adapts the second pilot of One Piece, telling a different backstory how Luffy became a rubber man. Luffy has to fight the pirate Spiel, which uses witch like magic to fight, and rescue a kidnapped girl named Ann and her pet bird.

title: The Coming of the Treasure Ship! Luffytaro Returns the Favor!
desc: Luffy's group delivers the stolen food cart to Okobore Town and Luffy also gives the residents clean water. After Luffy parted ways with Tama and Speed, Law takes the group to the ruins of Oden Castle.

title: Nazo no Bohyo - Oden Joseki de no Saikai!
desc: While Zoro battles a giant tiger, Luffy, Law, and Okiku arrive at Oden castle, the three reunite with Kin'emon as well as Momonosuke. Nami, Sanji, Chopper, and Brook then regroup with Luffy. Kin'emon reveals a shocking truth.

title: A Legendary Samurai! The Man Who Roger Admired!
desc: While traveling to Oden Castle, Komachiyo, Law, Luffy, Zoro, and Kiku encounter a ferocious tiger. The group later arrive at the ruins of Oden Castle. After seeing the graves of the Kozuki Family, Luffy reunites with his crew and allies

title: Bringing Down the Emperor of the Sea! A Secret Raid Operation Begins!
desc: Kin'emon lais out the plan of how they are going to defeat Kaido, but much work remains, such as recruiting allies and gathering information on the enemy.

title: The Strongest Man in the World! Shutenmaru, the Thieves Brigade Chief!
desc: Usohachi makes a discovery. Shutenmaru and Jack face off. Kaido makes his entrance.

title: Everyone is Annihilated! Kaido's Furious Blast Breath!
desc: The drunken Kaido flies above Okobore Town in his dragon form and threatens Shutenmaru and all the people in the town. Luffy, Law, Kin'emon, and Kiku start running towards the town to rescue them.

title: Finally Clashing! The Ferocious Luffy vs. Kaido!
desc: Right after the destruction of Oden Castle, Luffy enters a furious battle with Kaido.

title: Hakai-teki! Ichigeki Hissatsu no Raimei Hakke!
desc: Luffy continues his furious battle with Kaido. Despite his best efforts, the battle ends in Luffy's defeat.

title: Iki-jigoku! Rufi Kutsujoku no Dai Tankutsu-jo
desc: After his defeat, Luffy is sent to a prison in the Udon region. Kiku returns to the mountain where Oden Castle was destroyed and discovers that the group there managed to escape the destruction.

title: The Holyland in Tumult! Emperor of the Sea Blackbeard Cackles!
desc: Perona learns from a newspaper that Gecko Moria is alive and prepares to leave Kuraigana Island to search for him. Moria and his zombie army attack Pirate Island to find Absalom only to learn that he had been killed.

title: Ugokidasu - Dato Kaido Daikeikaku!
desc: Dogstorm clashes with Shutenmaru, who refuses to aid in Kin'emon's operation. Sanji and the others seek out recruits.

title: Rampage! The Prisoners - Luffy and Kid!
desc: Nami and Shinobu finish with their current objective in the Flower Capital and Sanji's soba stand is growing more popular. In Udon, Luffy and Kid continue to work. The angry vice warden tries to attack them only to be defeated by the pair.

title: Dai Hyoban! Sanji no Ohako Soba!
desc: Sanji tangles with some gang members who disrupt his soba business and learns that one of his customers has friends in high places.

title: Goka Kenran - Wano Kuni Ichi no Bijo: Komurasaki
desc: Wano's most popular courtesan heads to the palace, but a revenge plot threatens the proceedings.

title: A Tale of Chivalry! Zoro and Tonoyasu's Little Trip!
desc: Zoro goes to a gambling house with Tonoyasu. Meanwhile, the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance works to steal weapons and food. Franky learns that Minatomo no longer has the blueprints of Kaido's mansion.

title: A State of Emergency! Big Mom Closes in!
desc: The banquet at Orochi's palace begins . Shinobu, Nami, and Brook sneak into the palace as well. Meanwhile, in Udon prison, Kid explains to Luffy and Caribou about how he lost his arm.

title: The Capital in an Uproar! Another Assassin Targets Sanji!
desc: King flies to the waterfall while the Big Mom Pirates are coming up and knocks their ship down. Meanwhile, back at the capital, Page One attack multiple soba shops and owners looking for Sanji.

title: Dashing! The Righteous Soba Mask!
desc: As he confronts Page One, Sanji puts on his Raid Suit and displays its capabilities. Back in the shogun's caste, Robin was sneaking around trying to find important information.

title: Zettai Zetsumei - Kyoi no Orochi Oniwabanshu
desc: Robin gets caught by the Orochi Oniwabanshu in Orochi's castle. The ninjas attack Robin in order to find the truth of her intentions. Meanwhile, Chopper, Kiku, Tama, and Momonosuke find Big Mom at the shore after the encounter with King.

title: Shura-jo! Osoreru Daija Shogun Orochi
desc: At Kuri Beach, Chopper gives the amnesiac Big Mom a fake name. Back inside the shogun's castle, Orochi warns his guests about the return of the Scabbards. Toko laughs, enraging Orochi. As Orochi lashes out at Toko, Komurasaki steps in.

title: The Flower Falls! The Final Moment of the Most Beautiful Woman in the Land of Wano!
desc: Orochi takes his rage out on Komurasaki as Robin protects Toko. Brook, Nami, and Shinobu arrive at the banquet hall to aid Robin. Right after Orochi releases his grip on Komurasaki during the commotion, Kyoshiro cuts her down.

title: The Bond Between Prisoners! Luffy and Old Man Hyo!
desc: In the Ringo region, Kanjuro meets up with Shinobu's group. In Ebisu Town, Law's group learns from a newspaper that a funeral for Komurasaki will be held and that Kid escaped from Udon prison.

title: A Lead Performer! Queen the Plague Emerges!
desc: Luffy kicks Daifugo to defend Hyogoro and then fights the guards until Babanuki fires a cannonball at him. Raizo manages to steal some keys from the Prisoner Mines executive tower. Later Queen arrives at the Udon prison.

title: Goes up. Luffy's Desperate Escape!
desc: At the Prisoner Mines, the Sumo Inferno begins, but Luffy easily defeated his opponents. Meanwhile at the Flower Capital bathhouse, Drake and Hawkins arrive to search for those associated with the Kozuki Family.

title: Dead or Alive! Queen's Sumo Inferno!
desc: At the Prisoner Mines, the Sumo Inferno begins, but Luffy easily defeated his opponents. Meanwhile at the Flower Capital bathhouse, Drake and Hawkins arrive to search for those associated with the Kozuki Family.

title: Gyukimaru! Zoro Fights a Duel on Bandit's Bridge
desc: Sumo Inferno continues and Queen sends in the Gifters. At the bridge, Zoro clashes with Gyukimaru to get Shusui back. Their fight is interrupted when a woman and Toko arrive seeking help as they were chased by an assassin known as Kamazo.

title: A Big Turnover! The Three-Sword Style Overcomes Danger!
desc: During an argument with Shinobu, Law plans to rescue his crew. Meanwhile at Oihagi Bridge, Zoro continues his clash with Kamazo.

title: Zoro, Stunned! The Shocking Identity of the Mysterious Woman!
desc: Luffy continues trying to use an advanced Busoshoku Haki technique as he and Hyogoro are confronted by Alpacaman and Madilloman.

title: Get the Hang of It! The Land of Wano's Haki - Ryuo!
desc: After Hiyori reveals her identity to Zoro, she explains about some things about her past such as how Kawamatsu watched over her after her parents' death.

title: Tonoyasu! Ebisu's most beloved!
desc: Luffy tries to learn Ryuo through fighting in the Sumo Inferno. It continues until the night and will resume the next day. Luffy and Hyogoro meet Caribou and Raizo and talks about the rebellion.

title: Shaking the nation. The identity of Ushimitsu Kozo
desc: After his capture, Tonoyasu is sentenced to execution. Meanwhile, Holdem and his men battle the Mt. Atama Thieves. While clashing with Ashura Doji, Holdem sets the mountain on fire.

title: The Straw Hats are running! Save the captive Tonoyasu
desc: Toko and Zoro's group make their way to the Flower Capital. As Shimotsuki Yasuie is placed on a wooden pole and is being broadcast throughout Wano, his old acquaintances recognize him.

title: Zoro's Fury! The Truth About the Smile!
desc: After claiming responsibility for Kin'emon's secret message, saying it was a prank, and casting doubt in the Rasetsu prison guards, Yasuie meets a brutal end as Orochi and his men shoot him to death.

title: Toko's Tears! Orochi's Pitiless Bullets!
desc: As the citizens of Ebisu Town grieve over Yasuie's death, Shinobu reveals more information about the SMILE fruits. Meanwhile Zoro and Sanji step in fight to save Toko from Orochi.

title: The Straw Hats Step In! An Uproarious Deadly Battle at the Execution Ground!
desc: Zoro and Sanji start fighting against Orochi's clan. Nami and the rest of the Straw Hats join them. Meanwhile, at the Excavation Labor Camp a new criminal has arrived. And a shocking truth is revealed.

title: Luffy's Determination! Win Through the Sumo Inferno!
desc: Zoro clashes with Kyoshiro and Sanji clashes with X Drake while Usopp takes Toko to safety. Right after that the Orochi Oniwabanshu arrives to confront the Straw Hat Pirates.

title: The Coming of the Storm! Big Mom's Great Rampage!
desc: After the skirmish inside the Flower Capital, Kin'emon confesses to Ashura Doji that he provoked Holdem into attacking Mt. Atama. When Ashura becomes angry, Kin'emon admits his mistake and once again begs him for his help.

title: A Grudge Over Oshiruko - Luffy Gets into a Desperate Situation
desc: Big Mom subdues Queen when the latter tries to fight her. During that scuffle, Kid and Killer are saved from drowning. Big Mom does not find any oshiruko, and when Luffy blurts out that he ate it, she attacks him out of rage.

title: Stop the Emperor of the Sea! Queen's Secret Plan!
desc: Luffy attempts to defend against Big Mom's attack, but she sends him and Hyogoro crashing into a wall. They both survived, but Big Mom continues attacking Luffy, chasing him around the Prisoner Mines.

title: The Ultimate Weapon! Excite Bullets Aimed at Luffy
desc: Right after Big Mom regains her memories, she suddenly faints. Queen quickly orders to restrain Big Mom and escorts her to Onigashima. With both Queen and Big Mom away, Luffy continues practicing with advanced Busoshoku Haki.

title: Start Fighting Back! Luffy and the Red Scabbard Samurai!
desc: Raizo freed Kawamastsu and with Luffy, Chopper, Kiku and Hyogoro they start fighting the Hundred Beast Pirates of the Udon prison meanwhile zoro and Hyori got attacked by Fukurokoji's underlings.

title: We're Here to Win! Luffy's Desperate Scream!
desc: Luffy and his group continue to rebel against the prison guards, however, the prisoners attempt to stop them after the plague spreads rapidly. Luffy takes drastic action in an attempt to win the prisoner's faith and stir them to rebel too.

title: Warriors' Dream! Luffy's Conquer of Udon!
desc: After Udon is conquered, Chopper tends to Luffy and works to develop a cure for his condition. Luffy asks Kid to join the fight against Kaido, but Kid rejects his offer and leaves Udon with Killer.

title: Orochi's Pursuers! Ninja Army Corps vs. Zoro
desc: Zoro is continuously pursued by Orochi's ninjas. Law strikes a deal with Basil Hawkins in regards to the freedom of The Heart Pirates.

title: Tension Rises in Onigashima! Two Emperors of the Sea Meet?!
desc: Kanjuro, Nami, and Franky travel across Wano. Brook, Ussop, and Robin also travel Wano using a dock. Ashura reveals ships that he has that will be used for the assault on Onigashima. Zoro battles for his sword. Big Mom and Kaidio meet.

title: Hiyori's Confession! Reunion on Oihagi Bridge
desc: Big Mom and Kadio come to blows leaving Kadio's subordinate nervous. Reunions take place as Hyogoro and the yakuza bosses from the past get reacquainted while across Wano, Hiyori and Kawamatsu also reunite.

title: Its Name is Enma! Oden's Meito!
desc: Kawamatsu tells Hiyori how he and a fox named Onimaru defended and collected weapons belonging to the dead. Hiyori offers Zoro Enma, the legendary sword said to have cut Kadio.

title: "A New Alliance?! Kaido's Army Gathers"
desc: Zoro agrees to return Shusui in exchange for Enma, Law subdues Hawkins and escapes. At Onigashima, Kaidou and Big Mom decide to put aside their feud and form an alliance to conquer the world.

title: Ticking Down to the Great Battle! The Straw Hats Go into Combat Mode!
desc: Zoro receives Enma and sees its destructive power. Luffy continues training his Busoshoku Haki.

title: Big News! The Warlords Attack Incident
desc: News concerning Sabo spread throughout the world. Drake and Koby conduct a private conversation.

title: "The Legendary Battle! Garp and Roger"
desc: The navy begins a meeting where Sengoku informs them about the alliance between Big Mom and Kaido. Sengoku talks about the legendary Rocks pirates and he reveals the bounties of all of the Yonko's, as well as Roger's bounty.

title: "The Promised Port - Opening of Third Act of Wano Country!"
desc: The Fire Festival is soon to begin as the samurai of Wano wait for their allies who are nowhere to be seen leaving Kin'emon and the rest of the samurai feeling helpless.

title: "The Greatest Samurai of Wano Country! Kozuki Oden Appears!"
desc: It is revealed that Orochi had the Beasts Pirates bombed the Thousand Sunny and destroyed some bridges to cut off routes to Tokage Port. At the port, the Nine Red Scabbards prepare to continue with the raid on their own.

title: "The Crying Apprentice! Oden and Kin'emon!"
desc: The Mountain God continues its rampage in the Flower Capital until Oden confronts and defeats it. After this incident, Oden was expelled from the capital. Due to their admiration for Oden, Kinemon and Denjiro decide to follow him.

title: Changing Destiny - The Whitebeard Pirates Cast Ashore!
desc: Oden transforms the wild land of Kuri into a habitable region and is made Daimyo over it.

title: Oden's Determination! Whitebeard's Trials!
desc: Once their ship is repaired, the Whitebeard Pirates leave at night to avoid Oden's advances but he catches up anyway, attaching a chain to the ship and riding with Izo through the ocean. Marco saves Izo and brings him onto the Moby Dick where he is tied up.

title: Whitebeard's Little Brother! Oden's Great Adventure!
desc: Toki tends to Oden after he rescued her from the kidnappers. On the next day, they are confronted by the kidnappers and their leader, Karma. Whitebeard intervenes and knocks out Karma. Whitebeard accepts Oden into his crew because of his selflessness.

title: Blades Crossed! Roger and Whitebeard!
desc: Orochi plots to take the shogunate with Higurashi's assistance. As Oden continues his journey with the Whitebeard Pirates, he finally encounters the Roger Pirates. A clash between Whitebeard and Gol D. Roger ensues.

title: Roger's Wish! A New Journey!
desc: After an intense and lasting battle between the most fomented pirate gangs in the world, Roger discovers Oden's skill, spent for years in the Kouzuki clan, and decides to make an unpredictable invitation.

title: Devoting His Life! Roger's Adventure
desc: Roger pirates sail around the Grandline and meet some old friends.

title: The Pirate King is Born: Arriving at the Last Island!
desc: Oden, forced by an ill Toki, leaves her and their children at Wano sailing again on the Oro Jackson. At Zou, Roger finds the last Road Poneglyph. Despite his worsening health, Roger and his crew reach the Grand Line's final island.

title: To Wano Country! The Roger Pirates Disband
desc: After reaching the last island and becoming the "King of all Pirates" Gol D. Roger disbands the Roger pirates. Oden returns to his home.

title: Sad News: The Opening of the Great Pirate Era
desc: After seeing the state of Wano, a vengeful Oden sets out to the Flower Capital with his swords pointed at Orochi.

title: Raid! Oden and the Nine Red Scabbards
desc: Orochi travels to Kuri revealing his evil plan as Oden finally decides to take down Kaido

title: The Moment of Conclusion! Oden vs. Kaido!
desc: Oden and the nine Ninjas march toward Kaido's area for revenge. Suddenly something shows up in their way.

title: Sentenced to Boil! Oden's Deadly Hour!
desc: Having been defeated by Kaidou, Oden is captured and sentenced, along with his retainers, to be executed in the middle of the Flower Capital.

title: Oden Wouldn't Be Oden If It Wasn't Boiled!
desc: Oden throws his friends to safety and exchanges final words with Kaido.

title: The Castle on Fire! The Fate of the Kozuki Clan!
desc: Kaido breaks into the burning Kozuki castle as Toki attempts to save her family.

title: Back to the Present Day! 20 Years Later!
desc: Hiyori and Kappa separate and she gets brought to Kysohiro who secretly pledges to protect her.

title: The Sea Is For Pirates! Raid! To Onigashima
desc: With no allies coming to their aid, the Nine Red Scabbards row to Onigashima on their own.

title: The Worst Generation Charges in! The Battle of the Stormy Sea
desc: Luffy, Law, and Kid join the Akazaya samurai and begin to fight Kaido's army.

title: Good Luck!? Leader Kin'emon's Plot
desc: Kyoshiro reveals himself as Denjiro (one of the akazaya Samurai) and explains the real meaning of the flyer. Meanwhile, Kanjuro kidnaps Momonuske and heads towards onigashima.

title: A Tearful Promise! The Kidnapped Momonosuke!
desc: The Beast Pirates start attacking the samurai's ships from a distance. An old ally comes to Straw Hats' aid.

title: A New Member! Knight of the Sea Jinbe!
desc: Zoro and Sanji team up to fight the guard as Luffy and Jimbei attack Kaido's men.

title: Kaido's Trump Card - Introducing the Tobi Roppo
desc: The Straw Hat Pirates enter Onigashima's torii gate. Queen begins the Golden Kagura festivities, and the Tobi Roppo meet to hear their captain's request.

title: The Samurai Warriors' Earnestness! The Straw Hats Land at Onigashima
desc: As the alliance and Kid Pirates reach Onigashima, Kin'emon uses his sorcery to everyone's clothes to blend in with the Beasts Pirates.

title: Luffy Goes Out of Control?! Sneaking into Kaido's Banquet
desc: The Kid Pirates head for Kaido's castle as Luffy and Zoro go after to stop them from causing trouble.

title: Thinking of O-Tama - Luffy's Furious Strike
desc: Luffy and Zoro witness Kaido's subordinates waste food at the banquet and make fun of the poor people in the Land of Wano which causes them to become infuriated and create turmoil.

title: Fighting Music! The Ability to Attack Luffy!
desc: After making a scene at the Golden Festival, Luffy and Zoro try to get away, but Queen's subordinates chase after them.

title: The Failing Dream? The Plot to Lure Sanji!
desc: Haccha joins in and the pursuit of Luffy. Meanwhile, Kin'emon changes his strategy and his group tries to infiltrate the castle from its side.

title: Arrival of Reinforcements! Captain of the Whitebeard Pirates!
desc: Luffy, Law, Kin'emon, and others are trying to infiltrate Kaido's castle. Big Mom's children are climbing up the waterfall again, but a foe stands in their way.

title: Oath of Man! Fierce Battle of the Brachiotank
desc: Big Mom chases Brachio Tank driven by Chopper and Usopp. Meanwhile, Kanjuro takes Momonosuke to Kaido and Orochi and informs them about Oden's retainers.

title: Thunder Bagua! The Appearance of Kaido's Son
desc: Luffy runs into Ulti and Page One, but someone wearing a demon mask appears and whisks him away.

title: Enemy or Ally? Luffy and Yamato!
desc: Luffy questions Yamato's motive, however, the two get into a fight.

title: Desire to be Oden! Yamato's Dream!
desc: Law's Polar Tang finally reaches Onigashima and see an unexpected face, meanwhile Yamato tells Luffy a story.

title: Explosive?! The Handcuffs that Shackle Yamato's Freedom!
desc: At the back entrance of Onigashima, the Akazaya members try to get inside the gate, but they're blocked by their former colleague Kanjuro.

title: The Scabbards Face-off - Kikunojo vs. Kanjuro
desc: At the back entrance of Onigashima, Kikunojo squares off against Kanjuro.

title: Raid! Inheriting Oden's Will
desc: Allies that wish to free the Land of Wano from the grasp of Kaido get reunited to strike their enemies! Kaido finds himself facing the ghost of a man he both despised and respected. The first big spark of great defiance flashes!

title: Onigashima in Tumult! Luffy's All-Out War Begins!
desc: The Akazaya members deliver a crushing blow to Kaido. Luffy and Yamato back them up but are spotted by Big Mom.

title: The Battle Under the Moon! The Berserker, Sulong the Moon Lion!
desc: Thousands of samurai warriors rush the castle, attacking the Animal Kingdom Pirates. In his dragon form, Kaido goes outside to fight the Akazaya members under the moon.

title: Zeus' Treason?! The Cornered Nami!
desc: Shinobu tries to rescue the weakened Momonosuke but is found by King and attacked. Nami takes back Zeus from Big Mom.

title: I'll Protect You! Yamato Meets Momonosuke!
desc: Franky faces Big Mom with the help of Robin and Jimbei, but the Numbers come interrupting their battle. One of them holds Brachio Tank with Usopp and Chopper inside in his hand. Meanwhile, Yamato, the self-proclaimed Oden, finally meets Oden's son, Momonosuke.

title: Overwhelming Strength! The Straw Hats Come Together!
desc: As the Minks struggle with a poor hand against the Gifters, Kin'emon tries to assist them, but Dogstorm and Cat Viper stop him and start fighting for the other Minks. Meanwhile, Luffy and Zoro try to get to the rooftop to help Kin'emon and the others, but Queen and King get in their way.

title: A Risky Invitation! A Plot to Eliminate Queen!
desc: Who's-Who invites Drake and Hawkins to a plot to kill Queen. Meanwhile, the Straw Hats are facing two large monsters that remind them of the Giant who they once struggled to take down. As Luffy charges towards them, someone unexpected comes in to help.

title: A New Rivalry! Nami and Ulti!
desc: Drake vows to fight alongside Luffy, but Zoro becomes skeptical and challenges him to a fight. Meanwhile, Usopp's practical joke pushes Nami into confronting Ulti, who is infuriated since her brother got attacked.

title: A Heroic Blade! Akazaya vs. Kaido, Again Once More!
desc: The fight against Kaido starts, as the last standing enemy is him. Carrot has a chance of meeting with Perospero, the one she blames for Pedro's death. Marco faces Bigmom, as his deal with Perospero is shattered.

title: An Inherited Technique! Unleashing Oden's Secret Swordplay!
desc: Luffy and Sanji continue to make their way up the castle to Kaido. Meanwhile Yamato continues her pursuit to Momonosuke. The battle between the Nine Akazaya Samurai and Kaido rages on.

title: Special Episode: Barto's Secret Room
desc: Bartolomeo and Otama look back on Luffy and the Straw Hat Crew's adventures in the Land of Wano. Otama tells Bartolomeo about her meeting with Luffy, and the events leading up to the fierce battle with Kaido.

title: The Power of Ice Oni! A New Version of the Plague Rounds!
desc: Queen, blazes away at samurai on the Performance Floor with the special version of the Plague Rounds, which turns them into hideous ogres that corner Zoro and Drake.

title: I Won't Forgive Him! Chopper's Determination!
desc: King orders his subordinates to go after Momonosuke. Meanwhile, seeing people suffering from Queen's Plague Rounds, Chopper is determined to save everyone.

title: Zoro's Pursuit! Ice Oni Tag!
desc: Yamato fights Sasaki and the Armored Division to protect Momonosuke. Meanwhile, Zoro tries to get rid of the Gifters who have turned into Ice Oni, but Queen starts a horrible game which involves the antibody for the virus.

title: Nami Surrenders?! Ulti's Fierce Headbutt!
desc: Ulti and Page One of the Tobi Roppo chase Nami and Usopp, after being infuriated by their attack as well as Luffy's declaration of becoming the King of the Pirates. Cornered, Nami gives in and Ulti pushes her to say the unthinkable.

title: Sasaki's Onslaught! Armored Division vs. Yamato!
desc: Carrot and Wanda step in to help Marco, who is cornered by Big Mom and Perospero. In the meantime, Yamato fights a fierce battle against the Animal Kingdom Pirates Armored Division led by Sasaki, while protecting Shinobu and Momonosuke.

title: Eliminate the Ice Oni! Chopper's Fire Trick!
desc: Zoro and Drake continue to chase Apoo to get the antibody against Ice Oni, while Chopper is trying to figure out how to fight the virus. In the castle, Luffy, Jimbei, and Sanji are climbing up the stairs to reach the rooftop.

title: It's Not Okay! The Spider Lures Sanji!
desc: Sanji walks into a trap set up by Black Maria. Luffy and Jimbei attempt to reach the rooftop.

title: A Turnaround Move! The Flames of Marco the Phoenix!
desc: While Kaido begins the New Onigashima Project, Marco appears in front of Chopper and the others, who are struggling with Ice Oni.

title: Yamato's Past! The Man Who Came for an Emperor of the Sea!
desc: Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu that she once confronted a man who came to Onigashima looking to get Kaido's head. His name was Ace. The two of them engaged in a fierce battle that eventually turned into an important friendship.

title: Marco's Tears! The Bond of the Whitebeard Pirates!
desc: The formidable Lead Performers of the Animal Kingdom Pirates stand in Zoro's way as he tries to get to the rooftop. Marco sees his late comrade in Zoro's determination and tries to pave the way for him.

title: Straw Hat Luffy! The Man Who Will Become the King of the Pirates!
desc: Yamato reveals her dream to Ace in a flashback. Meanwhile Luffy, Zoro, Law, Kidd and Killer confront Kaido and Big Mom on the rooftop.

title: The Battle of the Monsters! The Three Stubborn Captains!
desc: Luffy's strong attack reminds Kaido of all the strong ones he's ever met. On the other hand, Luffy, Law, and Kid keep quarrelling amongst themselves. Meanwhile, Sanji is caught and interrogated by Black Maria in what he calls "heaven."

title: Barrage of Powerful Techniques! The Fierce Attacks of the Worst Generation!
desc: Luffy, Law, Kid, Zoro, and Killer keep landing hard blows against Kaido in tandem despite the arguing. However, when Big Mom steps in and unleashes powerful lightning strikes, the tide turns for all except one of the rookies.

title: Kaido Laughs! The Emperors of the Sea vs. the New Generation!
desc: Luffy pummels Kaido with his Kong Gatling but uses up all of his strength. Big Mom tries to fight back, but Law gets in her way as Kid and Killer try to finish off Kaido.

title: Otama's Secret Plan! Operation Kibi Dango!
desc: Tama arrives in Onigashima and it's time to execute her powerful plan - Operation Kibi Dango.

title: Sanji's Scream! An SOS Echoes Over the Island!
desc: Sanji is been held captive and tortured by Black Maria to bring Nico Robin out in the open.

title: Spank Strikes! Sanji's Woman-trouble!
desc: Robin bursts in to rescue Sanji along with Brook and faces Black Maria, who is trying to keep Sanji as her pet.

title: No Regrets! Luffy and Boss, a Master-Disciple Bond!
desc: Chopper works hard to make the cure for Ice Oni, even though he is turning into one himself. Meanwhile, the infected Boss Hyogoro the Flower regains his youth and fights fiercely to protect Chopper and the others.

title: All Set! Chopperphage Nebulizer!
desc: Seeing everyone turning into Ice Oni, there is nothing that the samurai warriors can do but grieve. However, it wasn't just them devastated by Queen's raging virus. When their desperation and frustration peak, they hear a hopeful voice.

title: Oden Appears! The Confused Hearts of the Akazaya Members
desc: That unparalleled laugh. The Akazaya regain hope upon witnessing Oden's return. They failed in their attempt to take down Kaido, but after twenty years, they team up with Oden again to finish the job.

title: The Worst Generation Gets Wiped Out?! The Emperors' Deadly Attack!
desc: The Akazaya members run to save Momonosuke, but encounter a familiar enemy. Meanwhile, Kaido and Big Mom unleash a combination attack on the Supernovas.

title: The Supernovas Strike Back! The Mission to Tear Apart the Emperors!
desc: The battle gets more intense as Kaido and Big Mom battle the Worst Generation to their peak.

title: Defend Luffy! Zoro and Law's Sword Technique!
desc: As the rooftop battle rages on, and with Luffy out of commission, Zoro launches an all-out attack at the risk of his life.

title: Surpass the Emperor of the Sea! Luffy Strikes Back with an Iron Fist!
desc: Big Mom creates a replacement for Zeus and unleashes a tremendous attack on Kidd and Killer. Luffy vows to defeat Kaido after dealing a vicious blow to the Emperor.

title: A Faint Memory! Luffy and Red-Haired's Daughter Uta!
desc: A young Luffy meets Uta, daughter of Shanks and aspiring musician. The pair soon realize that they have more in common than they think.

title: The Oath of the New Era! Luffy and Uta!
desc: As the Red Hair Pirates leave, Luffy promises Uta he will become stronger when she comes back. When Shanks returns without Uta some time later, Luffy feels betrayed.

title: Nami's Scream - The Desperate Death Race!
desc: Nami and Usopp's fight with Ulti and Page One is interrupted by the arrival of Big Mom. Luffy continues his ferocious attacks on Kaido.

title: The Dawn of the Land of Wano - The All-Out Battle Heats Up!
desc: Oden's samurai aim to stop Kanjuro while Yamato gives Oden's travel logs to Momonosuke. Luffy, Chopper and Sanji each continue fighting Kaido and his men. Ulti's actions cause Nami's rage to be heightened.

title: The Conclusion! Luffy's Accelerating Fist of the Supreme King
desc: Bearing the fate of the Land of Wano on his shoulders, Luffy finishes his battle with Kaido with a decisive attack.

title: Luffy Defeated! The Straw Hats in Jeopardy?!
desc: Luffy falls into the sea, with Kaido declaring a victory over him. Zeus is overwhelmed with emotion as he sees Big Mom has replaced him with Hera, leaving Zeus, seemingly, completely rejected by both Big Mom and Nami.

title: The Animal Kingdom Pirates Trample Down! The End of the Kozuki Clan!
desc: While the Straw Hats and their allies are all having a hard time, they are shocked by the news that Luffy lost to Kaido. At the same time, Kanjuro closes in on Momonosuke to destroy the Kozuki lineage.

title: Fight Against the Dark Night - The Commander-in-Chief of Wano Country Sounds Off
desc: News of Luffy's defeat spreads troughout Onigashima as the Samurai start to lose the will to fight, but the courageous Momonosuke gives them hope.

title: Believe in Luffy! The Alliance's Counterattack Begins!
desc: Momonosuke and Shinobu face Kaido while Kid and Law challenge Big Mom. Meanwhile, Nami, heading towards the stage on the Performance Floor along with Usopp and Tama.

title: Nami's Lethal Attack! O-Tama's Desperate Challenge!
desc: Nami strikes a thunder blast to clear the way to the stage on the Performance Floor. However, the elite corps of the Gifters show up to crush their inferior opponents. Upset but unbroken, Otama stands up to give a command.

title: A Dramatic Increase of Allies! Straw Hats Fight Back!
desc: The Gifters side with the samurai and upset the Tobi Roppo. Chopper starts to take care of Zoro while suffering from the side effect of the enhanced Rumble Ball. Meanwhile, Jimbei gets stunned by Who's-Who's story.

title: A Helmsman's Pride - An Angry Jinbe!
desc: Who's-Who expresses fierce resentment toward Luffy and Jimbei fights back out of loyalty to his captain.. As Who's-Who asks Jimbei a question, he tramples on the dignity of the Fish-Men and that sparks Jimbei's outrage.

title: Showdown Battles of the Monsters! Yamato and Franky
desc: To cut ties with Kaido, Yamato unleashes his true power. Meanwhile, Queen repeatedly attacks Sanji with his power as a cyborg, and Sasaki in his Man-Beast Form launches tricky attacks on Franky and drives him into a corner.

title: The Predator's Trap - Black Maria's Temptation
desc: Kaido tries to convince Yamato to become the Shogun of the Land of Wano and rule the country with the special power he obtained by accident. Meanwhile, Saul, Professor Clover, and Robin's mother Olvia suddenly appear in front of her.

title: Slash the Nightmare - Brook Draws His Freezing Sword!
desc: In the dense mist, Brook is surprised to see his old friends, the Rumbar Pirates and Laboon. They reminisce about the old days and play music together, however, they suddenly attack Brook.

title: Clutch! A Demon Incarnate, Robin!
desc: Black Maria torments Robin both physically and spiritually. As she burns in hellfire, Robin remembers the people who gave her a hard time and the people who supported her, and she as Demon Child shows what she is really capable of.

title: A Spell! Kid and Zoro Facing Threats!
desc: Killer is shocked to find out who Hawkins' straw doll he slashed represents. Meanwhile, Sanji who is in a hard battle against Queen and King sees enemy brutes going after the injured Zoro, and no one else is there to save him.

title: A Special Episode to Admire Zoro-senpai and Sanji-senpai! Barto's Secret Room 2!
desc: Bartolomeo and Law takes a trip down the memory lane reacting to some epic moments of Zoro and Sanji in Wano.

title: A Comprehensive Anatomy! The Legend of Kozuki Oden!
desc: Yamato and Momonosuke look back on Oden's adventures and heroic actions throughout the world and in the Land of Wano.

title: The Captain's Log of the Legend! Red-Haired Shanks!
desc: On their way to Uta's show at Elegia, Koby reminisces on Shanks' role in the Paramount War at Marineford.

title: A Comprehensive Anatomy! Fierce Fight! The Five from the New Generation
desc: Captain Kid and Killer look back on their adventures in the Land of Wano along with the other pirates from the Worst Generation, Luffy, Zoro, and Law.

title: Recapping Fierce Fights! Straw Hats vs. Tobi Roppo
desc: Zoro and Sanji look back on their friends' battles against the Tobi Roppo, the top officers of the Animal Kingdom Pirates. They describe how hard Nami, Robin, and the others fought to defeat the formidable enemies.

title: Taking a Chance! The Two Arms Go into Battle!
desc: Zoro gets back on his feet and along with Sanji, confronts King and Queen, the Lead Performers of the Animal Kingdom Pirates. Watching Zoro fight, Hyogoro and Kawamatsu remember someone from way back.

title: Rise to Dawn! The Peach Colored Dragon Rages!
desc: Dogstorm confronts his sworn enemy who destroyed his country. Meanwhile, Cat Viper faces Perospero who is responsible for Pedro's death. At Tokage Port, Momonosuke roars with his determined eyes.

title: For the Future! Yamato and the Great Swordsmen's Pledge!
desc: The battle between Kaido and Yamato gets intense. Backed into a corner, Yamato remembers three great swordsmen who he met when he was a child. Their stunning choice for the future of the Land of Wano encourages Yamato.

title: Luffy Soars! Revenge Against the King of the Beasts!
desc: Luffy amps up the reluctant Momonosuke, who is afraid of heights, in his giant pink dragon form, to fly and take him to Onigashima in the sky. Meanwhile, Yamato, in a hard battle against Kaido, vows to survive until Luffy returns

title: Two Dragons Face Off! Momonosuke's Determination!
desc: Momonosuke faces Kaido once again trembling in fear. However, with Luffy's encouragement, he bravely steps up and shows his dragon fangs remembering what he had to go through because of Kaido.

title: A Legend All Over Again! Luffy's Fist Roars in the Sky
desc: Momonosuke once again gets cold feet, but this time, he has a reliable ally who can teach him how to fly. The clash between Luffy and Kaido shakes up the sky and enables Dogstorm and Cat Viper to exert all their strength.

title: The Situation Has Grown Tense! The End of Onigashima!
desc: Realizing Onigashima's impending threat, imperiling everyone's life, Yamato and Momonosuke launch a secret operation. Meanwhile, Sanji and Zoro are both in a deadly battle against Queen and King

title: Sanji's Mutation - The Two Arms in Crisis!
desc: Queen's unforeseen move stuns everyone on the Performance Floor. And then, he goes on to utilize another special technique which can break every bone in Sanji's body. On the verge of a crisis, Sanji feels something strange again.

title: Death to Your Partner! Killer's Deadly Gamble!
desc: Killer tries to figure out how to fight against Hawkins whose power enables him to transfer damage against him to Kid. Kid is dying not knowing where his damage is coming from. Killer takes a chance with Kid's life on the line.

title: A Shadowy Figure Pulls the Strings! Onigashima in Flames
desc: Sanji still wonders what is happening to his body as he receives attacks. Meanwhile, the dying Kin'emon hears an unexpected voice calling for the also dying Kanjuro.

title: A Countercharge! Law and Kid's Return-Attack Combination
desc: Law and Kid are having a tough battle against Big Mom. However, when they decide to work collaboratively and use their awakened Devil Fruit powers, they see the possibility of taking down the old generation.

title: For Luffy - Sanji and Zoro's Oath
desc: Sanji is tormented by the idea of becoming a cruel Germa warrior like his siblings and torn between being strong or being humane as he is now. When he makes up his mind, he asks Zoro the ultimate favor.

title: The Onslaught of Kazenbo: Orochi's Evil Clutches Close in
desc: Kazenbo rampages through the castle creating panic among both the Animal Kingdom Pirates and the samurai. Orochi who is watching in excitement suddenly hears a sound that brings back memories.

title: Zoro's Hardship - A Monster! King the Wildfire
desc: As Queen reveals King's secret to Sanji, elsewhere as he is struggling against King, Zoro remembers an important fact from his past.

title: Secrets of Enma! The Cursed Sword Entrusted to Zoro
desc: Zoro still can't gain control of Enma which keeps extracting his Haki. Backed into a corner by the formidable King, Zoro remembers the encounter with an old man in his hometown when he was a child.

title: The Strike of an Ifrit! Sanji vs. Queen
desc: Queen's formidable attacks remind Sanji of his family. Annoyed by Queen's provocations, Sanji remembers a young woman mysteriously getting hurt in front of him and realizes what happened at that time, which lights a fire within him.

title: The Three-Sword Style of the Supreme King! Zoro vs. King
desc: As the battle between Zoro and King reaches its climax, Zoro, after figuring out the secret of King's abilities, uses his newfound power to create the King of Hell Three Sword Style.

title: Luffy on the Move! The Turning Point of a New Era!
desc: Usopp finds Kin'emon's upper body and the heavily wounded Kiku. However, they are surrounded by the Gifters and can't find a way out. Seeing the samurai giving up hope, Usopp remembers his determination.
